Summary: The whole experience was great. No charge to park. Large, clean rooms. Convenient location. Pretty quiet. Full free breakfast with made-to-order eggs. The duo doing the cooking were fantastic— cheerful and efficient. Friendly and helpful staff at front desk. Good water pressure in the shower. I was happy with everything.

Summary Heading: Very convenient place to stay in Orange County, California.
Summary: I spent five nights in this hotel and it was a very pleasant experience. It is one of those hotels in the USA where you can find a Chinese, Japanese, Mexican Resturant and a Subway within a ten minutes walk. Super convenient for those who are not driving. The staff are also very friendly and on 27/10 evening I left my bag in the reception area without realizing it until the staff on duty called me up to inform me of it. The staff are amazing.

Summary Heading: Not considerate of families or requests
Summary: We booked these rooms in The spring. Planning on a couple days at the beach and a trip to Disney.  We asked for 2 joining and they did not accommodate despite several requests. Pre planning guests with 2 rooms isn’t a priority even if you have children.  After this incident we found out The Hilton guarantees your rooms to be connected. Especially for large families traveling together.  If this is your situation, do not book here. Go to the Hilton, it appears they care about their guests.
Room tip: Go to the Hilton if you need adjoining rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Yamilena R,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding our adjoining rooms, as it is based on availability. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences, and we are disappointed we did not successfully do that for you this time. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a 5-star visit the next time you're in the area.   Sincerely,  Marilin Fabian  General Manager

Summary: We had booked a stay from 27th August to the 30th august and had selected the "pay $30 extra" for each of our two rooms for a check in at 11.am When were arrived we were told by the WORST front desk staff I have ever encountered, who couldn't even be bothered to engage with us, that no such facility existed. I asked to speak to a manager and was told there was no one available and could see he was not in any way interested in helping us.Also, whilst we were booking our new hotel in the lobby another party came in with exactly the same complaint My instincts were telling me that this was a bad choice to spend the last thee nights of a 23 night road trip so cancelled our reservation and went elsewhere. We ended up in the Newport coast villas which was a lot more expensive but as

Stayed here for one night for the laguna hills marathon. The room was quiet, clean, and comfortable. The outdoor courtyard was cute and great for eating breakfast. It was in a great location, close to the freeway and close to the beach. Would definitely stay here again.

My Fiancee and I stayed 2 nights at the Ayres Laguna Woods 8/26-8/28 room 123.  Housekeeping is frequently  The floors were absolutely filthy! Unfortunately, we neglected to pack our slippers. I have attached photos of our feet 30 min after showering and walking around only inside the room. In addition, a photo of a washcloth with only a small amount of water dampening the cloth. The floors had obviously not been mopped in a very LONG TIME. In addition, the Mattress was broken down, the box springs squeeked loudly at the slightest movement. I must state that it was difficult for me to write this review as I have worked in the Hospitality and more specifically the Hotel/Resort industry for many years. Even more specifically I have worked within and lead the Rooms Divisions of

Summary Heading: Great Hotel all around, great value.
Summary: This is the fourth year I've stayed at Ayres Laguna Woods in the last six years. Every year it is great, but this year, it was exceptional.   The beds were super comfortable, the rooms clean.  The hot tub, while the temperature could have been a few degrees hotter, was a godsend because I injured myself at work last year week.  The fact that it is open till 10pm is a big plus. Still gives us the option after a long day out.  The included breakfast - stellar this year.  I miss the make your own belgian waffles with the excellent strawberry sauce you used to make for it, but this year, the addition of made to order omelettes in addition to made to order eggs were excellent.  The male cook - besides how efficiently her works, what a great smile and personality and welcoming way

Summary Heading: Like Ayres hotels but wouldn’t stay here again
Summary: Not great for business trips, slow wifi and very thin walls, couldn’t sleep well due to neighbors behind the wall. There’s better options out there. Not very trustworthy staff as well, not to name names. I wouldn’t allow for daily room clean here from now on.
Manager Response: Dear Malinka,  Thank you for writing a review based on your recent stay! I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the service you received from our team and the surrounding noise. If you are ever experiencing any issues throughout your time with us, please let our team know as we strive to provide the most exceptional experiences. It would be a pleasure to have the chance to welcome you back for the 5-star accommodations you are most familiar with the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely,  Marilin Fabian General Manager

Summary: This hotel very sneakily charges 125 dollars Per night for a pet!  Most places charge 10 or 20 so it was shocking to be charged so much for one night. It’s misleading because the hotel site notes  that there is a deposit of 125 security charge so it’s Confusing that is in addition to the 125 dollar non refundable fee. I would never ever ever recommend s this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear LoriW_10,   Thank you very much for your candid review of Ayres Hotel Laguna  Woods.  I am very sorry that your stay with us was unsatisfactory.   We try very hard to respect the needs of all of our guests to ensure they will have a comfortable stay.   Our Pet Fee is competitive to other Hotels pet fee in this area.  We are also located within walking distance to two pet boarding facilities who's charges are between $40 - $75 per day.  When you visit our website under useful information it mentions our Pet Fee is $125.00 Non-Refundable Per Stay.   It also shows our Incidental Deposit Policy and other information.    I show our front office team offered to waved the cancellation penalty if you wanted to cancel without a charge before checking you in.   Again, thank you for your review and my sincere apologies for the inconvenience this may have caused you.

Summary: Comfortable room, bed and shower.  Lovely location in a neighborhood where my husband could run.  Breakfast buffet was excellent and egg items could be made to order.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Quiet, spacious rooms.

Summary Heading: Great stay at a beautiful hotel
Summary: Beautiful hotel.  Great location.  Walking to shopping and restaurants.  Rooms are well appointed and spacious.  Comfy beds and bedding.  The Fresh, hot, delicious daily breakfast is just the icing on the cake.  This hotel will not disappoint!

This hotel was absolutely excellent!! My family and I decided to go on a little family getaway to the Laguna area, considering how much we love this particular area. I fortunately found the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods to be pretty close to Laguna Beach which is was what originally drew me in. Now when we first arrived at the hotel, things were a little rocky with the service we were receiving. My family and I were not too happy at first and we agreed as a family that we would not be returning because we were not enjoying our stay. However, things quickly turned around due to the amazing service we received from Marylin and Rose. Marylin was super wonderful and welcoming to my family and I. Rose is such an amazing and friendly individual with such a great energy and personality.

Stayed here on a recent visit with family. It was their pick. I’d stay here again, mostly for the convenience, but also because our room was spotless and very comfortable. It was a double, with two exceptionally comfortable queen-size beds. The room was spacious and immaculate. My only criticism was that the room had a musty smell. It went away once we turned the a/c on, but was back upon our return from our day’s adventures. Not sure what that was about. Could just be the humidity of the area? Definitely not a deal-breaker though. The entire hotel appears to be very well-maintained and attractive. Overall, it was a pleasant stay. I’m sure we’ll be back.

Summary Heading: Great location, place to stay and staff!
Summary: My family, the groomsmen and I stayed here the night before my sons wedding.  Lynn was amazing in getting us a group rate and rooms that we loved!  We had some courtyard rooms and others were deluxe rooms.  The staff was very hospitable and nice.  Breakfast was a plus as the wedding was at 10am and we had to be there early.  Everything about this hotel was perfect!!  There is also a Chinese food place called the Fortune Cookie in the same parking lot and the food was delicious!! 5 stars from all of us!!

This was our first stay at this hotel. We had an excellent stay here for 4 days in November. Very clean. Good location. The Hotel followed Covid procedures and so did the guests we encountered which at that time was hit and miss in Orange County. Will stay again when in the area.

Don't go here! They will charge your credit card without your approval . They charge me $50 because I use their landline phone for 1 hour Without anything in the contract or any notification near the phone explaining the charges. Another woman was arguing at the front desk that they charged her card twice and she had been waiting a week for them to take the charges off. Marilyn the manager tried to throw me out of the room at 2:30 in the afternoon after I had been there for 2 MONTHS because she wanted to charge more for people escaping the fires!(I was also there escaping the fires but on a lower rate because I had been there so long). Also they hate handicapped people. There are piles of garbage all over outside attracting rats and roaches!

Our family came for a Beach Wedding and the stay at this Hotel was Amazing! The Breakfast was included in the price of our rooms and the Chief was so friendly! There is a garden by the pool and it was very peaceful. The beds were comfy and our room was by one of the exit doors so getting in and out was a breeze!

Overdue to be refreshed. Old furniture at the pool. Constantly out of towels and old towels all over. Hallways are old- carpet smells. Poor front desk experience. Rarely smile always seem bothered. A couple can't communicate- rarely say thank you or your welcome when you say thank you. Badly trained and not up to scale for the Ayres brand in my opinion. I've stayed at Costa Mesa much different experience.

Another great stay at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods.  We have stayed here over the last 15 years when visiting our in laws at Leisure World.  The hotel still looks great.  The room was clean and nicely furnished, and the bathroom was spotless.  When I noticed there was no hair dryer, the front desk had a replacement brought in about 5 minutes. I asked for some ketchup for a lunch we had brought to eat in the lobby, and the front desk female attendant found some from the kitchen, and brought it to us.  Wow, that’s service and with a smile.  And the free breakfast was delicious!  I don’t drink coffee, but my husband said the coffee was excellent, and the eggs made to order were so tasty with sausage and hash browns.  We will definitely stay here again.  Still a great value after

Summary Heading: 08.2020 Excellent stay. Rooms great, amenities. staff awesome
Summary: Stayed 08.2020 for business. great huge room. lovely pool/jacuzzi. has a gym. Breakfast was really good. Staff was so nice. shout out to lynn. great to use as a  home office away from office. Able to focus and then relaz in room when done. I plan on staying here all the time.

Summary Heading: One of My Best Hotel Experiences
Summary: I always enjoy staying at this spa-like hotel that keeps it's "new" look. It's a 5-star experience. The rooms are quiet, roomy, classy, super clean, and perfectly temperature controlled. The beds are just right, not too hard or soft, and the linens are high end. I sleep like a Serta sheep when I'm there. The staff is attentive and professional. I can't say enough about this hotel as it is a gem among all hotels, and I've been all over the world. It's just relaxing to be there and you know you are in good hands.

This is the first time I reviewed this wonderful hotel despite years of being a happy customer.  The location is perfect, close to my parents' home, but it also a 10-minute drive to Laguna Beach and a 30-minute drive to my favorite Korean restaurant in Garden Grove.  It's clean, quiet, and comfortable.  The front desk is welcoming and friendly.  The outdoor pool is inviting.  Nice paintings line the hall.  The breakfast is superb, with freshly cooked eggs, potatoes, and bacon or sausage patty, plus fresh fruit, coffee, choice of juices, continental breakfast options, and a do-it-yourself waffle maker with batter.  Our wonderful home in California.  This review is long overdue.

We spent a week while visiting family in Laguna Woods.  The room was spacious and clean and we slept well on the comfortable beds.  Bathroom is dated but adequate.  Lack of an in room safe is inexcusable in a hotel of this class/price.

Nice rooms with lots of space Very clean hotel Good Breakfast with plenty of choice  Lots of local restaurants & takeaways  Can park in the hotel car park for free  Will definitely stay at this hotel again

My husband and I enjoyed our stay at the Ayres Hotel.  The hotel staff were very kind, especially when I left my contact lenses and some other items behind after we checked out.  I called and they were able to retrieve my items quickly, and they saved them for me at the front desk. The breakfast is delicious, and the outdoor patio pool area is beautiful.  The hotel is very clean, inside and outside.  I highly recommend this hotel to travelers.

Summary Heading: Fantastic stay - home away from home
Summary: Stayed over the holidays.  The lobby was clean and decorated nicely. Check in fast and smooth. The room overlooked the pool/patio paved in brick with a fountain, tables with umbrellas, so not the typical concrete sitting area.  The room had 2 queens and had a bit more open space than a typical hotel room. It was helpful for opening our big suitcase. There are was a wet bar area with small fridge, microwave and coffee/tea area. The bed/linens were comfortable. Our room had a jetted tub, which isn't my preference but some in our group enjoyed it.  The housekeeping did a great job. At one point one of our party inadvertently tracked dried dirt inside and the housekeeping saw it and cleaned it. I honestly was expecting it to get left behind. We did a terrible job with managing our

Comfortable beds & a variety of pillows to suit your style & very clean & well taken care of property.  Outstanding hot breakfast buffet with many choices. Not a lot of frills, but solid  & well appointed.  Internet connection is troublesome... so if that’s super important I would not recommend. The front desk tried when I pressed for help with internet to assist & that did help some....

We just stopped over for a one-night stay to visit family in the area.  The room was very spacious, clean and equipped with a microwave and small refrigerator.  There was even a small table with two chairs, and another work desk.    After a very comfortable sleep past our normal waking hours, we rushed down to the Breakfast Buffet with 15 mins to spare.    We were met pleasantly by the cook at the Egg and Omelette Station.  A cooked-to-order plate of fried eggs for me, and my husband got to enjoy Scrambled Eggs with sausage patty and country-style potatoes.  He even had time to make some tasty waffles.   We were blown away by the quality of the complimentary breakfast.     Well done to the management team for this great experience!

Really enjoyed our stay. The room was spacious, very clean and well maintained. Breakfast was  delicious, so nice to have freshly cooked eggs. All the members of staff were both efficient and friendly. Looking forward to another visit. Highly recommended.

Lynn Dencker was amazing. She helped with meeting rooms and was the best meeting planner I have encountered in some time. Hotel is very conveniently located and a bargain price. I give this location 10 stars.

We couldn't have been happier.  Right from the get go! The check in process was quick and easy and the front desk personnel was able to help us get a discount that we didn't know we were eligible for. Found money?? Always a plus! The room was nicely appointed and comfortable.  The breakfast, which was included, was better that the typical included breakfast.  Eggs made to order, every day!  The staff was friendly and accommodating. One morning we were leaving early and they even made us a breakfast sandwich to go! Housekeeping was attentive and efficient.  One day our room was overlooked and when I called the front desk they immediately sent some one up.  She apologized so many times, it was almost embarrassing. The room was quickly put together.  Great service.  Weekday night

The check-in process was quick without hassles and navigating my way to my room was easy. My room was clean, spacious, well laid out and the bed was comfortable which helped me sleep well.  I am a very light sleeper that likes the sound from a fan or a running AC to help me sleep and it was wonderful that the AC setting could keep the fan running throughout the night and this helped with my sleep. This is not available in most hotels. Ayres has one of the best breakfast selections I have ever seen and they are made fresh, right in front of you. The servers are very courteous and all had charming smiles. My only suggestion would be to improve the seating arrangement in the breakfast room. There is not much spacing/ walkthroughs after getting food. They also offer strong
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback in regards to your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods! It is delightful to know that you enjoyed a peaceful night's rest, followed by our fresh and delicious offerings at our complimentary full American breakfast. We appreciate your recommendations regarding seating in our dining room and hope to welcome you back very soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We stayed only for one night, the property was cute outside and the lobby was very nice as well, the rest of the hotel was a little bland, but i wasn't going to be sleeping in the hallways so i didn't mind that so much. the room we had was not the double queen bed room we had reserved but we did have the sofa bed pull out so we made it work, again we were only staying one night so i didn't fuss about that either. I called the front desk several times, the first time being for more towels, she was rude and unfriendly when i made my request for towels, THAT NEVER CAME BY THE WAY.the second time i called i asked if there were towels at the pool area or if i should bring some from my room, i then was cut off by the front desk employee, with "towels are outside." *click!*
Manager Response: Dear lexxclc_,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. I am disappointed to know that you experienced discrepancies with receiving exceptional service. The experience you describe is certainly not inline with what we strive to provide our guests. Our front desk agents are trained on cleaning rooms and changing out linens on behalf of our guests in the event that housekeeping has left for the day. Nevertheless, I wanted to assure you that we have utilized your experience as a training platform for our team to ensure this does not reoccur in the future. We always want our guests to feel comfortable and welcomed and we know we missed the mark with you recently. We would love the opportunity to invite you back to experience the world-class service that our guests have grown so fond of and apologize for your last stay leaving much to be desired.Thank you for your compliments to the pool area as well as our accommodations. We truly hope to welcome you back for the exceptional stay you deserve.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Cleanest Hotel you will ever visit.
Summary: Staff is meticulous with cleaning. Facility is modest, but comfortable. Highly recommend it. Friendly and efficient Front Desk personnel.  Very convenient location in Irvine, that is not crowded. Rooms have efficiency kitchens that are good for snacks.   Breakfast is included and features a complete meal with eggs cooked to order.  Very good value for the rates they charge.
Manager Response: Dear Dexter W,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed our convenient location, friendly and efficient service, as well as our complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: few things to make it a better than average hotel
Summary: The hotel was clean and nice. Wifi work well. Here are a few things to take the hotel to the next level: 1) the morning breakfast was nice - the eggs were real! BUT, having the same thing everyday is a bit much. Do something different each day. 2) Attention to detail: TV clickers didn't work. I heard others mentioning the same thing. In addition, the mini-refrigerator was not working.  3) Room design: the king room was spacious, BUT there was not enough room between the bathroom door and vanity (see photo). This could have been corrected by either a sliding door or in the initial design, i.e. move the vanity 1 foot away and there would still be space for the wet bar on the opposite side of the wall.  Staff seemed friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Lenr694,  Thank you for your kind insight regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I am disappointed to see that there were a couple of design elements which hampered your stay and will absolutely bring these items to the attention of our design department to ensure we keep these in mind when looking to make changes in the future. We truly appreciate your compliments and recommendations to our delicious complimentary breakfast. We hope to welcome you back in the future for a five-star experience!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for a no frills stay in OC
Summary: The Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods is perfect if you are looking for a simple, no frills place to stay in Orange County. There are some serious plus points: 1. Bed and linens are all good. 2. The rooms are large 3. The hotel and rooms are well kept, up-to-date and clean 4. Breakfast was simple but decent (the staff were helpful and happy)  The only bad thing was the wi-fi which kept dropping connection - it drove me nuts.  But, if you are looking for a memorable experience the Ayres Hotel is not the place to go - it is more for budget travellers. I will definitely stay there again when I am on a business trip.
Manager Response: Dear BertBantham,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent experience at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed your time with us and found our accommodations well-kept, large, and comfortable. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: The hotel room was roomy enough for me to be able to work there with the use of microwave and sink for lunches and snacks.  There was a comfortable sofa in place to watch tv in.  The bed was sufficient and the location was convenient to my husband’s company but a little further from high end restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Mary B,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your experience at our hotel. Although I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your time with us overall, I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back for the five-star experience you deserve. Thank you nevertheless for your compliments to our spacious and well-appointed accommodations.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Wonderful hotel!  The room was very clean, spacious and the beds were very comfortable.  The water pressure in the shower could be a little better, but I survived!  The breakfast was fantastic and fresh!  The breakfast room was very big and there was room for everyone.  AND, every evening there were fresh baked cookies for everyone to enjoy!
Manager Response: Dear Colleen F,  Thank you for your excellent rating of the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our spacious and clean accommodations, comfortable beds, along with our fresh breakfast. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: This hotel has a eclectic European type vibe.  It's small but not cluttered.  The rooms are nice size and the linen is not cheap.  It's right across the street from Stater Bros supermarket.  There are small restaurants in the same lot as the hotel (stay away from the Home Town Buffet).
Manager Response: Dear Fairydust777,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed our ambiance and overall layout. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed There For Our Son’s Wedding
Summary: We enjoyed a wonderful stay at this boutique hotel for five days. We greatly enjoyed their hospitality. On Wednesday and Thursday they had beer, wine, and soft drinks, various kinds of pizza, and snacks for free for hotel guests. The employees were all very kind and did everything they could to help us. Their patio, pool, and hot tub area was relaxing and beautiful with lots of flowers and fountains. I definitely recommend this hotel for your future stay.
Manager Response: Dear Carol M,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our well-appointed accommodations, along with the personalized service we offer our valued guests. Congratulations to your son on his recent nuptials and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Great home base during our recent move to Laguna Woods
Summary: We have stayed here twice, 3 nights the first time, 8 nights the second.   This hotel was such a sanctuary to come back to every night during our relocation.  Each day we thoroughly enjoyed the breakfast especially seeing and chatting with the breakfast staff, Alex and Fabiola.  They made our day!  My husband is in a wheelchair and both were always willing to help him out.  The facilities were very accessible and 6 handicapped parking places are provided (2 have charging stations).  The rooms are clean, a nice size and quiet.  The social hour each evening was a nice touch with beer, wine and chips/snacks and Wednesday pizza nights were a hit.    Because I now live Laguna Woods, I probably won’t be staying here again but I will direct any out of town visitors to the Ayers Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Carol M,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am delighted to see that you enjoyed everything about your stay, including our complimentary breakfast, evening reception, exceptional service, along with our convenient amenities. We truly appreciate your compliments and personal recommendations and hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: A Total Gem - And That Breakfast!!!
Summary: That breakfast! This is a wonderful hotel, but its important to manage your expectations. When I booked it I thought it was in some kind of remote or woodsy location, or some out-of-the-way bucolic area. It is not. Following directions in WAZE we pulled into what I thought was an upscale shopping mall. Very disappointed, there sat the hotel. It looked great but the location was not what I expected. Once we got inside, I began to understand what this place really is - an oasis. This may be unfair to the hotel, but if you look at it as a chain hotel on luxury steroids, I think you get the picture. Everything about the place is generous. We got a great deal through hotels.com ($128 total) and at that price and for the luxury this place offers, I would never stay at an $80 chain
Manager Response: Dear Jupiter M,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to share your detailed review with us! We sincerely appreciate all of your kind compliments and recommendations about our hotel and team members. It is always wonderful to know that we are providing an unforgettable experience as it makes it worthwhile for all of us here at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. Seems like you had the opportunity to experience all of the wonderful amenities that we have to offer for all of our valued guests. We are absolutely proud of our team members for always striving to provide you with the unforgettable experience that you deserve. Please come back soon when you are in the area for another remarkable stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Let me start by giving all the employees a shoutout! Customer service is always amazing and theyre so nice. They make you feel very welcomed.Ive been coming to this place for some time and til this day its hard to leave the hotel. I highly recommend this place if your trying to stay out in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear JustKoyi,  Thank you kindly for your wonderful review! We truly appreciate your thoughtful compliments regarding our hotel and team members. We are proud to have a world-class team that is always willing to go above and beyond to accommodate our valued guests with an exceptional stay. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another remarkable time!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Stayed at Ayres Laguna Woods for 3 nights.  Arrived on a Thursday, departed on a Sunday.  I have stayed a Ayres Anaheim many times so I can compared the two.  Check in was easy, I had 3 rooms for my family.  The rooms are nicely appointed and clean.  Beds are comfortable for our taste.  Monday thru Thursday they have a Managers Social from 5-7p with beer, wine, cheese, vegetables, cookies(all free).   Every morning is free breakfast with omelettes Monday-Friday & eggs to order everyday, bacon one day, sausage the next, potatoes, waffles, pancakes, cereal, fruit; all of which is very good.  The cooking staff is friendly.  The only drawback was that the refrig in room was very noisy when turning off, waking me all night(there was no compensation offered like other hotels).  And
Manager Response: Dear TusconTraveller2,  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful review with us. Thank you for being such a valuable and loyal guest to Ayres Hotels. We are glad to see that you have enjoyed your time with us at both of the locations and that we had the pleasure of welcoming you to. It is always a pleasure to accommodate you and your family for a wonderful stay. Your feedback is taken very seriously and is very valuable to us. Our management will further investigate to ensure the matter is resolved in efforts to create an unforgettable experience every time you visit. We thank you again, and look forward to welcoming you back for another stay nothing less than exceptional!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel because of the close proximity to my meetings. I had passed this hotel so many times and dismissed it thinking it was not high end enough for my taste level. Wow, was I wrong.  My room was newly renovated, the beds and bedding as good as any 5 star hotel. The hotel quiet, nice fireplace in the lobby, wine and beer in the afternoon.  An amazing omelet made by Alex. The complimentary breakfast delicious. I was over the top impressed by every staff member at this hotel.. I just flew in from New Orleans where I stayed at a 5 star Luxury hotel that was not as nice as this. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Lynda M,  We appreciate you taking time out of your day to share your kind review and star rating! With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in being able to not just meet but to exceed your expectations every time. It is absolutely wonderful to see that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations and convenient amenities. Your compliments are truly appreciated by all of us. Please come back soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Great property in the Newport Beach, CA area . . .
Summary: I'd give this hotel a "two thumbs up" rating.  The rooms are clean, the pool and hot tub were phenomenal, throw in their great complementary breakfast and complementary happy hour and a very reasonable room rate, and you've got a great combination.  I recommend it highly and would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Mndieringer,  We appreciate your thoughtful review and star rating! It is delightful to know that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations and delicious complimentary breakfast. Your kind words regarding our hotel are truly appreciated by all of us. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to seeing you back soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We stayed here by the beach and really enjoyed the community and our hotel stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable and staff was very helpful and friendly. We had breakfast and it was very good. It was the most expensive of all the hotels we stated during our vacation but a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Wgen,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review with us! It is with great pleasure to have been able to welcome you for a very enjoyable stay. We appreciate your compliments regarding our top-notch accommodations and exceptional service. We hope to welcome you back soon for another phenomenal experience!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: On a family trip to Southern California, I recently stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods. It’s a pleasant place with clean, spacious rooms, a welcoming lobby, and well-tended grounds. Décor consists mainly of high quality photos of the flora and fauna of the nearby coastline. There’s a small fitness center and a year-around outdoor pool (it’s heated, but the water’s still pretty cold). A breakfast room with standard fare. No in-house restaurant per se, but you can find a lot of them in the area. An obliging staff. Bottom line: recommended.
Manager Response: Dear RGinCT,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! It is wonderful to see that we had the opportunity to accommodate with an unforgettable experience. We sincerely appreciate your compliments regarding our hotel decor and exceptional service. I look forward to welcoming you back soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We've only had good luck with staying at Ayres hotels in southern California. We especially appreciate the Ayres accommodations in Laguna Woods when we're visiting family in the area. The rooms are well appointed, spacious, clean, and quiet. The complimentary breakfast is very nice.
Manager Response: Dear DouglasJones2018,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful review for your most recent stay with us! It is always a pleasure to accommodate you with a remarkable stay while you visit your loved ones. We appreciate your kind words and compliments about our hotel and team members. Please come back soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: The Ayres was a very convenient location for my stay. The room was very comfortable, clean, and quiet.  I was on the top floor facing the pool. The front desk staff was helpful and courteous. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear KK H,  Thank you for taking the time to share you wonderful experience regarding your most recent stay with us! It is with great pleasure to have been able to accommodate you with a comfortable stay. Your kind words and compliments about our hotel and team members are very much appreciated. We thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you back soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Clean Rooms and Friendly Staff But Too Much Noise From Other Rooms
Summary: This was our first stime staying at this Ayres location.  Based on the good reviews here and great stays at other Ayres (Anaheim) we booked this hotel for a business trip.  The room was clean and comfortable and they allowed us to check in early.  The biggest disappointment however is the lack of sound proofing between rooms.  The neighbor above us was up at odd hours during the night doing something that can only be akin to aerobics at 12 am and 3 a.m.  Lots of movement and what sounded like stomping back and forth.  Not ideal to get a bad night's sleep before an important business meeting.  Because of the sound issues, we would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kittesq,  Thank you for taking the time to share your candid review with us concerning your recent stay. It is unfortunate to see that we were unable to exceed your expectations. This is not acceptable for any of our valued guests. For this we send our sincerest apologies. We will address your feedback with management to ensure we are doing everything within our power to deliver an exceptional experience each time you visit us. We hope this does not discourage you from returning from the exceptional stay that you deserve.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I started a new assignment in Irvine Ca. I needed a temp place to stay every week for a while. I did not want to pay the crazy high price in Irvine so I looked around and found theAyres hotel in Laguna Woods. It is a 12mile drive but manageable.  This hotel offers free breakfast, free parking, (for e cars too), free WiFi, a freshly add cookies :) A good value !!

We had a wonderful experience during our 3-night stay. The rooms were comfortable, the breakfasts enjoyable, and the outdoor areas perfect for lounging, eating breakfast, and meeting up with friends. Proximity to downtown was great, especially the Pageant of the Masters. Most of all, we appreciated the attentiveness of the staff.  After we returned home I had a question about their amenities and, to my delight, my questions were researched and answered by Jim Kirby and Tia Mireles. They went out of their way to help me, and I can’t thank them enough.

Second time I and my family have stayed there. The rooms are very nice...clean and classy decor. Most of the staff are very friendly. We especially like the breakfast and happy hour. Although they were closing up after happy hour, they let us stay and chat rather than asking us to leave. We appreciated that because we were saying goodbye to family.
Manager Response: Hello TravelingFriends2015,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review with us! We truly appreciate your loyalty to Ayres Hotels and are delighted to see that you enjoyed another stay with us. It is with great pleasure to have been to accommodate you with a comfortable and warm stay. We hope to welcome you back soon for another exceptional experience.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, with a very good breakfast. Good location
Summary: This is a very nice hotel in a beautiful city of Laguna Woods. The hotel is clean, conveniently located just minutes from Laguna Beach. Pros: People serving breakfast in the kitchen is what I liked the most and those people are probably the best asset of the hotel.They really made us feel welcomed. Breakfast is very good, they are cooking omelets and fried eggs in front of you, nice fresh fruits, real butter and a variety of actually good bread. Room is nice and clean. Bed and the pillows are also good. Location is good, 10 min driving for Laguna Beach and 45 min driving for LA (not at rush hours). Pool and Jacuzzi are clean and we loved to have our breakfast outside on the patio.  Cons: reception people. Not only they were not helping with any of the questions (after 2 days of

Never stayed at an Ayres property.  It was fine.  The furniture in the room was dated.   Did not get housekeeping service even though she saw us leaving the room.  We stayed for a wedding nearby.  Not sure why you’d pick this location otherwise as it really isn’t near many points of interest.  Complimentary breakfast is offered.
Manager Response: Dear Eljuezcubano,  Thank you for taking the time to share your candid review with us. It is unfortunate to see that we were unable to exceed your expectations during your most recent stay. For this, we hope you accept our most sincere apologies for the inconveniences you endured. Rest assured, we will address your feedback and concerns with our team members to ensure the necessary adjustments are made. We hope you allow us the opportunity to welcome you back for the exceptional stay that you deserve.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Love this location and the staff and everything else about this hotel. We moved and needed a place for a couple days while our house was packed and unpacked. The Ayres is convenient to Laguna Woods and also to Laguna Beach. The beach is just 5 miles away. The bed was super comfy. Breakfast includes a made to order omelette. There’s even electric vehicle charging. What’s not to love.
Manager Response: Dear Mariann K,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful review with us! We are pleased to see that we were able to provide you with a warm and welcoming stay and we hope to see you back soon for another exceptional experience.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: So so reasonable and the best breakfast...
Summary: We opted to stay here when we came down for Pageant of the Masters. The price we found on Expedia (Sorry) was SO GOOD and I had some points to apply which brought the price down even further. Our room was a corner room, lots of light, very clean...in fact so clean that room smelled like soap, disinfectant...we were directly across from housekeeping and mentioned it to them...but it didn't seem to abate and no adjustment was made to our bill after I mentioned it. My husband didn't notice it. But it bothered me a bit. The staff behind the counter was not terribly gracious. The staff at breakfast was lovely! And so was the food! Made to order omelettes. Good coffee, pancakes...yogurt, really fresh beautiful fruit...seating outside by the pool (also lovely). Now that's a breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear Suanne S,  Thank you for your star rating and wonderful review concerning your stay! It thrills us to see that you had the opportunity to enjoy our excellent room accommodations and amenities. We addressed your feedback regarding the smell of the room and, rest assured, we have made the necessary changes. Nevertheless, your compliments and recommendations regarding our complimentary breakfast are very generous and appreciated. We thank you again and we hope to welcome you back soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely place to stay - challenging if you do not have a car
Summary: Stayed here recently on a recommendation from a colleague.  Our California offices are approx 10 minutes drive away.    Very nice Hotel for the price, excellent service.  Would absolutely stay here again.  As per the title, if you do not have a car you will be using Uber a lot, there are a few places to eat locally but very basic.  However, within 10 minutes drive lots of options.

Summary Heading: Our favorite hotel in the area
Summary: We have stayed already twice at this hotel and there will be many more! We love it so much!  The staff is very helpful and serving and the hotel is new, beautifully decorated, the rooms are big, clean, comfortable and quiet. Breakfast is included and parking complimentary so you get a great deal. It has a very beautiful pool area. You won’t be disappointed
Manager Response: Dear SaraAntonLargo,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you found our guestrooms to be comfortable and have returned to stay with us for a second time. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: One night stay for a friend’s wedding nearby
Summary: The Ayres was solid, nothing spectacular but very clean, comfortable and well-managed. The two things keeping it from a 5 star rating in my mind:  1) at $260 for one night (Saturday), it was pricey. I always rate hotels and restaurants in the context of their price. So i could give two different hotels five stars even though one is $125 per night and the other $900 / night. It’s all relative. The Ayres Laguna Woods is a great hotel at its typical $150 rate, especially when considering breakfast, WiFi and Parking are all included. At $260, the bar is raised.   2) minor negative Check-in experience. Room wasn’t ready, and that’s fine because it wasn’t 3 PM yet. Issue was that the expectation was set it would be ready in 15-20 minutes. And it wasn’t, which again I can be patient

Not sure fully what to expect. The reviews were mixed. I researched the area for safety and proximity to an art event in Laguna Beach. We were greeted by 2 of the friendliest front desk staff we've ever met. The room was amazing. The hotel clean and fresh. Plenty of parking and close to amenities.  At our event in Laguna we had dinner with a couple who stayed on the beach so they could walk to the event. $400 for a cramped room, an even smaller shower and the walk was not as easy as they thought. We had twice the room for half the price and it included breakfast. Only a 20 min drive to Pageant of the Masters in heavy traffic. Our first time staying at an Ayres property and not our last.

I really enjoyed my stay here. The room was clean and matched online pictures. The breakfast buffet is too notch with friendly staff, eggs prepared as you wish and the feeling they are keeping everything clean. The courtyard is enjoyable with the water fountain and shade overhead.
Manager Response: Dear Badgercity2018,  Thank you for your star rating and candid review! We have worked diligently to provide our guests with the most up to date pictures of our property. it is satisfying to see that we were able to offer you a very enjoyable time from our breakfast buffet to our astonishing architecture. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We only stayed one night here but I honestly wish we’d been able to stay more. This is a real hidden gem in a quiet Laguna Woods neighborhood. The room was spotlessly clean and bed very comfortable. In the evening they had snacks and drinks, including wine and beer. We got lucky and it was pizza night. If that’s not enough for you the are restaurants and a nice grocery store in walking distance. Breakfast the next morning was even better! A full omelette bar, the usual buffet items and fresh made waffles. I will definitely stay here again when in the area!

We've stayed at this hotel several times and put up visitors here several times. By far the best breakfast of any hotel I've ever stayed at. Custom made omelets to die for. Rooms are spacious and have microwaves and small refrigerators. Mike's Subs is a short walk and sushi, pizza and Subway across the street. Free parking. Nice pool and great staff. Discounts for Laguna Woods Village residents and AAA. OC bus service on El Toro Road to Laguna Beach--about 8 miles away. Walking and running trails nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Mike B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, your compliments and recommendations are most appreciated. We are very thrilled to see that you were able to enjoy and experience the pleasant accommodations that we have to offer for our valued guests. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay soon.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Having stayed here before we knew it was a great hotel, we did stay here this time for a reason as the breakfast was ideal for what we needed this trip. As always the room was clean and comfortable, the staff were helpful and the happy hour and the breakfast was great. Definitely would recommend staying here and look forward to our third stay
Manager Response: Dear Ashley B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Nothing thrills us more than to see that we were able to exceed your expectations by providing you with a warm and memorable stay. We appreciate your loyalty and we look forward to your return for another exceptional stay.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Hotel is business oriented and located within the boundaries of a huge seniors complex. I was nanny to probably the only child on the property this week, but we were treated very well.  We were lucky enough to have a ground floor room facing the lovely courtyard. We had two beds; microwave/fridge/bar sink; dining table for two; work desk; tv console with 3 wardrobe drawers; and a closet for hanging garments. And there were adequate AC/USB outlets for a business traveler and her tech geek nanny. Wif is very good.  Furnishings were unpretentious, but very good quality. I actually crawled under the desk chair to find the brand because it had such good back support. Attention seems to be directed toward comfort and convenience more than flash. We were repeatedly surprised by the

Really loved my stay here. The room was clean, spacious, quiet, comfortable...what more can you ask for? Well, how about an extra special breakfast? The very friendly chef prepared eggs to according to my wishes (although it seems that there might be only a couple of options like scrambled, over easy, over hard, etc.) served with sausage and potatoes, waffles, several types of juice, fruit, yogurt, bread and muffins and English muffins...I'm sure there was more but I am not sure what it could have been! We didn't use the exercise room nor pool but it looked heavenly. The location was great for my purposes with some shopping and grocery stores close by. The front desk people were helpful but seemed a little uppity. That is my only thought for improvement.

I checked the reviews before booking, but was disappointed. The reception on Thursday 3/29 afternoon was very unfriendly, though fast.    Hotel looks okay in the picture, but this was definitely an old hotel similar to Best Western around South County. But clean, spacious, with fridge, microwave, a dining table with 2 chairs and a drsk with good cushioned chair. Beds were hard mattress.   Breakfast was an upgrade wirh made-to-order egg station. But nothing fancy. Omelette was available weekdays but not weekends. Fried egg and sausage sandwich this morning was adequate.   Gym was okay. Wet wipes were dry, never checked. Stationary bikes did not turn on.   Overall, a good hotel, but would not have given them higher thsn 3 stars.
Manager Response: Dear tjandra1,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your candid review. We regret to see that your stay did not meet your expectations. We deeply apologize for the inconveniences you faced throughout your stay and please rest assured that we will utilize your constructive feedback as a tool to make corrections wherever necessary. We hope you allow us to welcome you back for another stay that will be nothing less than exceptional.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: As business travelers,, we enjoyed this hotel, it was nice and clean and the people were friendly. Also for us it was conveniently located--not in the dead center of things but equidistant to all the places we needed to go.

Convenient location, excellent free breakfast, friendly staff, rooms are modern natural calming decor. No noise between rooms but soundproofing between floors could have been better. Sink and mini-fridge in each room.

This hotel had generous rooms, was clean and modern. The lobby and shaded pool area had comfortable areas to relax and visit in groups. They would have earned a 5 except for one thing. Whatever cleaner they use had a strong lingering odor that was hard on sensitive folks. We had to leave the windows open the entire time to cope with it, which would not be possible if you had children with you because there are no screens on the windows. Buy bottled water across the street at the grocery to avoid spending $2.50 a bottle at hotel.
Manager Response: Dear PsItravel,  Thank you for your wonderful review and rating. I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed our clean and modern accommodations, along with our shaded pool area. I warmly welcome and appreciate your insight into your stay and hope we are able to welcome you back soon for a more enjoyable experience.   Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at The Ayres Hotel for several years because it’s wonderful! The rooms are spacious, up-to-date, and clean, and the staff is warm and hospitable. Special touches like the cocktails and snacks at five, available newspapers, delicious breakfast, swimming pool and hot tub make the visit relaxing. I greatly enjoy the tranquil courtyard area near the pool. To sum up, The Ayers Hotel is highly recommended!

We stayed at the hotel for a few nights while it was super hot here in so cal.  It was Too hot for me to even go outside to use the pool.  Breakfast was good, omelette bar, waffles, etc.  they also offer happy hour during the weekdays, a drink or two with chips and salsa.  Pool was not big, but it's not a big hotel.  Room was a decent size, fridge, microwave, desk and small eating table.  Really overall very nice!
Manager Response: Dear mommymeow,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with this review! Our happy hour is definitely a favorite among our guests and we are delighted to see that you enjoyed it. We are glad we were able to provide you with such a welcoming stay and that you found our accommodations to be pleasant. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: My group of 18 friends stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods as our base for the Laguna Festival of the Arts and Pageant of the Masters. It's about five miles up the canyon from the main Festival grounds and Sawdust Festival in Laguna Beach. (Takes about 15 minutes to get there from the hotel) It's a clean, quiet, comfortable business hotel with a family feel. Rooms are spacious and well appointed, the managers wine and beer happy hour from 5-7 every evening is a perfect gathering place. We ordered Pizza Amore to be delivered poolside to go with our wine and had a relaxed time outdoors. The staff is courteous, professional and well-organized for groups arriving on a motor coach. Even though it is located in a strip mall complex and not on the beach, once you are inside you feel like

Had a quick stop in OC.  Managed to get a corner room which was spacious and pleasant with plenty of seats and space for working etc.  Check in and staff were friendly and professional, parking was easy.  They have a small but reasonably well-equipped gym and an exterior pool - but too small for lap swimming.  Saw some people here with kids.  Strange... I wouldn't call this a family or resort hotel.    The comp. breakfast was very good.  A lot of choices.  A chef was actually making fresh omelets!     A good experience overall.
Manager Response: Dear T S,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review following your most recent stay! We are happy to know that you had such a wonderful stay with us and that you were able to enjoy all of our amenities, including our complimentary breakfast. We look forward to your next visit to the area so we may provide you with another enjoyable experience.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Here on business, recommended by client. But actually not near client at all. Very pleasant hotel, but all the other reviews appear "over the top". Nothing extraordinary, staff did no more than others in the increasingly inhospitable "hospitality" industry. Somewhat isolated location if you come by UBER. Shopping center across the street, but cross at crossings, as you are covering 4+ lanes of California drivers. Large grocery store there and used the in-room microwave and refrigerator for quick meals. There might have been breakfast, but it stopped at 9am. My meeting was not until noon, so not racing to get breakfast that early. Net, net an OK choice in an area packed with hotels. John Wayne is a great alternative to LAX if working - visiting in this southern part of LA. Ayres

Summary Heading: In the midst of a family emergency these guys went above and beyond!
Summary: The rooms are immaculate and huge! Literally the BEST hotel I have ever stayed in even compared to resorts in Florida next to Disney in Florida. They didn't make enough stars for this hotel. The staff is above and beyond, they have such compassion I don't even have words. We came from Maine for my sister to have an open heart surgery and they helped us get our room and even helped us when we had an issue with my brother losing his room. If you stay here you will feel like family and then some. I didnt think people out here could be so nice but when I return for an actual vacation I'm booking this hotel. I haven't even stayed a full night yet at this point but I'm above and beyond satisfied. Keep up the phenomenal work!!!!!

I recently stayed here for a work trip and was really impressed.  The rooms are huge and clean.  The staff was really friendly and helpful. The lobby and common rooms are really pretty.  Free happy hour and free breakfast with made to order eggs and omelets.  It was fantastic.  The pool area was really nice I was able to get some work done outside in the lounge area.  The gym was small but had enough and a nice tv. Location of the hotel is great too. Very close to the beach and Irvine spectrum center which great for dinner and to pick up a few things.  Overall, I'm really glad I picked this hotel and would definitely stay again next time I'm in the area for work or vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Paige K,  Thank you for your excellent rating and detailed review! Our team strives to provide our guests with a wonderful and memorable experience and I am happy to know thar they were able to do so for you. I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We stayed there for 2 nights. The rooms were quite big, the beds comfy and its location with free parking and free WiFi was great. Breakfast was nice though it lacked any type of vegetables but other than that, a very nice place

Summary Heading: Clean and efficient, decor is a little strange...
Summary: Stayed here because we didn't bring the dogs this time. Clean and efficient, Decor isn't exactly old but certainly outdated. Not bad enough to ding as far as total rating. Clean, efficient and welcoming stay.

For years we stayed at Renaissance Club Sport in Aliso Viejo when visiting family there. But now we stay at the Ayres Hotel. You get so much more for your money--free parking, free FULL breakfast w Belgian waffles too!, a refrigerator, microwave oven w a small sink area, large room w free wifi and coffeemaker. Friendly staff and clean rooms. Close to everything including grocery store.  No onsite restaurant but you don't need it. Plenty of restaurants around.

Summary Heading: Consistency a good place in Laguna woods
Summary: Have stayed many times over the past few years during visits with family.   Breakfast is better then any other free breakfast I've ever had in hotels.  Desk staff are always professional and helpful.  Definitely will return
Manager Response: Dear Kellergirl,  I am pleased to see that our team was able to offer you a welcoming experience and that you enjoyed our complimentary full American breakfast. Thank you for your review and your continued loyalty to Ayres Hotels. We hope to be able to welcome you back very soon!  Joyfully,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Much better than Ayres Hotel in Mission Viejo
Summary: If you have a choice between the nearby Ayres Hotel in Mission Viejo and this one, definitely chose this one.  Compared to the rooms at the Ayres in Mission Viejo (the rooms at that property look like a low rent 19th century bordello), the rooms at this Ayres are fine. The rooms at the Laguna Woods property are spacious and well-appointed. The beds are okay, not as firm as they should be, but not awful either. The blackout curtains work appropriately to keep out the light of the parking lot (since basically all rooms overlook the parking lot - you are not here for the scenery). Best of all, this Ayres property is quiet, unlike the one in Mission Viejo where it sounds like a herd of elephants in your room when people walk down the narrow hallways at that property.  The night

I visited on a business trip recently and stayed here because it was close to my meetings. I would say that it is similar in quality to a Comfort Suites/Hilton Garden/Courtyard type of hotel. If you're a business traveler like myself, you notice that there is no bar, marginal breakfast, but a surprisingly decent gym. The rooms are fine, they just are a cut below a standard Marriott or Westin type of place. All that said, if I'm staying on my own dime, with a pack of kids, it's a pretty good value, and you won't feel ripped off.
Manager Response: Dear Christian_chan1,  Thank you for your candid review and rating. I am happy to see that our accommodations were comfortable and satisfying for you. We appreciate your recommendations in regards to the lack of an onsite bar and our complimentary full American breakfast. We will certainly look at making changes wherever necessary to ensure all guests enjoy a relaxing visit to our hotel. Thank you again for your review.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff, Hot Breakfast Served, Clean and Remodeld Rooms, Patio & Saltwater Pool
Summary: We stayed on the third floor in a double queen bed. The rooms were newly remodeled with a beautiful view of the saltwater pool and patio. For breakfast, the chefs cooked your eggs to order accompanied by potatoes, sausages and pancakes (kept hot). They also offer a wonderful waffle bar and bagels, fresh fruit, etc. Such a great value for the price! This is a family owned hotel and you can tell that people care about the guests and keep it well maintained. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Girlmn,  Thank you for your kind review and rating. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed our accommodations and complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Reasonable priced good hotel in Laguna
Summary: I was looking for a good place for a short overnight stay in Laguna. This worked fine. The breakfast buffet is better than most hotels offer. They had my Trip Advisor reservation rate under "federal employee" which I am not. After a few back and forth exchanges I convinced them that they need to honor the rate. They did and actually gave me an even better rate in the end.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff B,  I am pleased to see that our team was able to offer you a better rate than expected and that you enjoyed our complimentary full American breakfast. Thank you for your review and we hope to be able to welcome you back very soon.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: This is the third Ayers Hotel we have stayed in.  It did not disappoint.  Rooms are clean and spacious.  The beds are comfy.  Attention is paid to detail.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  Quite and safe place to stay.  Just wish they had a resturant on site though the breakfast was generous and varied especially as it is included in the price of the room.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne C.,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you three times at Ayres Hotels! We certainly hope you will return in the future at any of our 21 Southern California locations or, perhaps, our new resort in Paso Robles, California. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I was looking for someplace somewhat close to the beach (20-30 mins) that was both kind to my budget, but at the same time, a quality establishment. Check in was super smooth. My corner room 212 overlooked the parking lot and stores, so next time I'd try for a courtroom view. The room was also right over the electrical room which caused a lot of vibrations in the floor as well as some noise. Id gotten a great deal on the room though, so it wasn't worth complaining about for a single night.  The king room was very clean and well equipped. There was a nice sofa sleeper and a bar sink, both unexpected. The hotel is far enough from the street to not have traffic noise.   The courtyard was in bloom, making for a lovely place to eat breakfast. The buffet was above average. Ask for a
Manager Response: Dear Thewinsomewench,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you to our hotel. It is a delight to know that you encountered a smooth check-in/out experience and enjoyed our Deluxe Corner King accommodations, with the exception of the room location. Our exclusive complimentary full American breakfast is certainly an item that many of our guests appreciate and enjoy. I am thrilled to know this was the case for you! We hope to welcome you back sooner than later. We would love to accommodate you in a Deluxe King on the Courtyard side if available!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We stayed two nights here and we are so happy we did! Amazing staff, excellent rooms, extremely comfortable bed, and a wonderful breakfast. If you're looking for a great hotel, this is a definite one to check out! We will definitely return! I really liked the fact that there was no freeway noise. Absolutely a plus for us!

Short drive to businesses in the Irvine and Lake Forrest areas.  Nice breakfast and friendly staff. Bathroom floor was a bit unclean. Great wifi speed. Noises from hall and floor above easily make it in.
Manager Response: Dear Luis_turrialba,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to read of your enjoyment of our hotel and hope to welcome you back very soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: we visited this hotel for a few days with our daughters sports team.  the hotel was clean and well maintained.  breakfast was good and outdoor as well as indoor seating was available.    our team had a very early start on one of the days requiring us to leave before breakfast was served.  the staff was very accomidating and readily agreed to open breakfast early to accomodate our group.  i am in the hotel business and pay attention to details.  i would choose an ayres hotel again any time.
Manager Response: Dear Pete C,  Thank you for the kind feedback and generous rating of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am glad you enjoyed the cleanliness, hospitality, and unique atmosphere at our hotel. I am glad you are considering visiting us again in the future. Thank you for your time and kind insight.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: The room was spacious and clean, fantastic location, and breakfast was one of the best I have had for an included rate.  The gym was above average, the outside area with pool and spa was very nice, and the overall décor was very inviting.
Manager Response: Dear 93charles,  Thank you for the kind review and generous score of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I would like to invite you to visit us again soon for another fantastic stay! Thank you again for your wonderful review and rating.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Very nice, clean hotel with spacious rooms.  Staff was polite and helpful.  Free breakfast has a great added touch with made to order omelettes.  Easy to find about a quarter mile off freeway which made for a quiet environment..  Will definitely stay here again when in the area!
Manager Response: Dear 95maryo.  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods for your recent visit to the area. Your compliments on our friendly and helpful team members are deeply appreciated and we are delighted to see that you enjoyed our complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you back to our peaceful atmosphere soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel because we had passed by and we liked the quietness about it, is a beautiful hotel everything is nice the rooms are beautiful, we defenetly want to go back, it is very quiet and the service is awsome.
Manager Response: Dear Manuel T,  Thank you for your 5-star rating and wonderful feedback. We are delighted to have been a part of your nuptial celebration and hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Hotel accommodations were excellent. Rooms were cleaned daily, and amenities were plentiful. Continental breakfast every morning including omelettes made to order, and fresh juice and coffee. Professional Staff, heated spa, fitness room etc. Highly recommend staying at Ayres. Close to restaurants, bars and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Roderic C.,  Thank you for taking the time to review and rate your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. We appreciate your compliments to our team, accommodations, grounds, and thank yiou for your personal recommendation. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: A wonderful hotel! Very clean, comfortable bed and great made to order breakfast!!! I felt that we were at a resort not a hotel. The area is very nice with close by restaurants, shopping and much more. The hotel is only few minutes from the highway and about 10 minutes drive to Laguna beach. I just hope that my review doesn't affect the great prices they advertise!
Manager Response: Dear Ayman G,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods for your recent travel needs. It is always a pleasure to read when our guests had a wonderful time at our hotel. I would like to invite you to visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: This was my first time at this location, but this chain has never let me down!  We stayed here over the NY's holiday and it was perfect. Easy access for in/out, room was very spacious and breakfast was excellent. You can't go wrong with Ayres.
Manager Response: Dear JosepMarce,  Thank you for your outstanding compliments and wonderful rating. We appreciate your compliments and personal recommendation. Please do visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: While our stay was only 1 night, I could easily see myself being comfortable at this Hotel for a week. We simply needed a place to stay on Thanksgiving night since the family's house was full already and what a great find the Ayres of Laguna Woods was! VERY spacious room with vaulted ceilings that felt extra large.  Had a fridge, microwave and coffee pot and also an oversized tub with jets in it! Very conveniently located to shops and restaurants.  If you're a golfer I noticed a place next door.  Next trip to visit family we might just stay here whether the house is full or not. ;)
Manager Response: Dear Eric V.,  Thank you for your warm feedback and excellent rating of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am pleased that you found your room to be spacious and comfortable. I hope you and your family will be able to return soon. Thank you again for your review!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Loved this hotel!  Clean, quiet and spacious.
Summary: We had a corner room 263.  It was so spacious with a king bed and a couch that could make into a bed.  There is a mini fridge and microwave.  There is a small table and a desk.  The flat screen tv was nice and we had plenty of good channels.  We also had free wifi.  The breakfast was above average.  They would even cook you up an omelet it you wanted.  There were six of us and we ate outside by the pool.  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Conniemama,  Thank you for your detailed review and kind rating of our hotel. I am pleased to read that you enjoyed so much at our hotel and hope you will be able to visit us again soon. Thank you again for your review!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice--the best in the immediate area--but not outstanding
Summary: The hotel was nice, clean, good location and kind staff. But it wasn't all clean-clean--there were many things:mirrors, door handles, areas on carpets and windows, that seriously lacked cleanliness and needed better attention. The breakfast was buffet--but not great--eggs were dry, pastries were dry, pancakes pre-cooked and rather cold. I never got one 'good morning' or smile from anyone--not until I was a bit sad that no one said anything, and each and every time I smiled and then I'd say it first. If I walked into the reception area, heads were down looking at computer screens and such, and never looked up or even glanced to smile or say hello. I've been in hundreds of hotels (not an exaggeration) and I've always found a staff that is courteous and pleasant, really makes a
Manager Response: Dear Maria Italiana K.,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to the area. In regards to the sign posted on our property, please know there is no choice in posting this signage. Rather, these signs are required under California State Law; Proposition 65. By law, a warning must be given for listed chemicals unless exposure is low enough to pose no significant risk of cancer or is significantly below levels observed to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. You will see this exact signage at most, if not every, operating business in California with 10 or more employees present on a given day. Additionally, please know that any lack of exceptional service you received is certainly not tolerated and will be reviewed with our entire team to ensure we are truly going above and beyond for each guest we come into contact with. We hope to welcome you back in the future for a more relaxing stay. Thank you again for your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We had a beautiful king size room, very comfortable bed, and thoroughly enjoyed the place. The breakfast was excellent - specially made omelets, waffles, fresh fruit, and juices. The room was well kept and service people were helpful and efficient.
Manager Response: Dear Carol F.,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods and for lending us your wonderful feedback. We are delighted to know you enjoyed your stay and our complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Wedding Night  "Stay Away" Better option out there.
Summary: Let me start by saying we were looking forward to staying here as a part of our MiniMoon Geta way. Married just a couple blocks away we let our wedding and headed to hotel to get some rest and enjoy our wedding night. When we arrived the staff was helpful but did not seems genuinely happy. We went up to the first room were we were greeted by Beer Bottles, Sheet that were dirty, room was used. So we went back down to front desk.  Our room was changed but no apologies were given. Truly show me that the staff didn't truly care about there guest at all. I'll choose other hotels in the future and will let friends , family and the wedding venue uses them . To choose other venue that truly care about there customer.
Manager Response: Dear MattSuper,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your special occasion. First, allow us to formally congratulate you on your recent nuptials. Please accept our most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you experienced by being checked into a room not quite ready for guest use. While this is very inconvenient, please understand that this was an isolated incident and your feedback has been passed along to our entire team to ensure we are taking extra and necessary care when checking our guests in and out of their rooms. With that being said, we hope you reconsider returning in the future. We would love the opportunity to serve you with a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Thank you, nevertheless, for your candid insight.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: A great choice for budget minded near the beach
Summary: So we chose this place because we were heading to the cliff restaurant to listen to a particular band play. We checked out some hotels in Laguna Beach but they were much more expensive so we decided to stay here primarily due to the price. Let me get the negatives out-of-the-way. First you are not right near the beach and there is traffic on Laguna canyon road but it moves fairly quickly. Secondly we were on the bottom floor and every time someone turned on the shower or went to the bathroom in the room above us it was extremely loud!! I definitely would suggest bringing earplugs. Also the pool area is quite small and crowded but you don't go there for the pool. It also looked like there was another hotel being built right next-door and so our view was of construction. If you
Manager Response: Dear Boots279,  Thank you for your detailed feedback and fantastic rating of our hotel. I am happy to read that we fit your needs and you will consider returning to our hotel again. Thank you again for your time and wonderful insight.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: When I have to stay at corporate overnight they always put us up here and I have yet to be disappointed.  The beds are top notch the breakfast is a god send and free beer at night never hurts.  The staff goes out of there way to help and the place is kept in great shape.  If you really want to unwind I suggest kicking back on the back patio and having a cold beer.  I would stay here on my own dime and I would send friends.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Close to Beach Communities, at a Lower Price
Summary: Stayed one night and the hotel is Average/Good to Very Good. The first room I was given was musty and the front desk made the change quickly for another room also on the third floor. Hotel was clean and very quiet, another plus staying outside of the tourist areas in Laguna Beach that can get noisy and crowded on weekends. Breakfast was adequate to good, with a lot of variety, and was included in my room rate. Room was comfortable, beds comfortable, and had excellent lighting.
