Will stay at this hotel again when in the area. A good place to stop for the night going up or down the coast since minutes from the major north-south freeways. Short driving distance to beach communities, other sites.

Awesome hotel. Had a King suite courtyard. Nice room, clean, quiet, great breakfast. Beautiful facility. Took about 20 minutes to get to Salt Creek beach and 10 minutes to get to laguna beach. Traffic to Laguna Beach was really backed up at times but other times was an easy trip.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah K.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your relaxing stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. It is a pleasure to provide you with clean accommodations, complimentary full American breakfast, as well as a convenient location. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Spent 2 nights at this Ayres property in August. Very pleased with our room, which they upgraded because our king room was not ready when we checked in. Very large suite with full table and chairs and nice sized bathroom. Room was very clean, bed was really comfortable with nice weight of comforter. The whole property is well kept, nice outside patio area with tables, chairs and umbrellas right outside the cafe. The breakfast provided was really good. As others have mentioned, made to order breakfast on real plates, not paper. The chef was very pleasant, met us with a smile, didn't appear stressed although place was very busy. All of the staff were friendly and seem happy, which made for a nice experience. We usually stay at the larger chain hotels but we will definitely stay at
Manager Response: Dear Forgiven77,  Thank you for your kind compliments and your generous rating of the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am happy to read that you found your accommodations to be both clean and spacious. I do hope you will be able to visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at the Ayres hotel in Laguna Woods for 2 nights. This is the first time I stayed at this hotel. I must admit that I was blown away by its charm, its nice perks, and its at home feel.  It is tucked away far from the street and slightly up the slope to render it quiet and a bit secluded. Once you step inside you have a feeling that it is not like other national chain hotels. It's courtyard has a Mediterranean look which is quite charming. I had a deluxe 2 queen beds room. It is quite spacious with a desk, a table for 2, a wet bar with a microwave and a fridge. It is quite comfortable.  Full breakfasts with cooked to order eggs, waffles are included in the hotel rates as well as an early evening hors d'oeuvres with pizza and wines. The fitness center is moderate
Manager Response: Dear Jim A,  Thank you for your detailed feedback and for the great rating of our hotel. It is a pleasure to know that our distinctive style and exclusive amenities were something you enjoyed. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Nice place and family oriented  Friendly staff with can do attitude  Good breakfast  Nice room service, loved the rooms nice and spacious  Only minutes away from Laguna Beach and all major freeways  Loved the evening fresh cookies  Yum!
Manager Response: Dear Aman G.,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you recently. It is a pleasure to read of your enjoyment of our accommodations and amenities. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods is in a convenient location for work in Mission Viejo, Laguna Woods and the Spectrum  area of Irvine.  The hotel serves a great breakfast, with made to order omelletes.  Rooms are very comfortable, with great pilloes.
Manager Response: Dear Robert A,  Thank you for being a valued guest of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am happy to read that you found our hotel to be clean, welcoming, and convenient for your travel needs. Thank you for your time and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Stayed at Ayres with my husband for 7 nights and really enjoyed it!! I was in the area for business and my husband worked remote from the hotel. Room was clean and very comfortable!! We really enjoyed the delicious breakfast every morning and the cocktail social in the evenings! Staff was so friendly and recommended some nearby places to eat that were excellent!! I would definitely recommend this hotel and plan to return!!!
Manager Response: Dear TheVegasGirl,  Thank you for your kind words and the great rating of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. We are pleased to see that we have exceeded your expectations and do hope you will be able to visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: My family stayed here for two nights. We travelled up and down the coast of Southern California and this was our favorite hotel (out of the 5 we stayed in!) The room was spacious with two queen beds and kitchenette. The hotel offers complimentary breakfast from 6-9am with someone to make made to order omelettes. There is also a Happy Hour from 5-7pm where they offer pizza, chips, other snacks, beer, wine, and soft drinks at no additional cost. The cookies were DELICIOUS!!! Parking is free. The pool area was very nice and included a hot tub. The hotel was an easy drive to Laguna Beach (max 20 min.) We loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Adbrowder,  Many thanks for the kind words and generous rating of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. We are pleased to read that you and your family enjoyed the exclusive amenities available at our hotel. We hope to have left a lasting impression on you as we would love to welcome you back soon! Thank you again for your positive feedback.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: A clean place to stay but poor hospitality
Summary: I was the only customer when I entered the lobby. Two ladies were behind the desk. Neither looked up. Neither greeted me until I was at the desk. I walked to the desk and got their attention only when I was literally talking to them.  I said I had a reservation and the response was that since it was noon and check-in was 3 that there probably were no rooms. I responded that I had paid extra for the two rooms for early (11 a.m.) check-in. She found two rooms that were ready. My room happened to be the handicapped accessible room; there was a small strobe that fired every 5 seconds throughout the nite. At breakfast, there were so many people that they had run out of bread, rolls, bagels and there was no place to sit. We went to sit next to the pool and left as quickly as we could.
Manager Response: Dear ThingsINotice,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you during your recent visit to the area. Please accept my most sincere apologies for the lack of acknowledgment upon your arrival and for the inconveniences you faced with early check-in and your accommodations. We hope to welcome you back in the future to provide you with an exceptional stay.   Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: An average hotel room, could do with fresh paint and decor. The room was clean, the bed comfortable and the room airy however the breakfast was more like a summer camp affair. A very friendly man cooked eggs and there was plenty of pancakes and fried potatoes for the carbohydrate seeking surfer but otherwise a rather basically presented spread. For the price this was a rather disappointing stay.

I booked not only myself, but my entire wedding party for this hotel.  I paid for a total of 10 rooms for two nights and an additional 25 other guest booked their own reservations here.    We had a couple issues at the beginning when setting aside the room block that made me unhappy at the time, but we got past those and things went smoothly.    In addition to the rooms that I booked we also reserved one of the ball rooms for our rehearsal dinner the night before.  They did a great job and I was very pleased with everything.
Manager Response: Dear AK K.,  Many thanks for your kind feedback following your recent stay in Laguna Woods. It is a pleasure to know we were able to accommodate your party and remedy any inconsistencies you met when setting up your block of rooms. We hope to see you return in the future!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Half the price of Laguna Beach, This place really surprised me. Rooms are large, well appointed, comfortable with quiet A/C, Refrigerator, micro wave. Desks to work on, and a breakfast that is really awesome. Chef and all!!  Workout studio has free weights, working treadmills and mats. this is a great hotel with all the amenities of ones $100 more. I'll stay here again when passing through, By the way.... great sushi sashimi place across the street....
Manager Response: Dear Letsast,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods for your recent visit to Laguna Woods. I am happy to read that our in-room amenities met your expectations. I do hope we have made a lasting impression and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Nailbanger Here Again:I was booked into the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods by my Company for two nights.The Hotel itself is VERY NICE. I can't complain about anything. They offered a Shuttle to and from the Airport John Wayne, that was accommodating. Everyone was pleasant and helpful. The USA Today is free in the lobby of a morning. The Complimentary Breakfast is absolutely amazing. They offer pretty much what ever you can imagine for that type of setting.Eggs done your way and to order Waffle Pancake, Cottage fry`s Bacon one day and Sausage Patties the next,Fresh fruit whole and cut-up, Hot and cold cereal,Fresh Juice, Coffee the all the condiments,Pastries ,Donuts Bagels and on and on and on.You get the picture. You won't go hungry. Start promptly at 6 AM.Love ,Love,Love this place.
Manager Response: Dear PJ D,  Thank you for your kind words and for excellent rating of our Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. It looks like you have had a wonderful stay with us and we certainly hope you can return to visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely Hotel!  Too bad about the noise factor.
Summary: I would love to give this beautiful hotel an excellent rating.  It was in a great location, the room was very nice & the staff was outstanding.  Beautiful pool area.  Decent breakfast.  The problem is that there is virtually no soundproofing in this building.  When our neighbor took a shower in the morning, it sounded like he was showering in our room!  We also heard the droning of our neighbor's air conditioner half the night.  We turned ours off because it made such a horrendous noise, you couldn't sleep.   It's a shame that this beautiful hotel skimped on sound proofing their rooms.  It gets good marks in every other category.
Manager Response: Dear flycamas,  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to the area. I am disappointed to read that you found the noise level to be unsatisfactory. Please know that this is something we will take into account when improving our accommodations. Thank you again for your valuable feedback.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: One of the days during our trip we needed to stay halfway between San Diego and LA so we chose this hotel. The price was one of the best you could find for hotel at this level and the location was great for me. When I booked this hotel I wanted to be close to Laguna Beach but wasn't ready to pay the price for those beachfront hotels, so this one was perfect for us in terms of price and location(just 10 minutes). It is also very close to Irvine Spectrum mall which I love.  The hotel was going through renovation and we could smell the fresh paint in the hallway and all room numbers were put down - they probably painted the hallway that day. The smell didn't bother me too much. The bedroom was very roomy and bed was comfortable. We had a courtyard side room, so right outside our
Manager Response: Dear Traceyleea,  I am happy to read that our hotel was a great fit for your budget and location needs. Thank you for having an amazing attitude with us during our remodeling! I hope you will have the opportunity to visit us again soon after all the paint has dried. Thank you again and safe travels.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Great choice for both value & location.
Summary: We recently spent a week at the hotel.  We were visiting a family member who moved to the growing retirement community in Laguna Woods and wanted to be close by.  The room was comfortable, the pool area was great and a wonderful breakfast is included in the rate. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Momrish,  Thank you for being a loyal guest at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. I am delighted to read that we were able to be a home away from home for you as you visited family. It is a pleasure to know that you had a comfortable and enjoyable stay. I look forward to when you can visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Don't overlook this convenient quiet place to stay.
Summary: We have always enjoyed our stays (numerous) in spaciously, well-equipped rooms [sink, mini-refrigerator, & wifi], comfortable beds and ease of access. The breakfasts are exceptionally well prepared and varied. They have a happy hour and a shuttle to the Santa Ana airport. Located twenty minutes to the Laguna Beach, the setting comes with a hot tub and pool.

Dangerously slippery bathtub/shower combination.  Serious injury very possible.  Shampoo and conditioners are in plastic containers with edges sharp enough to shave.  No worthwhile restaurants within walking distance.  There is a Thai restaurant that serves bad food.
Manager Response: Dear Jim B,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am disappointed to read that you found our standard shower/tub combinations were dangerous. We can assure you that safety is our highest priority and will look into improvements regarding in-shower safety. Thank you for your review.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value, a mellow alternative to the hustle and bustle of the coastline area
Summary: Wasn't sure what to expect, the price was great, and location was about 5 miles inland from Laguna Beach.  The hotel is charming, our room was very "Westin like", and the breakfast was another nice surprise - eggs made to order, make it yourself waffles, yogurt, fruit, pretty much every breakfast item you could want was offered.  After spending the day at the beach amid the hustle and bustle of that area we enjoyed the peace and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Lori O,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful trip with us! I am glad you had a wonderful stay in Laguna Woods. I do hope you will be visiting us again soon. Thank you again for your time!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a few days. Was initially in a room by the laundry and it was so noisy in the morning I asked to move. Was put into a room that seemingly vibrated from some vent system the floor below. The rooms themselves were average, didn't really have a room with a good view of anything as far as I could tell. Probably will try another hotel in the area next time.

Had high expectations for this hotel looking at other reviews and this hotel exceeded them. Breakfast each morning was great and the staff attending was great too. Room was nice and clean and desk staff was very helpful. Would recommend

I stayed here for business travel. I was impressed with how clean  and comfortable the rooms were and the included breakfast had make it yourself waffles or someone was there making fresh made to order pancakes. I took my hearty breakfast outside in the cute outside courtyard by the pool and soaked up the California sun ! Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello Naome Bradshaw,  I am happy you were able to enjoy our hotel during your business trip to Laguna Woods. Thank you for your kind words and generous rating of our hotel. I do hope you will continue to visit us for both business and leisure.  Sincerely  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Great localization, service and spacious rooms.  It's very convenient as the hotel is located nearby one of the main freeways in California which can take you to other cities. As it is common in most of OC area, the neighborhood is very quiet too.
Manager Response: Dear Leosaito,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Every time I go home I stay at the Ayres in Laguna Woods.  The location is perfect.  5 minutes to my parents, 10 minutes to Laguna Beach and 5 minutes to the freeway.  Customer Service is always top notch.  Room are well cared for, nice designed and the staff is outstanding.  They have a huge gym which I love.  The food service staff is awesome!  I can't remember his name, but the gentleman who makes custom omelettes/eggs is always so gracious!  I love staying at the Ayres!
Manager Response: Hello Parisigirl,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods as your go-to hotel! I am delighted that we are held in such high regard by yourself as it seems we are your home-away-from-home. I agree with your kind compliments on our exceptional team and convenient location. I hope you will be visiting us again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: This chain of hotels in Southern California is hard to beat. The balance of cost, room quality, cleanliness and free breakfast are excellent. The staff is always helpful and friendly. I use the chain for all of my business trips to LA area. Even the gyms have new equipment.
Manager Response: Dear Mark T.,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your stay and for your high praise! I am delighted to know that we are our go-to when traveling for work. If you ever find yourself in the area for leisure, you know who to call!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: OK, in the global scheme of things this is a 4, but in terms of our satisfaction with it I'd call it a 5--lots of things to recommend it: nice "street appeal" with good lighting and landscaping at the entrance to the hotel; friendly staff (and fresh cookies) to greet us as we entered; large, comfortable room with great linens, very comfortable bed, large tv, refrigerator and even small sink; made to order omlets and waffles in the morning. What was the one glitch? At about 2AM we were awakened in our 2nd floor room by two guys talking and smoking on the patio of the room below us. They weren't loud, but it was 2AM for crying out loud! We asked opened the window and asked them politely to stop to no effect so called the front desk who successfully got them to go inside. No fault

This is a nice hotel, good location, excellent service.  Clean, spacious, and good value.  I don't always take advantage of the breakfast but when I do, it's always good.  They don't charge for parking.  I grew up in the area ad have families in the area but still prefer to stay here when I visit.

Friendly staff. Comfortable beds. Easy & delicious hot breakfast. I'll definitely stay here again. One of the best nights sleep I've had in a hotel in years. It was about a 15 minute easy drive from the airport.  Check in took about 10 minutes.

My husband frequently stays here for his business trips to nearby Research Drive, and the one thing that is frustrating about this hotel is that his phone calls to me will drop quite frequently. However, since we were there together, we could overlook that detail and stay in this nice property. We were disappointed that some of the old-world charm has been updated to a more modern look in the rooms, but there is still old-world charm in the lobby and pool areas. The breakfast is delicious, and it is in a good location for day-tripping. The front-desk staff was friendly.

I travel to this area for business once per year and the Ayres Hotel is always my preference, although it's so preferred, I sometimes have to opt for another.  The rooms are large,clean , beds comfy and quiet.  The breakfast is one of the best especially for this price range.  There is a cook who will even make you an omelette, if you wish.  I will always stay here if it's available.  You can't go wrong!
Manager Response: Dear Ronald E.,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write us such an excellent review. I am happy to see that you enjoyed our well-appointed accommodations and exclusive amenities. Our team works exceptionally hard to ensure each of our valued guests is receiving the service and accommodations we are known for. I am thrilled to read that you will continue to stay with us in the future!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel but Front Desk Staff Rude
Summary: I would have been very happy with this hotel, but for the front desk staff. After a grueling week involving the hospital stay of a family member, we were told that the rates were increasing. In fact, they were doubled because of  'the season'.  We made plans to move to another hotel, then heard the front desk staff quote a price increase of just $20 to an incoming customer. The staff member was aware of our situation and could have shown just an ounce of compassion.

The room was very spacious - one of the benefits of being in the country vs city. The fitness facilities were among the best I've ever seen at a hotel, and the pool was nice and big. We were pleasantly surprised by the breakfast: eggs and sausage or bacon, waffles, fresh fruit. And all this was included in the room price! We even liked the renaissance style art in the halls.

Just checked out of this hotel.  Excellent overall experience.  The free breakfast is much better than you standard Hampton Inn or Fairfield Inn.  As always its a little hectic at breakfast but overall a great value and the staff was great and aimed to please.  The rooms are a very nice size much bigger than the national chain hotels.  Very nicely decorated and a very good sleep.  Cannot say anything bad about the hotel.  Pkenty of well lit parking and a convenient location to the freeway.  A great place to make your base for your visit to the OC.  Good free wi fi as well !

I was so happy with what I got for what I paid.  They match prices found online, and it's a nice hotel in a nice location.  The mattress was so comfortable, the room was clean, the breakfast was awesome, the staff was friendly, and there was a microwave and mini-fridge in the room.  There was a pool and a hot tub that I will use next time.

Relaxing hotel conveniently close to family in Laguna Woods.  Comfortable rooms.  Attentive maid service.  Charming courtyard with a Mediterranean feel.  Paintings on the walls,  Cookies at the front desk in the evenings.  Complimentary breakfast service with great variety and with a cook who can take your orders.

I got this property for $77 on a Priceline Express deal.  Beautiful Property.  Room had a comfy bed with 4 pillows, both mircowave/fridge and a wet bar.  HDTV with lots of cable channels (including FS1 which I watched KC win game 6 for a trip to the World Series!).  Bathroom had sink area separate from the shower and had nice property.  Breakfast was good (had eggs and sausage and a bowl of fruit).  There is a HomeTown Buffet that is a 2 minute walk.

We stayed five nights at this hotel while visiting relatives.  It is an outstanding location, with friendly staff, large rooms and comfortable beds.  We especially enjoyed eating our breakfast outdoors on the patio while watching the hummingbirds bathe in the fountain.   The only suggestions I would make would be to have a better type of multi grain bread for those of us who like toast, oatmeal already made, instead of instant, and a way to take a larger amount of hot water to my table (a small insulated carafe?).  And I had to think really hard to come up with a suggestion! This place is great.

I might have given them a higher rating had they given me the room I requested, but because I made my reservation through a third party website they were less accommodating, and this was at their own admission. The fact that I could see that several of the rooms I request sat empty during my 2 day stay. I have to admit that the breakfast wasn't bad, but it is very obvious some people are easily impressed. I say this because in reading the reviews on this place many people rave about the breakfast, yes it is better than muffins and rolls other places call breakfast but all they do here is easy over fried eggs and sausage patties, not bad but hardly worth raving about. And to be quite honest I found the staff to be curt, starting with check in when they in no uncertain terms told

Summary Heading: A really terrific hotel at a great price
Summary: This hotel is an immaculate and classy place. Price is terrific considering how nice the place is. Decorated like a Holland America cruise ship with old world paintings, etc. Wonderful complimentary hot breakfast. Salt water pool. Free hot cookies. Comfy beds. Spa tubs in room.

My mom retired to Laguna Woods 7 years ago.  I visited her every other month and always stayed at the Ayres.  Everyone who worked there was extremely welcoming, and I looked forward to seeing them each time I came there.  In particular, the three staff members who provide the delicious breakfasts there are very special people.  They all have been there as long as I can remember.  This, in itself, is very unusual and suggests that the Ayres is doing something right that keeps their staff working there for many, many years.  I always received a bright smile from them each time I returned, and I truly felt that they went out of their way to make sure everything was fine and to my liking.  They are wonderful people, and because of people like them, I truly felt that the Ayres was my

We stayed in this hotel for 8 days and enjoyed every minute of it.  The maid always came at a time that was convenient to our travel plans.  Our room had plenty of towels and toiletries available.   My husband was on business and I had quite a nice vacation.  We chose this hotel because it was centrally located to all the things we wanted to do in our free time, including Laguna Beach, The Great Park, Whale Watching Cruise at Newport Beach, a day in LA, his classes in Irvine, Disneyland, and the San Diego Zoo.  The breakfasts were always delicious and the staff always friendly and ready to make our stay as comfortable as possible.  We stayed in one of the corner rooms which offered plenty of space and a nice view.  I love the décor of the rooms, hallways, and the lobby.  I would

This Ayers hotel has been a family favorite for the last 14 years.  The staff is exceptionally friendly and the rooms are attractive and well maintained.   The breakfast buffet is served by a delightful staff that doles out great eggs, pancakes etc.      The hotel is not far from pricier Laguna Beach and though there is no restaurant service after breakfast , there are many restaurants in the area.       Recently there was a major renovation which caused some inconvenience but that appears to be finished now.

What type of business would accept reservations knowing "renovations" would take place leaving their guests without HOT WATER for the entire day?  Would you stay here?  I spoke to the General Manager who did not see this as a problem. I do. I will NEVER stay here again (I have stayed at Ayres many times)  Do your part & boycott this chain. Since they don't care about their customers why do business with them?  SHAME ON YOU!!!
Manager Response: Dear Local_Resident3,  I appreciate the vital feedback you have provided us with as it allow us to make improvements where necessary. I can assure you that our team does their due diligence of informing our valued guests of work being done at the hotel ahead of time. This step is quite important as it allows our valued guests plan accordingly. Please accept my most sincere apologies for failing to provide this information to you during your stay. Your loyalty means everything to us and I certainly hope that this isolated incident does not keep your from returning to our hotel or any hotel or resort in our collection. Thank you for taking the time out of your day to provide me with detailed insight concerning your stay. I truly hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Turning off water for the day tomorrow
Summary: After we left the hotel for the day with plans for staying an additional night --- signs went up stating that there will be no hot water tomorrow  Hmmmmmm I totally expected that my hotel stay would include both a bed AND a shower. Apparently that's not a reasonable expectation!  No offer of a refund........ Or a reduction.   It is very hot outside, and certainly not fair to the people who will be sitting by me on the plane tomorrow! 9:30-4:00 no hot water. Scares me to think how they will wash linens and dishes.
Manager Response: Dear Local_Resident3,  Please accept my most sincere apologies for failing to provide this information to you further in advance. We strive to provide excellence in guest service and accommodations and it seems we have dissatisfied a loyal guest. For that, I truly am sorry.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: What A Nice Place To Stay
Summary: From check-in to check-out, this was a wonderful experience.  The room was good-sized, and the beds were very comfortable.  The (free) breakfast served up something for just about anyone.  From fresh fruit to scrambled eggs with bacon or sausage, you can pick and choose.  The front desk was courteous and knowledgeable.  The housekeeping staff was quiet and efficient.  All in all, a great place to stay.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Place to Stay Any Time
Summary: This is the second Ayers Hotel we have stayed in, and I wish they were everywhere!  The  property is beautiful, and the rooms are very well decorated and appointed.  The beds and pillows are extremely comfortable.  We asked for a corner room, which was definitely worth it for the extra room.  ALL of the staff are extremely friendly.  We love the warm cookies in the evening, as well as the nice happy hour on weeknights.  And the full, hot breakfast in the morning is wonderful!  I would highly recommend this hotel chain and will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Hotel Under Signifiant (Noisy, Disruptive) Renovation - Terrible Stay
Summary: This is part of a continuing series of my impressions and experiences staying at various hotels and resorts while traveling to attend concerts worldwide. This stay was during my recent trip to Southern California in July 2105.  This review is for Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods.  Property: Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods Room Type/Class: (Room 214) Date: July 17 - July 19, 2015 Booking Source: Hotwire Overall Rating: 1/5 [Note: Score is totally subjective based on price, location, and comparison to "like" properties within same area and price range]  This was my first stay at the Ayers Hotel Laguna Woods.  I was traveling by car from Southern California to the Orange County area for business, and needed a hotel in the area for two nights - the first night to sleep after an 8+ hour drive and
Manager Response: Dear Rock-Subculture,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. We regret to read that your stay with us was anything  less than remarkable. Our team works exceedingly hard to ensure each of our guests has a comfortable and enjoyable stay. While we have recently undergone renovations, we were concerned to hear of your issues with the accommodations. We sincerely apologize for any difficulty this may have caused. Thank you once again for you insight and we hope that all of your future accommodations are comfortable and satisfying.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: The lobby is nicely decorated.  The hotel is very clean. Our room did not have the promised antique furnishings or resemble a European boutique hotel in any way. The bed was extremely hard/uncomfortable. Sitting on the patio for breakfast was unpleasant due to people being allowed to smoke. Cook to order breakfast meant scrambled eggs or pancakes--the potatoes and sausage patties were in warming trays. The food was good, but cooked to order was an overstatement. There were cereals, breads, etc. The fresh fruit was very good. Standard fare, overall. Don't expect much and you won't be disappointed. Not too far from the beach,  but lack of sleep (and bumper to bumper traffic) made it hard to enjoy. The Sawdust Festival in Laguna Beach was interesting.
Manager Response: Dear speechdiva,  Thank for taking the time to write a review as we appreciate your feedback. We sincerely apologize if our accommodations did not meet or exceed your expectations. We truly appreciate the insight you have provided as it allows us to make improvements where necessary. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: The Ayres hotels and suites are a Gem that I found , whenever I travel to California I only book with Ayres. Visited and stayed so far at three of the different Ayres hotels in Orange County California, they are all in top shape, clean , secure , elegant and family friendly . Management at the three different Ayres location  really deserve a Thank You note from loyal customers as me.
Manager Response: Dear Jchatila,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share some some feedback concerning your recent stay with us! Your kind words are greatly appreciated as we constantly strive to provide exceptional guest service and comfortable accommodations to each of our guests. We appreciate the time you took in writing this review and hope that you will continue to choose Ayres Hotels when traveling around California!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in June this year for 2 nights.  Everything about it was excellent, the beds were so comfortable, wifi was excellent and TV had all the channels we needed.  It was very clean throughout and also the bathroom was very nice and had nice amenities.  I've heard that the free ready to order breakfast was special, but each morning we either had to leave early, or else had an appointment elsewhere.  Maybe next time!  Also, the day we left, they were starting to redo the carpeting throughout the hallways, so next time it will be even nicer!
Manager Response: Dear deadendangel,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor informing fellow travelers about your recent experience at out hotel.We greatly appreciate your kind compliments and are pleased to see that you had an enjoyable stay. We look forward to welcoming you back for any future visits to the area!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Last minute hotel change....for the better!
Summary: After our confirmed reservation was erroneously cancelled by a different sold out Irvine hotel that shall remain nameless but offered us a fresh cookie and water bottle instead of a room, we were sent here. We arrived around midnight and it was like a breath of fresh air!  Areck (Spelling?) warmly greeted us and we were given a huge, updated room with soft beds and mini kitchen. Breakfast the next morning was another pleasant surprise with made to order eggs served by the friendliest gentleman!  Thank you Ayres Hotel for coming to the rescue!

What a wonderful hotel to stay in. Greate room. Comfortable beds. Clean and premier room. Great value for money. Fantastic and a good fitness center. Welcoming staff. Tasty breafast and walking distance to restaurants.  Thank you for giving me such a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Hyper_11,  Your kind compliments and wonderful feedback are warmly welcomed and deeply appreciated. We take great pride in our ability to provide exceptional guest service as well as offering competitive rates and great value. We are utterly thrilled and humbled to see that we were you best stay in California! We hope to see you again any time you are traveling to or through California!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I come to the Ayres each year for a conference and am always impressed. From the quality of the bedding to the warm and hospitable staff, the Ayres has the feel of a boutique hotel without the outrageous bill! Excellent complimentary breakfast and lovely decor throughout.

We stayed there on a Saturday night. The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable, the grounds are very European looking....loved the pool, the Jacuzzi and the outdoor fireplace. The complimentary breakfast was excellent, fresh and the selection was outstanding. Would definitely stay there again. We always have a nice time at whatever Ayers we stay in.

Summary Heading: Classy comfort without breaking the bank
Summary: From making the reservation to our stay here, we were comfortable, and relaxed. There are warm fresh cookies from 5-7 pm daily, along with a self serve complimentary soda, beer and wine happy hour. The breakfast is great, including a made to order omelette bar, waffles, and fresh fruit. Pool and hot tub both beautiful, outdoor sitting area with fireplace is very pretty, and rooms are spacious and beds comfortable.   Staff is accommodating and very pleasant. Everything is clean. We will be back the next time we visit family in the area.

This is a classy hotel and great for business travel. Comfortable beds, fitness, pool, and all you need.  The made to order omelette's are very good in the morning.  Plenty of places to eat within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear SalesDad,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review of our hotel based on your most recent stay. We are honored by your thoughtful compliments of our hotel; from it's elegance to the comfortable accommodations we have to offer. Thank you again for the feedback you have provided and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We view the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods as a home away from home. My parents live in Laguna Woods Village and after trying the "discomfort Inn" we found the Ayres! Great service, great breakfast, clean rooms and well maintained. My family gathered there this past weekend for a memorial service and they were very gracious, assisted us in many different ways and allowed us to just feel at home.  I would highly recommend this we are sad that so many people are figuring it out because they get sold out now!
Manager Response: Dear Sandi G,  We are much obliged for the wonderful feedback you have provided regarding our hotel and your most recent stay. Your loyalty is greatly appreciated and we are honored to be able to provide an environment that makes you feel at home. Your kind compliments in regards to the exceptional services we strive to provide are greatly appreciated and your recommendations of our hotel are sincerely treasured. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary Heading: Clogged Sinks and Terrible Customer Service.
Summary: Woke up to having both sinks clogged and filled up with a green sludge. I told the front desk of the problem before sitting down for breakfast. After breakfast we went back to the room to see that nothing had been done. I went back to the front desk and she called maintenance again. Didn't apologize even once. Her "fix" was to let us into another room so we could have the privilege of a working sink. Horrible experience.
Manager Response: Dear Imre B,  We regret to read that your stay at our hotel was anything less than exceptional. Please accept our most heartfelt apologies for the lack of enthusiastic service. Our team members aim to make our guests feel at home and it is truly displeasing to hear that we failed to show empathy for any inconveniences the issues at hand caused you. We thank you for bringing the matter to our attention in a timely manner, yet we are sincerely apologetic for having failed you by not providing the exceptional customer service we are know for. Please understand that these actions are completely out of character for our team members. Rest assured that we will be taking the necessary steps to ensure this does not happen again. Once again, please note that your experience was an isolated occurrence and management, as well as our team members, would value another opportunity to impress you. Thank you for your time in reviewing your stay.  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We visit this hotel once or twice a year for a week.  My daughter was less than 2 years old on her first visit, the hotel prepared her crib with clean sheet, and even milk for my little one at night.   She was sick, and the room keepers help clean up the mess so fast.   We really like their breakfast with lots of variety and daily special.   The happy hours offers free snacks, homemade cookies, wines and beers. Great time to chill as a family or with friends.
Manager Response: Dear Wong F,  Thank you kindly for the wonderful review you have written about your recent experience at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods! We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay and that our accommodations made you feel at home. It has been an honor providing you exceptional guest service and doing our very best to cater to your needs. Thank you for the amazing feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: We searched and searched for a hotel near our business event and came across this Ayres Hotel. We have never heard of them before. The hotel sits in a business center with a few restaurants. The decor is very Italian/European, including the Italian cypress outside. Our room was very pleasant, extremely clean and included a small refrigerator and coffeemaker. The bed was comfy, so much that we slept in very well. breakfast is a basic buffet, cold cereals, make-your-own waffles, eggs & bacon or you can request the cook to make your eggs custom. The breakfast room was very busy with visitors from all over and we enjoyed sitting out on the patio overlooking the pool. The staff bake cookies in the late afternoon, which welcomes you back. Excellent stay and we loved the price! The

We loved the comfortable beds. It is a great location, close to restaurants and stores. Very short drive to Laguna Beach. Their breakfast is awesome and so convenient. It was so nice to come downstairs and have a very satisfying breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Maritzanaso,  Thank you kindly for the wonderful review you have provided regarding your most recent stay at hotel! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay as well as the Ayres Dream Sleeper Mattress. Thank you so much for the wonderful review and the compliments you have shared, we truly hope to see you again very soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Rooms and particularly the bed was very comfortable with a work area, wet bar, fridge, large flat screen TV. The bathroom was adequate with a small bath and bath shower. All the hotels employees I met very extremely friendly and very professional and were only too happy to give directions and print of maps for restaurants and local points of interest.  Local to the hotel is a family style diner and across the road there is a fast food restaurant and a grocery store which could come in handy as the hotel does not have a restaurant or a bar. Just a short drive away are other eating options such as an Olive Garden and the excellent Kings Fish House. The hotel does host a weekday happy hour were beer, wine, soft drinks and a variety of light snacks are available free of charge.

We have stayed at this hotel for our last 4 annual vacations, and enjoyed every one.The relaxed European style suites us Brits.All the staff are really helpful and friendly.The buffet breakfast really sets you up for the day, with omelettes cooked whilst you wait by Alex. Vince the Gen mng greets you most mornings whilst pouring you a coffee and is happy to provide useful tips on local places to see and visit.The rooms are spacious and comfortable enough for 16 - 21 day vacation. We've always found the hotel to be clean and well maintained.The pool area is great with plenty of fresh towels on hand. The hotel is in a quiet  location, and It's only a short drive to the beach at Laguna and places of interest or just enjoying the Cali sun. We look forward to returning later this

I have really enjoyed staying at this hotel. As I was transitioning my job. I was commuting here every other week for about 3 months. The staff was friendly. The breakfast was always good. the pool and surrounding area is nice. within 10-15 minutes to the beach and mountain trails. Very convenient to food and shopping as well. Always clean!
Manager Response: Dear Ronald R,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor to inform fellow travelers about your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you kindly for the compliments you have shared regarding our friendly team members and our delicious and complimentary full American breakfast. We truly appreciate the feedback and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay with kids.  Good breakfast, large comfortable room with a divider between the beds, really outstanding fitness room.  Also, the location was very safe and quiet, and there were fresh warm cookies upon arrival.
Manager Response: Dear Marie K,  The team at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods kindly thanks you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay with us! We truly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you and your children enjoyed your stay. Thank you again for your kind compliments and we genuinely hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Very warm and inviting. we stayed here for Christmas of 2014 and the hotel was beautifully decorated.  The free Happy hour was a nice amenity you rarely find at other hotels.  The buffet breakfast went above and beyond with eggs made to order .. plenty of choices.. not your typical continental breakfast.    Our children loved the warm cookies in the evening.
Manager Response: Dear Lorie M,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay with us! It was a delight to welcome you back and to also read that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciated the kind compliments you have expressed concerning our complimentary full American breakfast. Once again, your feedback is appreciated and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: I frequent this hotel for business year round and they never disappoint! Staff is very kind and helpful, they will go out of their way to enhance your stay. Breakfast omelets are made to order, fruit is fresh. Free beer and wine happy hour 5-7 M-Th, Wednesday is pizza night. The entire hotel is tastefully decorated, and the rooms are the best part of the hotel. Beds are always comfortable and the custodian staff does a great job. They usually accommodate my stay in one of their larger rooms and it really feels like home. I've been staying at this hotel frequently for 3 years and I wouldn't stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Dear Sammy L,  Thank you very much for your candid review and for your loyalty to our hotel. It pleases us to hear that stay after stay we have not disappointed you. Thank you for your earnest words regarding our kind and helpful team members. We are pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy our complimentary appetizers along with beer and wine during our Manager's Reception. We truly appreciate the kind words you have shared about our decor and the accommodations we provided. Thank you once again for your review and we cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely, Jim Keeby  General Manger

Summary: The hotel is simply awesome. On the best hotels I've ever been. I missed a bar or restaurant in the hotel, but you can enjoy the free drinks in the evening (Happy hour from 5 to 7pm). Also we could enjoy the hot tub in the swimming pool area in December !
Manager Response: Dear fersolsan, Thank you kindly for your candid review. We truly appreciate the time you took to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. Your compliments in regards to our "simply awesome" hotel are very flattering. It is a great joy to hear you had such a wonderful experience and are glad you were able to indulge in our Manager Receptions. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary: Our recent stay at the Ayers hotel in Laguna Woods was absolutely fabulous. Our corner king sized room had every appointment one could wish for. I am a seasoned traveler and can honestly say this hotel is one of the best. The lobby and the breakfast room beautiful.  The breakfast buffet was  better than anything we have experienced an an American hotel. The hotel staff was excellent and very attentive to our needs. I will be back whenever I return to visit in  Laguna Woods.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara G,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay and for your compliments regarding our optimal location and friendly team members. We hope to serve you again soon!  Sincerely,   Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: After being dropped off by your lovely staff, wine on the patio after a busy day at school.  Great breakfasts, fabulous staff and delightful beds and rooms!  Who could ask for more?  I really feel pampered!  I love your exercise room too!  I use the bike every day I stay!
Manager Response: Dear Sue C,   Thank you kindly for your review and for choosing our hotel as your destination for your recent stay. We are filled with joy to hear that you found our property to be as accommodating and comfortable as your home. It is great to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations as well as provide exceptional customer service. Thank you again for your generous recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon.   Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary Heading: Always a great stay at the Ayers!
Summary: Love the fresh cooked breakfast and the rooms are always comfortable! I've stayed at several of these chains.The staff is always helpful and friendly. We used Lyft and they gave a coupon code for a free ride! Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear LuvPapillons,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. We are happy to hear that you were able to indulge in a few of our many complimentary amenities such as our delicious full American breakfast.  Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary: We stayed for one night to attend a nearby wedding.  We were thoroughly impressed by the hotel and the surrounding amenities.  They have a nice breakfast with eggs, waffles, cereal, juice and coffee to name a few.  The kids enjoyed the pool and I enjoyed the big comfy beds.   The lobby and the halls are well appointed with traditional furniture, paintings and big mirrors.  There is a sushi restaurant and a pizza joint across the street.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jim S,  Thank you so much for your generous recommendation. I am humbled to see that we have exceeded your expectation with our convenience of location and exceptional service! We hope to serve you again in the near future.   Sincerely,   Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: Was perfect location for Woman's church retreat. I was a guest on the retreat with New Life Community Church out of Norwalk, CA. They have had several woman's retreats there at this location. So it was easy to find. The meeting rooms are bright. The chairs are clean. I have an issue with cloth chairs as many facilities do not clean them.
Manager Response: Dear Willamina2014,   Thank you kindly for your review about your recent stay at our hotel and for choosing us as the host hotel for your special event! We're delighted to hear that your retreat was a success and that we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you again for your kind compliments and we to welcome you back for the next event!  Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary: This hotel is very well appointed with a friendly, helpful staff. It has great amenities and the location is well situated to take advantage of many South California sights. The furniture throughout the hotel is of high quality and it has a nice patio for afternoon drinks, or even to enjoy breakfast.  Speaking of breakfast; it is great. Everyday they have new specials and your eggs are cooked to order. Breakfast makes the man they say. I say breakfast goes a long way in making an hotel a pleasant experience. This is a great choice.
Manager Response: Dear MadMaxie40667,   Thank you for your thoughtful review regarding your recent stay here at our hotel! We truly appreciate your kind words in regards to our friendly and helpful team as well as our complimentary amenities that you were able to enjoy! Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary: The hotel has a very pleasant atmosphere. The staff was friendly and accomodating. We enjoyed the breakfast which had a nice variety of dishes on offer. The decor of the hotel is very lovely with a European feel which I enjoyed very much.
Manager Response: Dear SukieS,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review in regards to your recent stay at our hotel. We truly appreciate the feedback you had to share and are delighted to hear that you had such a pleasant experience at our hotel. Thank you again for your kind review and we hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary: unfortunately chk in was not good!  room was not ready and when I asked Chris for a discount  for our inconvience , he refused.  the 2 people at the desk at chk in were new and inexperienced. we've stayed there many times before and never had any problem but the current staff are not welcoming  rli
Manager Response: Dear Rochelle I,   Thank you kindly for sharing about your recent experience at our hotel. IN regards to your recent stay, I sincerely apologize for the issues that occurred during check in. Please know that this isolated incident is not typical of our service and that I have addressed this issue with our front desk team members to ensure that it does not occur again. We truly hope this does not deter your from returning to our hotel and would like to kindly encourage you to stay with us again. Thank you once again for your review.  Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General manager

Summary Heading: Classy Traditional Style, Lovely Outdoor Courtyard
Summary: This is an excellent hotel that is also a good value at certain times of year.  It is well kept and well staffed.  The Tuscan theme is carried out tastefully. The complementary full breakfast is far better than most and the courtyard area is attractive, quiet, comfortable and serves as a gathering place if your stay involves a larger group of friends/family.  I'd give it five stars except for one thing -- the very noticeable plumbing noise.  When someone in a neighboring room flushes a toilet or takes a shower, you're going to hear it.  Also, the built-in ac unit beneath the window looked like what I'd expect to find in an inexpensive motel, and the one in my most recent room was noisy.  Other than that, the hotel was very quiet.

I have stayed here numerous times over the past year, sometimes weeks at a time. It is clean, the staff is extremel cordial and the Breakfast is a great way to start the day off right. It is close to all types of restaurants and retail and only 20 minutes to the beach. Would recommend for family and business travelers.

I was getting a cold and needed to get away.  I am taking an income tax class and I was needing also a place to study quietly.  I did so and it helped to get away.  The breakfast was excellent and it was close to Home Town Buffet so on Saturday I didn't have to go off the hill there where Ayres Hotel and the Home Town Buffet are located in Laguna Hills.  I had a nice comfortable room where I could get the rest I needed.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but many issues if you use a wheelchair
Summary: This is a nice 3* property, that is quiet, clean, has a great full breakfast, comfortable beds, pleasant staff and most conveniences. If you have no mobility issues, this is a good choice right next door to Laguna Woods Village. However, if you are a traveler with mobility issues there are a number of negatives you should be aware of. First, the disabled room we were assigned was very small -- much smaller than the standard room next door. However, all of the disabled rooms have only 1 king size bed. Small room, king size bed, and mobility issues? Not a great combination. The size of the room made it difficult to navigate in a wheelchair and too cozy to have another person (a helper) in the room with the guest. Second, the shower is poorly designed and one wonders whether the
Manager Response: Dear AllyCat_10,   Thank you kindly for the candid feedback you have provided regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate your kind compliments in regards to our location and the amenities we provide, however sincerely apologize for failing to provide the comfortable and relaxing experience we are known for. Please know that we will certainly take your feedback into consideration and truly appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention. Once again, thank you so much for your candid review and we hope that we are able to improve upon your experience in the future.   Sincerely,   Jim Keeby General Manager

Summary: This Laguna Woods hotel is convenient to so many places. We were just 10 minutes from Laguna Beach and 10 minutes from the Irvine Spectrum. In addition, they have a delicious breakfast to start the day. We will definitely be back!

Summary Heading: Daugther's Family and Wedding Party Weekend!!!
Summary: The Ayres Hotel was the best place ever!! The people who work there are the BEST. The rooms and the outside area was beautiful, And you even get a full  breakfast. My daughter's wedding was Friday Night so the family and wedding party stayed there Thurs. and Friday night. Many of our guest also stayed there. Everyone Loved this place. We all plan on coming back just to stay for a get away.  I also want to thank Angie who took care of helping us out. She is the one who takes care of large groups. She was a great help!!!  Sandy
Manager Response: Dear Sam S,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor and we are so thrilled to hear about your successful stay with us! We take pride in the excellent service we provide for our guests and we are beyond ecstatic to hear you kind compliments regarding our team. I'm delighted that Angie was able to deliver excellent service and will certainly pass on your remarks. Thank you again for your feedback and we cannot wait to welcome you back.  Sincerely,   Jim Keeby  General Manager

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay - being in the area for a wedding.  Beds are comfortable (even the pillows aren't too bad) - quiet at night - and a one of a kind breakfast buffet.  Beautiful lobby where we sat to read and people watch.

We stay here every time we come to visit family in Ladera/Laguna/Irvine. It's a beautiful, super clean, very comfortable and really affordable hotel!  All of the Ayres hotels are similar and all are excellent value, quality and comfort. You can't find a spacious, beautifully decorated, quiet room that includes free wifi, microwave, refrigerator and full breakfast at this price!!  ($111 special per night for 2 queens) I highly recommend this hotel chain!! You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear VWagner2013,   Thank you so much for your generous recommendation and for choosing our hotel as your destination time and time again. We sincerely appreciate your compliments regarding our clean and comfortable rooms as well as our European inspired decor and ambiance. Thank you once again for your wonderful review and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Upon arrival, we were impressed with the elegance of the hotel, the friendliness of the front desk & staff. The buffet breakfast was outstanding. We were sleeping in on our last day when the phone rang at 7 A.M. We felt someone from our family may have been calling with some emergency bad news. By the time we got up, it was too late to answer the phone so we went back to bed. within a few minutes, the phone rang again and this time we were in time to answer. It was a robo call touting the many benefits of the Ayres hotel!!!!! While the breakfast buffet was great, we had to endure Fox news TV in the dining room with its right wing republican propaganda.
Manager Response: Dear Charlie A,   Thank you so much for your review and for choosing our hotel as your destination. We are beyond flattered with your kind compliments about our European inspired elegance as well as our American breakfast buffet. Please accept our most sincere apology for the wake-up call you received so early in the morning that took a toll on your slumber. I certainly empathize with your frustration of this disturbance and thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. Thank you again for your candid review and we hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Visiting from Canada,we thoroughly enjoyed our 4 days at this lovely hotel. A very spacious, comfortable room. The best "Breakfast included" I've ever had. A wide variety of choices and a cheerful chef, ready to prepare your eggs to order, and even blueberry pancakes one morning!We are outside every morning! As a musician, I loved the classical music in the elevator.What a nice touch. The location is a pretty and easy drive to the beach.Staff was helpful. There's a very good Thai restaurant across the parking lot. If we're ever in the area again we will happily stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda T,   Thank for taking the time to write such a generous review about your recent stay with us and we truly appreciate your feedback. I am delighted to see that you had a relaxing and enjoyable stay in our guest rooms and were able to enjoy our full American breakfast buffet. We cannot thank you enough for your wonderful compliments and cannot wait to welcome you back.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms. Very nice and helpful staff. Shuttle to and from John Wayne airport. Happy hour from 5-7 every night = free Bud/Bud Light, Wine from Nathans Vineyard, and Snacks. Laundry facilities. Thank you Ayres for a pleasant stay:)
Manager Response: Dear Timothy A,   Thank you very much for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you received nothing short of excellent service from our team members and were able to enjoy beverages and appetizers at our Manager's Reception.  We truly appreciate your generous recommendation and hope to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Another great stay at the Ayres Laguna Woods.  Friendly and helpful staff, everywhere spotlessly clean, complimentary "happy hour" and breakfast buffet included. Nice pool area and short drive to Laguna Beach, shops and the interstate. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear MarcusM777,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience with us. I appreciate your kind words and look forward to serving you again in the future!    Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Small, intimate, spotless.  Excellent breakfast with made to order eggs, waffles, pancakes, fruit, and more.  Delightful courtyard around the pool includes a fireplace.  My room was quite large and had a table with chairs, small sofa, and a wet bar with microwave and fridge.  I enjoyed the ceiling fan.  I was on the third floor and it was very quiet.  I would highly recommend this hotel.

We loved our stay at this location.  The hotel's exterior is very attractive, as is the inviting lobby area.  Our room was large and very comfortable, with all expected amenities.  The included breakfast was superior to many we've had at other hotels.  We thought the value was outstanding and we would definitely return to this hotel when we plan to visit this area.

My wife and I stayed here for 5 nights and I have stayed here previously on business. The hotel's service is extremely friendly and the facility is spotless. All the extras are great...freshly baked cookies, wine & cheese, extensive breakfast. The rooms are very attractive. I wouldn't stay anywhere else when i am in this area.

The staff went out of there way to make sure my company was taken care of. Hotel was luxurious. Caliber of people there was excellent. The Room was extremely clean. Issues were taken care of immediately.

The facility was very accommodating and met our needs.  My family and I stayed with our AllStar Team to play in a tournament on the weekend.  The girls enjoyed the pool a couple of times.  My husband I just always like to get away.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Shawna T,   Thank you so much for such a wonderful review! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to accommodate you and your family during your tournament weekend. We truly appreciate your feedback look forward to serving you again in the future!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: what a wonderful hotel! We stayed in a very comfortable handicap room and made great use of the hotel. Great buffet breakfast with a cook to make your own omelet. Great happy hour during the week with snacks and free drinks (beer, wine and sodas).  Nice pool and Jacuzzi.

The hotel is attractive.  However the service is bare-bones in some important areas.   We asked for a room away from the elevator.  When we checked in we found that our room was on the first floor [never again] across from the elevators.  The hotel hosted a wedding reception and the revelers were very noisy in the hallways from 11pm till 3am.  We were awakened repeatedly.  We called the front desk at 1am to complain.  When we were awakened again at 3am the front desk did not answer.  I dressed, walked into the hallway and told the people to quiet down and move outside.  The desk clerk was vacuuming the breakfast area and was unaware of the noise.  He said that he was not given any Security for the evening.  Poor/cheap  management ruined our night's sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Dave D,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as we always are looking for ways to improve our service.  In regards to your recent stay, we would like to sincerely apologize for the lack of service as well as confusion the occurred upon check in.  I would also like to apologize for the noise inconveniences you experienced and certainly empathize with your frustration.  We would like to kindly encourage you to not let this isolated incident deter you from choosing to stay at our hotel and hope that we can one day demonstrate the service we are known for. Thank you once again for your feedback and understanding.    Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Laguna Woods is a breath of fresh air for weary travelers.  Beautiful decor, cooked to order breakfast and excellent service make the property stand out from the standard hotel chains.  The staff could not have been more accomodating during our group meeting, handling last minute changes flawlessly.  Really just a lovely property and team.

Summary Heading: Boutique Hotel Lovely and Relaxing Stay
Summary: Beautiful experience. Lovely registration area with comfy couches and chairs adorned with beautiful art. Outside breakfast area has a beautiful fountain and greenery. Room is nice size and decorated beautifully. Comfy bed and soft pillows and sheets. Staff was so nice. Breakfast was wonderful and so was the staff at breakfast. An all-around lovely and relaxing stay.

I've stayed at the Ayers Hotel in Laguna Woods on multiple occasions over the past five years and have never been disappointed.  Their clean and comfortable guest rooms, free breakfast buffet, and friendly and courteous staff are very much appreciated!

I have stayed at Ayres Laguna Woods many times and I have future bookings. The customer care is always exceptional, the rooms and facilities are immaculate. There are so many nice features that will always make this hotel my first choice in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Steve V,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about you recent experience at our hotel.  We are so delighted to hear we were able to deliver exceptional customer service during your stay and thank you for your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: I have stayed several hundred nights over the years and am always impressed with the professionalism and kindness of the staff.  They value you as a customer and go out of their way to make living away from home comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel O,   We are much obliged to your for you loyalty and for you taking the time to write a review. Providing quality customer service and we're so glad that we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to serve you again in the future!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: The location of this hotel was it's appeal - it's literally right next door to the senior community that we were visiting. That, combined with the low price, made us think we shouldn't expect much. What a nice surprise from the minute we walked in the door. The hotel is very attractive and service was very good. The room was lovely though small. We arrived during an extreme heat wave and the window air conditioner was completely inadequate - blasting cold that was (almost) more uncomfortable than the heat. We closed the drapes and left the AC blasting during the day while we were gone to keep the room cool and then turned if off at night and opened the windows. The free breakfast was a selection of cold and hot foods that were okay.
Manager Response: Dear Justbetweenyouandme,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel and we are extremely thankful for the feedback you have provided. We are so honored to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations as well as provide you with only the best quality service.   We thank you for your generous feedback and hope to welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in CA
Summary: The Ayres offers all the consistency of a large chain with all of the charm of a family owned business. And, made to order breakfast is stellar, and included. I stay here for business and pleasure. It has everything we need to enjoy both.
Manager Response: Dear Beth R,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We thank you kindly for your compliments about our hotel collection as well as the services we offer. We're pleased to hear that you were able to indulge in our complimentary full American breakfast and hope to serve you again soon!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: I travel to Irvine California about once a month and this place is definitely my home away from home. Great rooms, great food and excellent service! In all my visits here over the last 6 years I have never been let down.

I stay here 4-5 times a year and the staff is always welcoming and friendly.  They always go above and beyond.  I had not asked for an airport pickup as I was supposed to meet a friend.  My plane got delayed and I called from Atlanta and asked if they could pick me up later and they did.  I called when I finally landed and there they were.  Always helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Ruth M,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and for your generous recommendation. We're delighted to hear that we were able to provide you with the best quality service that we strive to offer and hope to continue to serve you again in the future! Thank you again for your feedback.   Warm Regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: What a terrific hotel! It is beautiful. We reserved a block of rooms for a wedding. ALL of the guests just raved about the accommodations. The service we received from the Front Desk was excellent. Especially from Minnie. She went above and beyond to help us, at the last minute, get a gown steamed. The rooms are very, very nice (modern and clean). The breakfast is more than just a continental and offers a terrific selection of food. The Happy Hours are well stocked and offer snacks. The pool area is beautiful. Honestly, this is truly a wonderful hotel stay.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa M,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay at our hotel. It truly pleases us to hear your raving compliments about our hotel and that we were able to exceed your expectations. We strive to deliver exceptional customer service to all of our valued guests and I am delighted to hear that Minnie, along with our other team members were able to do just that. Thank you once again for your feedback and we hope to see welcome you back again soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods over Labor Day weekend and were very pleased.  The quality of the breakfast surpasses most of the hotels that offer this service and the room was very comfortable.  We have zero complaints or negative things to say and were very pleased with the value.  If we are down that way again I would definitely look into staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Travel_4_Relax_N_Fun,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review and letting others know about your recent stay at our location. We are glad to her that your enjoyed your Labor Day weekend getaway and were pleased with the service we provided! We are so honored to hear that you think so highly of our complimentary breakfast. It is very pleasant to hear that you have absolutely nothing to complain about, thank you again for your amazing feedback, it is greatly appreciated. We sure hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres in Laguna Woods , where we have stayed many times before.   I have to say that I enjoyed the happy hour, and that the morning food was good also.    As far as the room was concerned It never seemed to stay cool in the room no matter how low we put the air conditioner.   Also the fan that they had in the room made so much noise it was hard to use it, other wise the noise would keep you awake.  And when I told the gentleman who checked us out he did not really seem to care.  Just handed me my receipt and sent me on my way.  He was not very friendly. And the mattress was very lumpy always felt like I was falling out of the bed.   For the cost of the room, in my opinion there should have been no issues.
Manager Response: Dear calpug56,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and we are so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience with us. In regards to your recent stay, please accept our most sincere apology for this issues that occurred with the air conditioning in your room. I can certainly empathize with your frustration and can understand how a disturbance such as this could disrupt anyone’s sleep. I would also like to apologize for the lack of customer service you experienced when informing our team member about these issues upon check out. We strive to provide only the best customer service to our valued guests and are so sorry for this isolated, yet unprofessional encounter. Please know that I have looked into as well as addressed this issue in order to prevent it from reoccurring. Thank you once again for your feedback and understanding and we would like to kindly encourage you to return to our hotel again soon so that we can have the opportunity demonstrate the service we’re known for.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: Stay at the Ayres Hotel In Laguna Woods.
Summary: I've never done a review before, but I have to say, I really love this Hotel. First, the staff is very personable.  Has the feeling of a family run hotel instead of a Corporate chain. I stay there for business about 1 or 2 times a month.  They always go out of their way to get that requested room I ask for.  While the prices are moderate, the decorative details in the environment is more upscale, old world, European in feel.  The  included breakfasts are really wonderful.  When I go down in the morning they wave to me and make my omelets without me even telling them what I want, just from memory!  Highly recommend.

Wonderful hotel. Staff is very professional and friendly. Beautiful property; our room, the lobby, as well as the outdoor patio were just beautiful and enjoyable to relax in. Breakfast was great. We really enjoyed our stay and plan to return later this year.

We went to Laguna Woods for a wedding and had a good block rate at the Ayres.  Wonderful hotel with breakfast included.  Couldn't be happier with our stay.  I agree with some of the other reviewers about the courtyard, this is where we ate breakfast in the morning.  It was very quiet; I never heard a peep from any other room and I am usually sensitive to that.

Summary Heading: Clean but felt like was at Grandma's house
Summary: I personally won't stay here again.  They boast they are "European-style".  However, I have been to Europe many times and didn't see anything resembling Europe here. It reminded me of and smelled like my grandmother's house.  I view this as slightly better than a Comfort Inn--many things are very cheaply done and is in dire need of a overhaul.  And they should be sure to use a different decorator than the last.  Most of the staff were friendly and helpful.  However they need to rethink their shuttle service.  Many other hotels I have stayed in offer shuttle service and they are MUCH more flexible than the Ayres.  If you don't reserve time with the shuttle 24-hours in advance, you can't get a ride.  Most hotels don't require advance reservations and know how to multitask by

My company sent me to Aliso Viejo, CA for training for 2 weeks. They choose this hotel for my training group's stay. Overall this hotel is ok for this price (apprx. $200/night) compared to some more budget friendly hotels I've stayed in on my own choice.  I was placed in a single bed room.
