Some of my training mates had double bed rooms. The room I was in is connected to the next room. So if you're a family traveling and need one room for parents and a second for kids, you have that option to getting conjoining rooms. The bathroom is nice and spacious. The shower/tub has the whirlpool, but I wasn't sure on how to use it, so I only used the shower. Plus I think taking a bath in a public tub is kind of gross, but I can say if I wanted a bath, the tub was very very clean for hotel
Manager Response: Dear BluffCityGirl,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write such an insightful review about your recent business trip stay at our hotel. We truly appreciate your detailed feedback as it helps to better service our guests, both present and future. Thank you once again for your candid review and we hope we have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: Still continues to be an excellent hotel
Summary: My wife and I have stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods six or seven times.  Most recently we stayed from August 9 through August 13, 2014.  The hotel continues to meet expectations of providing clean and comfortable rooms.  Hotel staff are great and the included breakfast is a great touch.  We are sold on quality and value of the Ayres and plan on trying their other locations if available during our travels.
Manager Response: Dear Joe G,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about you recent experience at our hotel and for your loyalty to our collection. We are truly delighted to hear that we still continue to provide you with service you come in and expect to receive. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: We recently held a family reunion here and it was very successful, due in large part to this hotel. We have stayed at other Ayres hotels, so were already convinced of their high standards.  After checking out six other southern California Ayres properties, we choose this one because of its beautiful courtyard.  Everyone enjoyed the large, made-to-order breakfasts each morning, and the courtyard, with its large, enclosed pool and spa and the beautiful shade trees made it the perfect place for visiting in the evenings (with no flies or mosquitoes -- a benefit appreciated by the relatives from the Midwest and east coast!).  All of the hotel personnel were always friendly and helpful, and our rooms were spacious and very clean.  The Laguna Woods community is up-scale and quiet, and

The hotel is beautiful and my room was comfortable. The desk staff was professional, but not always friendly. The breakfast was a big surprise - the best complimentary selection I've ever had. The dinning room staff was friendly and kept everything well stocked. The "Happy Hour" was a little disappointing after the wonderful breakfast experience. However, the freshly baked cookies helped me overcome my disappointment! Overall, my experience was good and I would recommend the hotel to out of town friends/family.

Summary Heading: Why on earth would you stay anywhere else?!!
Summary: Everything from arrival to departure and all the time in between was simply outstanding. Heartfelt thanks to Vince the general manager and all of his accommodating staff.  Breakfast was delicious from the Belgian waffles to the perfectly cooked eggs over medium. My wife and I are loyal to the Ayres Hotel group simply because every experience has been more than expected and we look forward to our next visit
Manager Response: Dear MCWD,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review about your recent experience at our hotel. We are so pleased to hear that your overall stay was a success and appreciate your generous recommendation. Thank you so very much for all your kind compliments in regards to our hotel and also a special thanks for being truly loyal to our hotel collection. It is such an honor to know that we have not ceased to exceed your expectations and we will always strive to create that exact experience time after time. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: WOW! What a surprise this was...
Summary: So, I had to make a last minute hotel reservation and resorted to my friends at Priceline. We got our bid accepted and it was for this hotel. Having not heard of the brand before I was a little skeptical but the overall reviews were really, really positive. Besides, I was getting free parking, free internet, and free breakfast. How bad could it be. Well I am here to tell you it was amazing. The hotel is very well taken care of and they have done a nice job with decor (all little old world charm) and layout.   Upon arrival, the two front desk folks were amazing. One of them heard my name and struck up a conversation about how she saw my name and was practicing it prior to my arrival. They were very friendly and did a great job getting us set up for the night.   Our room was HUGE

From the moment I put the reservation in to when I checked out, the service was amazing. Whether talking to the front desk person about places in the area, to assistance with the hotels amenities, I was thoroughly impressed.  The only downside was that the cleaning staff missed a couple of things while cleaning the room, and that the in room coffee maker was broken. Although the latter was a non issue considering breakfast was included, it just made it tougher to make my girlfriend tea in the evening.  The breakfast buffet had an amazing selection, the chefs were extremely friendly at all times. The happy hour feature (although only used once) was nice and relaxing after hustling around town all day. The pool was the facility we used the most, we were in there almost every day.
Manager Response: Dear SafirK,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about recent stay at out hotel. We are truly pleased to hear that you received only the best quality service from our front desk team throughout your stay. We always strive to meet and exceed our guests needs while delivering an unforgettable service and we're glad that we were able to exceed your expectations. We apologize about the issues with the coffee maker in your room as well as the missing items, however are pleased that your overall stay was a success. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: The cheerful greetings and friendly smiles set the tone of this wonderful hotel.  We had a family gathering in the area and reserved several rooms. I consider this hotel a gem, from the buffet breakfast, free wifi, to the airport shuttle service.  The guest rooms are spacious, upscale, and comfortable.  The pool (outdoors) and fitness center are well maintained.  I would recommend the hotel for those visiting in the nearby towns and would certainly stay there again next time!
Manager Response: Dear Lin C,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and to let others know about your recent stay at our hotel. We are truly delighted to hear that our team delivered nothing other than the excellent customer service we strive for. Thank you once again for your kind words and we hope welcome you back again very soon!  Sincerely,  Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations!! The breakfast was more than we expected, and all of our guests really enjoyed it! We reserved a block of rooms for our wedding and the hotel has been so accommodating. They were incredibly responsive to all our questions, helped deliver our welcome bags, ensured all our guests were able to make it to the wedding...the list goes on! Thank you Ayres for making our stay enjoyable for us and all our guests!

Excellent standard of accommodation at a reasonable price.   Great breakfast and free (fast) wifi. Hard to beat, I would stay here over a national brand hotel in future.  Well located for Irvine business. We worked by the pool after breakfast. Could not fault.
Manager Response: Dear Still call Australia Home,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. We are ecstatic to hear that you think so highly of our hotel and that your experience was not anything less than remarkable. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back in the future for your next business trip!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: The amazing staff made my stay at Ayres Hotel that much more enjoyable. Taking the time to learn my name made it feel like home. Alex was the best remember what I wanted for breakfast each and always had a smile as did the rest of the team.
Manager Response: Dear dandli0n,   Thank you so very much for taking the time write a review in regards to your recent stay at our hotel. From our staff to our European-style accommodations, creating the perfect relaxing experience is what matters most to us. Thank you once again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Recently stayed at the hotel for a friend's wedding: comfortable beds, amazing warm breakfast, nice pool, free parking and hotel shuttle were all great features. Hotel staff was friendly and very hospitable. Great hotel choice for large booking!! I would definitely stay here again.

We stay at the Ayres Laguna Woods annually on our pilgrimage down to the Pageant of the Masters. It's a great hotel, nicely furnished and clean. The staff is very friendly and accomodating. I only had a few complaints this stay (and I normally don't!): 1) the lobby furniture is in dire need of replacement. It's cozy, but the furniture is very worn and dirty. It's a very cozy lobby, and I really would have liked to enjoy it. 2) The hotel staff was very nice, but they never answer the phone (I had to call multiple times until they picked up), and 3) I asked for the bed sheets on the pull out sofa to be changed, because they were a bit worn/dirty. Housekeeping promptly brought up the sheets, but they were handed to me at the door, leaving me  to change the sheets. Sorry, I'll do

Ayres Hotel is a very elegant yet casual place to stay.  They were very accommodating to our needs.  Our room location was ideal opening onto the patio area, pool, short cut to breakfast, and by the fitness center. The included breakfast was complete with anything you wanted. We had to cut our trip short, and the hotel would have not charged us for the night we did not use, but because we booked through Expedia they could not help us. I did not know that a studio suite did not include two double beds and a couch bed so we had to get an additional room. They were all booked but through conscientious effort accommodated us beautifully. The desk clerk, Minnie, was very helpful.  Ayres is a great place to stay!

The hotel is very nicely furnished and clean. The free breakfast in the morning is much better than in most other hotels. You can get omelettes made to order, fresh scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, and the standard fare of cereal and whatnot. Across the parking lot is a good Thai restaurant called Thaitanium, along with a buffet and a sub place. Across the street there's a sushi place.   The hotel staff--Minnie in particular--went out of their way for us and really helped to make our stay enjoyable. That made a big difference.   One caution, though: a suite at this hotel is really one larger room with two beds, rather than the kind of suite with two rooms one would find at, say, Homewood Suites or Embassy Suites.   I highly recommend this hotel.

We've enjoyed staying here each of the past 4 years.  The rooms are very spacious, clean and with nice amenities.  The hotel staff is very professional, friendly and eager to assist.  The complimentary breakfast is outstanding.  The central location is very convenient.  We highly recommend this hotel.

Very nice accommodations.  If I am in the area, I'll be sure to stay at this hotel.  Love the breakfast buffet and the "happy hour".  The pool was small, great places to eat within walking distance.  Better selections for eating withing 3 miles.  Accessible.

Wonderful stay at an elegant hotel.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Would highly recommend to anyone.  Decorations in hotel are top notch!  Location is very convenient for all kinds of purpose, dining, shopping, entertainment.

We stay at this Ayers often and have always been pleased.  This stay our room #229 had a large bin under the window that appeared to be for run off from the roof.  It was unattractive and looked dirty. Our a/c was directly over it and you have to wonder what is being pulled in through the a/c. There was no hotel directory or bath mat.  We called housekeeping and never received either item.  We left a note for the maid and she brought a bathmat , but apparently had no directory.  The hotel was much busier than our previous stays and had a lot of families with children.  The breakfast is excellent, the happy hour is a nice touch at the end of the day. The staff is always pleasant and helpful especially the people doing the breakfast.

Great location, very clean and I loved the 'antique-ish' decor.  They were able to get us into our room very early - like 10am. The complementary breakfast is the best I've ever had...they fried eggs to order every morning and we ate by the pool. No unruly guests while we were there - I'd recommend this hotel whole-heartedly.
Manager Response: Dear Luvs2Cruze,  Thank you for your positive review of our hotel! We truly appreciate your kind compliments in regards to our European inspired decor and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed it as much as we do. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Thank you again for your review and your recommendations.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods a number of times on business. While the location is only so-so, it is close to the 5 and 405 and you can get anywhere  you need to be pretty easily. It has a nice breakfast in the morning (often with omelettes made right there for you) and each night there's a happy hour with free sodas, beer, wine, and some kind of snack, whether it's fruit and vegetables or chips and salsa. The internet works well. There's a small but very nice pool, and though I've not had the chance to use it, the kids seem to like it. Best of all, the service has always been outstanding. I'd recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear cmbtravel,   Thank you so much for your candid review and for choosing our hotel as your go to destination time and time again. We're delighted to hear that you were able to thoroughly enjoy our complimentary full American breakfast as well as our evening Manager's Reception. We strive to always deliver excellent customer service and it pleases us to hear we were able to exceed your expectations! Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods for a wedding last weekend and were very impressed. Great location, lovely rooms, and wonderful breakfast--the staff were very accommodating and we could access the wedding venues and shopping and restaurants easily.   One suggestion is that they prepare a small town area map for guests in case the GPS doesn't respond! Our letter "A" didn't work on the rental car one so a map would have been helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Caroldress127,  Thank you for your kind words about your recent experience at our hotel! We truly appreciate your generous compliments in regards to our hotel amenities, clean and comfortable rooms, and Complimentary Full American Breakfast. Thank you again for your kind recommendation and we look forward to your next stay with us!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable room.  Friendly and helpful staff.
Summary: I had a nice experience here when I was in town for a few days.  The hot breakfast, which was included, was very good and offered a lot of variety.  The beds in the room were comfortable.  I would have welcomed stronger water pressure in the shower but it was not a big deal.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara30309,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at our hotel. We are truly delighted to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary full American breakfast and that enjoyed our clean and comfortable European inspired Suites. We appreciate your feedback about the water pressure in your room and we will definitely take your suggestion into consideration. Thank you once again for your review and recommendation and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: I really enjoy the convenience of staying here. Their shuttle will pick you up at the airport, everyone is very friendly, great location for my needs, and includes breakfast. The hotel is very well kept and clean.  I love the small boutique feeling.
Manager Response: Dear Debra S,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor as well as for your genuine compliments about your overall stay. Our atmosphere is one of our proudest achievements and our staff strive to be the friendliest around. Thank you so much for your kind words about our clean and comfortable rooms and we look forward to seeing you again very soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Nice boutique hotel with a great staff and service. I've stayed here numerous times for business and pleasure, and have had nothing but great experiences each time. Close to food and shopping. Excellent value.
Manager Response: Dear DHalvy51,   Thank you so much for sharing about your experience at our hotel on TripAdvisor. We're truly appreciative of your continued patronage as well as your kind compliments about our hotel.  From our clean comfortable rooms, to our complimentary American breakfast, we're always happy to make it all happen. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: This is my second time staying here. When I return again for another visit to the area There is no reason to stay anywhere else. I travel out west quarterly and the people at Ayres help make my stay enjoyable.

Staying at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods was a wonderful treat!!  Everyone was very friendly and helpful.  My husband and I planned to meet some new neighbors who were also staying at the hotel.  We didn't know their last name and figured the front desk would not be able to help us with only the first names!  But it was not a problem and the receptionist had us connected in no time!!  Warm fresh baked cookies every afternoon!!  Talk about a treat!!  and the breakfasts were wonderful.  Beautiful patio where we enjoyed brft, nice pool, comfortable room.  The shower was even better than at home!    One little suggestion-every a.m. we woke up to people calling up and down the hall.  Think it was staff coming on duty.  6:30.    But all in all it was great.  Thank you.

Had a corner suite that was very comfortable and quite roomy. The staff was very helpful and pointed us to an excellent restaurant "Kings Fish House". This was a quick get away that exceeded our expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Garret B,   Thank you kindly for sharing a review on TripAdvisor about your stay at our hotel. We truly appreciate your kind compliments regarding our accommodations and delighted that your overall stay was a success. We do our very best to deliver the best customer service and it's an honor to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you once again for your kind words and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: This is the best hotel in Southern CA
Summary: Completely enjoyed my stay at the Ayers Hotel.  Rooms are beautiful, breakfast is wholesome with a wide selection of eggs/omelets, bread and fruit. Free happy hour with wine, fresh baked cookies and munchies. Although I did not use the gym it looked nice with up-to-date modern equipment. Staff very pleasant. Managers came into dining room and chatted with guests as well as refill coffees. My only complaint was that I was unable to go online and complete my Ayers rewards. I chatted with help online and was of no help so I was unable to accrue this stay's points. I even left  a message on the appropriate telephone extension and my call was not returned.

Summary Heading: Quality rooms at a great value
Summary: The furniture and decorations were, for me, unexpectedly high end. My room was good size with a wonderful wooden headboard and quality décor. The couch was comfortable. The art in the common areas was decidedly upscale compared to other hotels in this price range. The smell of warm cookies, available at the front desk in the afternoons, added to the ambiance.   This is my first stay at an Ayers. I will make a point of booking one during future travels. If all may stays are like this, I'll become a regular.

The room was superb...the breakfast delicious.. The staff outstanding Wonderful stay..  Tons of shopping malls in the area .. Avoid the Laguna hills mall The mall was deadhead thought the nordstroms rack was lively and well stocked  Instead choose the nearby Spectrum

We spent one night at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods when we stopped to visit with friends who live there.  We arrived early and were surprised that we were able to check in right away.  We asked for a King bed and were told they did not have any.  The very nice lady at the front desk continued to look and found a very nice King Room for us on the first floor.They have afternoon complimentary cocktails and other refreshments from 5 till 7 every evening and the fresh baked cookies are to die for.  We enjoyed having a glass of wine on the patio and met some very nice people also staying there who were visiting friends and family in Laguna Woods.  The breakfast was outstanding.  Cooked to order omelets, pancakes, fruit, pastries, bagels and whatever you could think of.  We

Once again a wonderful away at Ayers Hotel Laguna Woods. Convenient to Laguna wounds village to see my Mother, 15 minutes to Laguna a Beach, 20 minutes to Dana point. Walking to Starbucks, grocery store, Rite  Aid and Olive Garden. We will return

We had an excellent stay and excellent experience at this location. The atmosphere was warm, friendly and staff has a wonderful sense of humor and we felt like we were at home! Our rooms were clean at the times we they needed to be.
Manager Response: Dear Benny M,   Thank you so much for your lovely review and for choosing our hotel for your recent stay! We are pleased to hear your wonderful remarks about our clean and comfortable rooms and the warm and friendly service from our staff. Providing our guests with the best hospitality and service has always been our mission and we are so delighted to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations. Once again, thank you so much for your glowing recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Very nice boutique hotel. Felt like a cross between a B&B and hotel. Nice pictures all over the halls. Free breakfast was very good. Enjoyed eating breakfast by the pool area next to the fountain. Pool area reminded us of bit of Italy with Cypress trees. Not too far of a drive from Laguna Beach and much more reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear wind01,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a TripAdvisor review! We are truly delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your generous compliments of our European inspired decor, complimentary full American breakfast overall experience at our hotel.  Thank you again for your kind words and we would love to welcome you back on your next trip to Laguna Woods!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: I must spend around 75 nights a year in hotels and to be honest, I don't know how the rating for this one is so high. I can get over the fact that the decor is from the 90s and yes, it was clean.  But, when I ask for a 1:00 check out time:  Hilton: Absolutely  Marriott: Absolutely any IHG hotel: Absolutely OR I'm sorry but the latest we can do is 12:30 any Starwood hotel: You can stay until 2 if you would like Ayres: Um...no.  It's not just that I was told no, it was the tone of voice that I was told it in. Her response made me feel like I had just asked her to go score me some crack.  Never again Ayres.
Manager Response: Dear md1282,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. Your feedback is vitally important to us as we always want to meet all of our guest’s expectations  In regards to your recent stay, we are saddened to hear your comments about our hospitality and service. We are usually known for our attentive, friendly staff who treat all of our guests with respect and I am so sorry that we did not exceed your expectations, nor our own.   Please know that we always try our very best to accommodate our guests requests, however sometimes due to our availability, we are unable to always accommodate late check outs. Nevertheless, this is no justification for the unprofessional response you encountered with our staff. We are genuinely sorry and appreciate your understanding.  That being said, we only hope that you reconsider staying with us in the future and give us another opportunity to be of service. Thank you again for your candid review.  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Marilin at the front desk was very friendly and helpful I would recommend staying there! The Jacuzzi Jets were perfect! My wife and I enjoyed the pool and Jacuzzi till 11 o'clock at night and it was great ! The rooms were very clean and comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear Mikeandmaida,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your experience at our hotel and a special thanks for your recommendations! We are overjoyed to hear that you were able to take advantage of the pool and the Jacuzzi, some of the many great amenities that our hotel has to offer. Once again, we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: The best kept secret in the Laguna region
Summary: The setting of the facility compensates for the location on a busy road and the accommodations are neo-classical and soothing. The rooms are comfortable and the staff restocks the incidentals in ways that many hotels do not now provide on a daily basis. The breakfasts (that are complimentary with the room) serve really cooked food and a variety of carbs. There is an airport shuttle to Orange County Airport and buses to Amtrak and Laguna Beach for those without cars and ample parking for those with cars or trucks. Easily accessible from the Moulton Parkway, or closer El Toro Road exits from the freeway. Also close to the Orange County toll-road. The hot tub has always worked on my visits and the pool is well maintained. Reasonably nice physical exercise rooms exist, but there are

I was staying at the Ayres for the wedding of a friend.  It is a beautiful hotel with gorgeous decor.  The hotel staff was warm, friendly, and incredibly attentive to detail.  The full breakfast was delicious!   More than that, all the conveniences of home (iron, coffee maker, refrigerator, microwave, etc) were all present in my room.  I had plenty of room to get dressed and had a wonderful night's sleep in the extremely comfortable king sized bed.  All in all, a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: Dear Amarpreet A,   Thank you very much for your generous recommendation and we're positively thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us! We appreciate your kind compliments about our European boutique inspired décor, full American breakfast and warm, friendly staff. We strive to provide the best hospitality and service for all of our guests and are delighted to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you again for your sincere compliments and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!     Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Beautiful little hotel with warm traditional decor.  We selected the Ayres due to it's location.  It was close to our daughter's wedding venue & it had great reviews. The staff was quite accommodating and helpful.  Prior to the wedding, our room was spacious enough to fit the bride, 4 bridesmaids doing hair/makeup, mother of the bride and a photographer at one time. After the wedding my husband and I enjoyed a great nights sleep in the comfy king sized bed.  The complimentary full american breakfast was a great way to end our daughter's wedding weekend with our new in-laws.  I would recommend this hotel.

FIRST CLASS -- I had worked with the Ayres properties for 10+ years on a corporate level but never stayed there before.  I stayed here for the first time because my house was being fumigated. When I first arrived, I was blown away by all the free, convenient parking. It took all of maybe 3 minutes to check in and I was on my way to my room. I noticed the décor of the hotel which was in pristine condition. My room overlooked the courtyard and was very spacious, with a king bed, fold out couch, coffee table, desk, bar area, side tables, internet connection and a ceiling fan. All the comforts of home -- a coffee maker, refrigerator, microwave, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, lotion -- every amenity has been taken care of and the room in absolutely immaculate

I was booted out of my home for twelve days by plumbing issues. The Ayres staff graciously welcomed me to their very well appointed hotel. This hotel is full of very helpful amenities. But the reason I will return (hopefully for a more pleasant reason) is the warm, traditional decor and attention to detail in the hotel. It's not fun being out of your home when it wasn't your idea. The Ayres staff made me forget that I was unhappy with my situation at home. Yes, it's conveniently located, and reasonably priced, but so are many other places. This hotel, however, is worth the money.
Manager Response: Dear lagunalady27,   Thank you kindly taking the time to write a review about your experience at our hotel. In regards to your recent stay, we’re pleased to hear that we were able to be your home away from home during your unfortunate evacuation. We truly appreciate your kind compliments about our friendly and welcoming staff, European inspired décor, and overall experience you had at our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and I am delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Thank you again for your kind words and we would love to invite you to stay with us again!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: Standard OC hotel, warm cookies on check in!
Summary: Nice hotel, standard but very nice. Big room, strange layout. Fresh cookies on check in always wins me over. Great service, gave us toothpaste at about midnight. FREE FULL BREAKFAST as well, eggs, sausage, French toast, the works. Nice hotel, well managed and just what you'd expect
Manager Response: Dear Sean B,   Thank  for choosing our hotel for your recent stay! We are truly delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy our delicious fresh baked cookies as well as our complimentary full American breakfast. We truly appreciate all of your kind remarks about your experience at our hotel. Once again thank you for your lovely review and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: my second business related stay at the Ayres Hotel
Summary: This is one the nicest hotels I have stayed at while on business.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  They are there to serve their guests and make that perfectly clear.  Vince, the general manager is wonderful!  He drove me and other co-workers to our meeting in the smaller hotel shuttle when there was no other larger shuttle available, and he did it willingly-----you could tell the hotel was busy that morning, but he jumped in and solved our transportation issues.  My room was always clean as was the rest of the establishment.  I would never stay anywhere else while in the Laguna/Irvine area.

Summary Heading: home away from home in the OC
Summary: Ayres Laguna Woods has clean rooms, great breakfasts, really helpful staff. Especially for those with family in the area this is a great home away from home- make sure you ask for the Laguna Woods family rate.
Manager Response: Dear Ross F,   Thank you kindly for your generous review. Were delighted to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary full American breakfast and our clean and spacious rooms. We strive to deliver exceptional customer service at all times are glad we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you again for your review and we would love to invite you to stay with us again on your next trip to Orange County!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Hotel was a wonderful place to stay while I visited family in the area.  The whole hotel was spanking-clean and modern.  The staff was always eager to assist me with any problems that I had or information that I needed.  The breakfast was always excellent and one could eat outside if she or he wanted to in an airy, bright courtyard.  I stayed on the third floor, and at first was disappointed to see that there was only one elevator, but that proved to be no problem for me--I hardly ever had to wait for it.  I was initially put into a room in which the a/c had broken down, but was quickly transferred to another room when I brought it to the staff's attention.  I even received an email from the manager at Ayres Laguna apologizing yet again for the need to change rooms.  I
Manager Response: Dear selkie0,   Thank you so much for choosing us for your stay and for taking the time to write a review of our property! Your comments are very much valued.   We pride ourselves in delivering excellent customer service, and it is delighting to hear that you received nothing short of that. Although we are pleased that the issue of changing rooms was resolved, once again, please accept our apologies for any inconveniences that may have arisen.   Thank you again for your positive feedback. We would love to invite you to stay with us again in the future!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: This location is perfect for accommodating my needful stay for Out of State Cousin.  According to her review as we checked her in late night, room was on ground floor ( good ), she slept well and breakfast the next morning was really good.  Unfortunately, only one night was not enough to utilize all of the offered utilities by this beautiful, warm, cozy Hotel who fit the needs of loved ones who traveled from Michigan, Wisconsin, Florida to attend our Dad's 90th birthday party!!  I highly recommend Ayres Hotel to anyone, especially coming from out of State.  Also to mention, Ayres is next to an awesome food Court ( Hometown Buffet ) and Subway, shopping area and Laguna Woods Village plus grocery stores.  Excellent service and location!!   Thank you Ayres Staff

I enjoyed my staying in the hotel.  Rooms are large, and nice furnished. Free Wi-Fi and breakfast.  Staff is very fiendly and helpful.  Happy hour with free drinks on weekdays was very relaxing. Overall, it was a pleasant experience to stay there.

This hotel is very nice indeed.  Everything is just very well done.  All the furnishings are beautiful, beds very comfortable, bathroom was very clean. The complimentary hot breakfast was very tasty and well presented.  The staff was very responsive to questions and very  helpful. The neighborhood was very modern and safe feeling. Fast internet connection, too. I could find nothing to criticize on this hotel.  Stay here, you will be happy.

Over all had a nice quick trip  This location is close enough to laguna and its' killer beaches while being far enough to be away from "the crowd" at night.  The hotel was nicely done, the breakfast was good not great but it is free (no bacon?....) and the TV  left me wanting (Screen was very fuzzy- I'm used to HD TV- our tv seemed to be the quality of an antenna).  The place was quite- did not her any noise at all from other guests...  Over-all a 4/5 dinged for the TV, breakfast choices and no evening reception on friday-sunday nights.

We love this hotel.  Great rooms, and professional staff.  We have to work to get a rate, but the hotel is fabulously clean, and very quiet.  Our grandkids love coming for breakfast on Saturday morning...

The Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods is my favorite place to stay in the area -- nice rooms, comfortable beds, great breakfast, helpful staff, a beautiful patio, and a quiet and restful place!  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Pat890,   It was a pleasure welcoming you recently. Thank you so very much for your review and for choosing our hotel. It was such a delight to hear all the great things you had to say. We are pleased you enjoyed our rooms and took advantage of our complimentary breakfast. We, as a team, strive to provide excellent guest service, so your compliments are greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for your recommendation. We hope you consider staying with us again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Been a few years since my last stay at Laguna Ayres, but it's still the same comfy place I remember. I like walking up and down the halls to enjoy the many oil paintings. Buffet breakfast was excellent, check in and check out was a breeze.

We stayed here for a concert at the Irvine Amphitheater and the staff was awesome.  They gave us directions abs a little advice on parking. (I'm glad I took it, a little bit of a walk is better than waiting hours to get out).  They gave us an early Check-in and a late Checkout. Breakfast was awesome and sitting outside by the fountain was even better. The room was great, the bed was great and the location is great.  Good place to stay.

Summary Heading: Best experience at a hotel ever!
Summary: I was at this hotel for a conference. The rooms were great, the staff was great, happy hour was great, and the hotel manager was great! I would recommend this hotel to anyone, especially for business conferences.

Summary Heading: Perfect spot when visiting Laguna Woods
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised to find such a nice large room with a sofa and work space, a nice pool area, fitness center, free wi-fi and excellent breakfast!  We were visiting for one night and were able to have everything we need!  Very reasonably priced for this quality of hotel.

Summary Heading: Our appreciation for you and thank you
Summary: Your staff continues to be very accommodating and friendly.   They can't do enough for you.   Minnie at the desk helped us find a car dealership nearby so we could get our headlight fixed on our car.   Chris will help  us have the same room next time.   Marilyn is also very competent and helpful when I need it on the computer.

This hotel is a hidden gem.  It is wonderful!  The complimentary breakfast is far better than most hotels.  The staff was incredibly friendly.  The rooms are spacious, clean and very comfortable.  The courtyard and pool area are beautiful.  You will be very glad you have stayed at this property.

This is my second stay in the Ayres, what makes me come back is the environment. This Hotel has a warm and friendly atmosphere. The staff is at your will, you feel very very spoiled and pampered when you stay in the Ayres. I do not like very busy impersonal Hotels, they don't makes me feel like home. The room are very spacious, and everything very professional, neat and clean, I sleep like a baby in the very comfortable beds. Definite will return.

Summary Heading: Great Find! Clean, Friendly, Comfortable Feel
Summary: We had just moved to Orange County, CA and our new home got a water flood :0. We needed to stay at a local hotel for at least a few weeks. We were in Aliso Viejo. We were so lucky to find the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods. It was close by. From the moment you walk in, there is a warm, comfortable feeling. The staff was friendly, helpful and the furnishings like a European Hotel. The price was competitive and the rooms clean and comfortable. They serve you a full breakfast in the morning in their lobby. It was great. You serve yourself and order hot food. I loved that part. Its like being home but someone does all the work for you. You can relax, have your coffee, fruit, breakfast, read the newspaper, check email, etc all in a comfortable relaxed setting. Then in the evening they

Summary Heading: most comfortable bedding of any hotel.
Summary: Wonderful service, from check in, dining, housekeeping to check out.  Loved the bed especially since I came down with a bit of a cold.  Unfortunately at Marriott Manhattan Beach now, uncomfortable bed, bedding, room stuffy. I will always stay at Ayers when visiting my Mother thank you for a wonderful stay:)

We were here because our home was being fumigated, a very difficult series of events. But our stay at Ayres Laguna Woods made most of the hard times, for the brief time of our stay at this beautiful hotel. The breakfast and Happy Hour staff were all just simply great in all ways.
Manager Response: Dear Gary T,   Thank you kindly for your candid review! It was an honor having you stay with us during the time your home was being fumigated. Regardless of whether our guests are staying for business, pleasure, or something else entirely, we strive to provide excellent service. Thank you for your generous compliments in regards to our rooms/hotel, your stay, and of course for taking the time to write about your experience. It would be an honor to host another stay for you in the near futures, and hopefully under more pleasant circumstances; so we ask you kindly to please consider staying with us again.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Wonderful accommodations!  Most comfortable bed I've slept on in 15 years.  Loads of parking available.  Snacks and hot beverages freely available.  Internet access is free, what a great help!  I would readily stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,   Thank you very much for your review and thank you for choosing our hotel for such a wonderful celebration! Thank you for your kind compliments about our beds. It is an honor to hear that it is the most comfortable bed you have slept on. We are also thrilled you took advantage of our complimentary Wi-Fi. Once again we would like to thank you for taking the time to share about your experience and we hope to see you soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: I love this hotel! It is always a great stay and I look forward to going there. The complimentary breakfast is excellent and the fresh baked cookies can put a smile on any weary traveler's face and are a especially good after a tough day in the office.    The staff work hard to ensure a pleasant stay for all of their guests. I look forward to my next visit.

My crew and I recently stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods for business and we had a very nice stay.  The staff are very nice and professional, and went the extra mile to help us with our needs.  The made to order breakfast omelets were great, as was the chef with a smile!  My only suggestion to the hotel would be to redecorate.  The decor and furnishings are from another bygone era, and, though charming to some, it was not my taste.  Other than that, I recommend it, as it was a very pleasant place to stay.

This is our 3rd or 4th stay here. I love the plushness of this place. Every evening I look forward to the warm freshly baked cookies at the front desk. Every morning I enjoy their full breakfast served quickly and always with a big smile. This weekend a couple sports teams were there. We entered the breakfast room and groaned inwardly at the exceeding long line but were delighted that they served it with great efficiency and speed. On the opposite side of El Torro Rd is a Stater Brothers Grocery, Home Depot, Rite Aid and Office max. We stay here every time we visit my son's family since it is so convenient for the little items you bring to family. These businesses are not visible from the room except for in some rooms that have a view of the Home Depot sign. When we are in one
Manager Response: Dear Diane C,   Thank so very much for your review and thank you for choosing our hotel, your loyalty is greatly appreciated. We are so delighted to hear that you anticipate our service with such excitement. We enjoy catering to each and every one of our guests' needs and we aim to do it in a quick yet orderly fashion. We cannot thank you enough for taking the time to write about your stay, and we hope to see you again!   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: This is my 3rd stay at Ayres Laguna Woods. My first two was for brief business trips. This time, it's for a working vacation.    The pool and hot tub was a treat for my kids. Parking is plenty. The grounds are kept very clean.   This is a great hotel to stay in while in Laguna Woods. The employees are very professional and very helpful. The rooms are clean, and elegant. The breakfast in the morning by Alex and Fabiola and staff is fabulous!    A microwave, fridge, iron+ironing board, hair dryer is available in the room. Beds are comfortable. Wish the pillows were firmer, but that's ok.     They have a shuttle that picks you up at John Wayne Airport. Schedule your ride back to the airport with them, too.   We highly recommend this hotel. It was our 3rd time to stay, and it's been

We were absolutely thrilled with the accomodations and service at The Ayres. We are already booking our next trip, and will never stay anywhere else! The rooms are surprisingly spacious, and very well appointed.   My only suggestion would be to change to lounge chairs and sitting chairs in the patio. I understand they are good, sturdy quality - but very unfomfortable if you sit in them for any length of time. Add cushions, please!

We have family in Laguna Woods, and have stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods for years. The rooms are clean, spacious, and well-equipped -- from the microwave and mini-fridge (yay!) to the incredibly comfortable beds with choice of pillows (double yay!) and upgraded (and free!) wifi. The staff has always been friendly, professional, welcoming, unfailingly helpful and a pleasure to work with. The breakfasts are delicious and the dining room staff always cheerful. The cookies at the end of the day are fantastic, and they have a great happy hour. Whenever I return, I feel like -- and they treat me like -- I'm coming back to my home away from home.

Was visiting family in Laguna Woods and took a chance because this was the closest hotel.  I will definitely be back.  All services are excellent and first-class from breakfast in the morning to the happy hour at night.  The rooms are super clean and roomy and even have a microwave, small fridge and coffee maker.  The manager and all employees are both professional and courteous and will help you in any way they can.

The hotel has great guest services! Extremely pleasant staff and a friendly environment. The room was clean and very spacious. The breakfast is great- you won't leave hungry! It's also nearby several restaurants, movie theater and a mall!  I've been using this Ayres Laguna Woods to book hotels for businessmen for about a year now and have never had a complaint.  I would recommend this hotel to any couple looking for a quiet weekend away and for the businessman looking for a quiet desk and chair for the evening.

Every  body was very hepfull and went above and beyond without being asked. Rooms were very elegant and clean. Breakfast every morning was awesome. Nice touch. Hotel Manager came into restaurant and poured everybody coffee. I would stay their again

It took us 25 minutes from Disneyland parking garage to the Ayres Hotel. Wow! I love the quiet of Laguna Woods, the pool is gorgeous, the breakfast buffet exquisite, the rooms large and comfortable...I highly recommend the Ayres for your Disneyland and environs base camp! Our kids even loved it, I loved the fireplace lounge area in the lobby too.
Manager Response: Dear Ingrid666,   Thank you so much for choosing us for your stay and for taking the time to write your review about our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities within and outside the hotel, including Disneyland! We know that when our guests have a big day in front of them that breakfast is very important, so we are thrilled you enjoyed the breakfast buffet before heading out on your adventures. We greatly appreciate you staying with us during your trip and hope that you will have the chance to visit us again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Great Experience with hotel staff and accommodations. They were very friendly and helpful. This is a beautiful hotel. Great breakfast was offered with fresh pancakes, eggs, and French toast to order. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Bondrobert -   We appreciate you taking the time to write an enthusiastic review of our hotel and choosing us for your stay. We love hearing that we have made such an impression. We work hard to make every stay the best stay for our guests. We know that our guests have a big day ahead of them when staying with us, and to start the day off right, we enjoy providing a good hearty breakfast! We greatly appreciate your kind review and hope you will have the chance to visit us again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, but worth the price?
Summary: Stayed here one night while visiting family in Aliso Viejo.  Check-in was fast and efficient and the hotel was immaculate.  We were upgraded to a nicer room (King Executive?) at check in.  The room itself was spacious but I felt the bathroom area was rather cramped. With two people in the room, seemed like we were always bumping into each other.  The breakfast was outstanding, with tons of options and hot food (eggs/bacon/hash browns). Other guests were having omelets made-to-order.  We appreciated the computer in the lobby that allowed us to check in for our flight and print boarding passes.    My only complaint was the price--$200/night seems steep to me for what is, essentially, a gussied up chain hotel in a strip mall next to a Hometown Buffet and a medical supply store.

Hands down! I would come back here if I get a chance. I wish our training was done in this hotel. I can't believe they give free beers and wine at happy hours from 5pm to 7pm. The staff is very friendly.

Summary Heading: Top notch for business or leisure
Summary: I've stayed here before one trip to the Alisa Viejo area.  This hotel is convenient to business, shopping, restaurants and entertainment.  It is a little bit off the beaten path, which makes for a quiet stay.  Staff is outstanding. The furnishings are very high-class.    The Ayres Hotel staff starts the day off right, with an excellent breakfast. They feature cooked to order omelettes and an assortment of other hot dishes, as well as a good selection of fruits and pastries. During the workweek, there is a complementary reception from 5 PM to 7 PM, featuring snacks and beverages and freshly baked cookies.  It is a great welcome back to the hotel after a workday.  On warm days, one can enjoy the comfortable patio and poolside.  The rooms are very comfortable and the beds are
Manager Response: Dear K W,  Thank you very much for leaving such a thorough and kind review of our hotel on TripAdvisor. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to know you enjoy your stays here. Thank you for the compliments on our excellent team, we truly strive to offer the highest quality service and are pleased to see that we succeed in this goal with your stay. Thank you for informing others of our complimentary full American breakfast buffet and Manager's Reception, we hope you come to stay another time in the near future so that you may enjoy both again soon.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods from February 17 through March 14; it's the third time I've had the pleasure of an extended stay at this property in the last two years.  The Ayres is a bargain for business travelers and its location is convenient, surrounded as it is by restaurants, shopping and only about a 20 minute drive to the beach and Laguna Canyon.  The breakfasts are always delicious, happy hours and of course, fresh-baked cookies around the clock are AMAZING. The lobby with its huge fireplace and comfortable seating is a delight, and the workout room is exceptional for a property of this size.  The only complaints I have about this location is enforcement of certain rules - like, no children under a certain age permitted in the workout room. I'm constantly

Summary Heading: Shh...I feel like I should have paid more!
Summary: I had to jump on here and post this while I'm still riding the wave of contentment after my stay at the Ayres Laguna Woods. What a splendid hotel, especially for the price.  We were there for a short in/out weekend for a nearby wedding. Check-in was easy and they were able to accommodate our request for a poolside room. We have kids so being poolside made our stay seem like a vacation. The gated pool was clean and inviting and just perfect for our mini stay.  Beds were soft but comfy and we slept soundly. The biggest bonus? The FREE in-room WiFi. This is a huge bonus and one of the things we look for when booking a hotel. We had a strong signal from our room and kids were even able to play Minecraft without much lag. I want to hug the Ayres for making complimentary Wifi

These days many hotels are indistinguishable from each other. This one stands out because of its unique style - it is in the best European style (except breakfast, unfortunately, which is fully American). I agree with other reviewers on facilities and service - they are very good. Internet is free, fast and reliable. The location is also very convenient - it's very close to major transportation routes (I-405) and at the same time close to some convenience stores and restaurants. All in all - highly recommended.

I stayed 1 week here for business and staying here makes you feel at home. The staff is very friendly, rooms are clean and spacious, good complimentary breakfast is included, it has a nice small gym and is conveniently located in a 15 minute ride you are in laguna Beach. Next time I will def. stay there again

This places rocks... Great staff (Minny & Victoria go above & beyond), custom hot breakfasts courtesy of Alex, Fabiola and Aida, Complimentary Beer & Wine each week-nite with Pizza Gratis on Thursdays... Super clean rooms and caring housekeepers... A pair of Mallards landed in the pool for 5 minutes and the manager had the whole thing cleaned and purged... Exemplary safety considerations...
Manager Response: Dear AlaskanKiwi,  We are so very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to let others know on TripAdvisor how pleasant a stay with us can truly be. It is nice to see that the service you received was impeccable, we truly strive to offer the highest quality of service and are thrilled to know we succeeded in that goal with your stay. Thank you for letting others know how much you enjoyed the complimentary custom breakfast and Manager's Reception. We hope you will visit another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I spent two weeks here for work.  The sleep quality is great.  The rooms are quiet.  There are different sized rooms, but all the ones I stayed in had a king sized bed, couch, fridge and microwave.  There is a happy hour Tues - Thurs with light snacks.  Breakfast is included and has lots of options.  There is a pool, but I didn't use it.  The service is great.  They were able to store my stuff for me and they moved me out of my room into a new room, upon my request.  I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear hmk24,  It is nice to see that you had a great stay with us from the sleep quality to the service. We truly appreciate the time you took to let others on TripAdvisor know how pleasant your stay with us was. We are very pleased to see you were able to enjoy the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and evening Manager's Reception. We cannot wait to welcome you back and hope to see you another time in the near future. Thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: I Wish I Could Live There!
Summary: I love the Ayres. I always stay there when visiting my family in the area and could not ask for a better experience. The rooms are lovely and the breakfasts are exquisite! We had a small issue with our room this time being somewhat musty. Hopefully this will not happen again.
Manager Response: Dear Cosmic5,  We truly appreciate the time you took to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know how much you love our hotel. It is pleasing to see that you always stay with us when visiting family in the area, we cherish your loyalty. We hope the next time there is any type of issue with your room you will let us know immediately so that we may better accommodate you. Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing and we hope to see you another time in the near future.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Laguna Woods best place to stay in the area
Summary: My family and I have spent countless hours and dollars with the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods and we highly recommend their services for four reasons:  1) Great service/value and well-appointed: This hotel is clean, extremely comfortable, with great front office and back-of-house support. Their beds are as wonderful as any we've ever slept in and the rooms are a decent size with windows that can be opened. We recently had an unstable situation regarding our reservations because of fluctuating, last-minute developments around the death of our father and Ayres management was empathetic and accommodating, canceling and adding rooms and working with us on charges as needed.   2) Location: Convenient to the freeway without hearing any city/street noise and centrally located to Laguna

We have been staying at the Laguna Woods Ayres since it was opened.  This stay was for 11 days and included two rooms. One was the ADA room for my mom. Everyone at the hotel was wonderful and so accommodating. The manager would stop by the tables at breakfast and chat to see how our stay was going. The rooms were excellent and the breakfast was fantastic, especially your daily specials. My mom loves a glass of red wine and the Happy Hour was her favorite. Thank you to all for an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear SandiMcClure,  Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us over the years, your loyalty means the world to us. We are so very honored that you and your family stayed with us recently, we truly appreciate your kind words. It is of the utmost importance to us that you are completely satisfied with your visits and we are pleased to see that this stay was no different than your previous stays. It is also a delight to know that you enjoyed our evening Manager's Reception with the complimentary red wine for your mother! We hope to see you again soon and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manger

Summary: We really liked the whole feel of the hotel because it was well-furnished and well-landscaped.  The breakfast there was also great.  However, the only thing that really bothered us was that before we went to bed, we put out our "Do Not Disturb" sign on our door so that we could sleep in.  Promptly at 7 am the next morning, housekeeping repeatedly knocks and calls out to clean our room.  What is the point of having such a sign of it is so readily disregarded?  We let the receptionist at the front desk know and she appeared to not even care.
Manager Response: Dear Lori Ann T,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. We are so very pleased to know that you enjoy the hotel and found it to be well furnished and landscaped. Also, it is nice to know you thoroughly enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. Please accept our sincerest apologies that your "Do Not Disturb" sign was overlooked. Rest assured, the housekeeping team will be spoken to as to prevent future incidents such as this. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you another time in the near future.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: The rooms are comfortable and the staff are very friendly.  They offer a complimentary happy hour and breakfast (breakfast was not good) however they do not have a full service restaurant in the hotel nor is room service available.  Definitely plan to eat before arriving or BYOF (bring your own food) and use the small refrigerator and microwave provided in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy9003,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a candid review of our hotel on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience. We sincerely apologize if your stay was anything less than exceptional. It is very disappointing to see that you were not completely satisfied with our full American breakfast buffet, we truly strive to offer the highest quality of amenities and are saddened to see you did not find the breakfast as such. We hope you will reconsider staying with us in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: My stays are normally really good as I am in your hotel almost every two weeks. My profile asks that I am on higher floor and away from the elevators. this trip my room was on the third floor but right across from the elevator. The room did not seem to want to cool down even with thermostat at 68.

The accommodations were top notch. Very comfortable room and setting makes it easy to relax.  Plenty of eateries nearby. Good hot breakfast. Can be a little noisy if there is an event going on at the hotel. Recommend staying on the upper floors for a more quiet stay.
Manager Response: Dear dadbeme,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience at our hotel; your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are pleased to see that you found your accommodations to be comfortable and relaxing, it is truly what we strive for. It is also nice to know that you thoroughly enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here several times over the last few years. Always greeted well, clean comfortable rooms, quiet, great free  breakfast. Ask for leisure world discount if you can . Great place.. Comparable to high end marriott.

Summary Heading: Quiet and comfortable hotel with terrific service and breakfast
Summary: This is a comfortable and quiet hotel.  The internet was fast, and they allow you to connect with multiple devices in your room.  The room includes a mini-fridge and coffee maker.  In addition to ice and vending machines, they have a sundry shop near the front desk, and you can charge items to your room (handy if you don't have cash on you).  The breakfast in the morning has good varieties of fruits, breads, juices, and cereals, as well as hot items like pancakes, potatoes, omelets, sausage or bacon, and eggs.  There's also a DIY waffle iron.  The hot items are kept fresh.  I found the entire property to be clean and well-maintained.  Parking is free and easy, and there's restaurants within walking distance if you want to grab a quick bite.
Manager Response: Dear JC C,  We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed your recent visit to our hotel, thank you for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know how pleasant a stay with us can truly be. It is nice to know you enjoyed the room amenities such as the mini fridge and coffee maker. We thank you for the compliments and feedback on the complimentary full American breakfast buffet, it is a pleasure for us to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your first meal of the day. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We downsized, so we use Ayres as our extra bedroom. We pay for the room and it is cheaper than having a bigger house.  Everybody we have stay at Ayres loves the place. It is is the heart of Laguna Woods.

This was my first visit as a business traverler and I found the property beautiful, close to the University were I was attending meetings. The staff were polite, friendly, informative and accomodating.  The shuttle service was very important and the staff was responsivie and quick to pick-up and deliver.  Having not traveled in many years this was a nice introduction back into the travel life.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth F,  Thank you very much for taking the time to let others know about your experience at our hotel during your business travels. Your kind words are very much appreciated. We are so pleased to see that you found our service to be polite, friendly, informative, and accommodating; it is truly what we strive for. It is also nice to see that the shuttle service helped with the introduction back to travel. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I always stay here when traveling to Irvine on business. By far the nicest accomodations and service! Free breakfast - and not continental! Very nice pool and jacuzzi, free and close parking. What more can I say?
Manager Response: Dear Trish F,  We are so very pleased to know that you always stay with us when you are in the area for business, it is truly an honor. Thank you for the compliments on the nice accommodations and service. It is also nice to know that you enjoy the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and parking. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know your high opinion of us and we cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The room was clean and nicely decorated. I would suggest getting a room away from the swimming pool and outside fireplace table area. Even on the 3rd floor, I could hear guest conversing and laughing in the evening.
Manager Response: Dear Steve A,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and kind words. It is very nice to see that you found our service to be friendly and helpful, it is truly what we strive for. We are also pleased to see that you found your accommodations to be clean and nicely decorated. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Spanish California Atmosphere, very attentive and pleasant staff
Summary: We felt like we had made the right choice as soon as we walked in. Pleasant and attentive staff. The room was quite big for the price and well equipped with a microwave, refrig and small table and chairs. There was a comfortable couch to sit on plus desk and chair. The bed, itself, was delightful. The complementary breakfast was over the moon. It was a challenge to decide among the delectable goodies. There were made to order omelets, make your own waffles with fresh strawberries for toppings... husband loves those. In all, it was a delightful stay.

Summary Heading: Have stayed at 4 different properties  and continue to be impressed with the service, quality and value.
Summary: Stayed with soccer club and very pleased. Friendly service, comfortable beds, and great breakfast included. Daughter was in a weekend tournament and we had no problem getting a later than usual checkout.

In Irvine for business last week, company booked us in at Ayres.  Arrived late on the first night and reception were very helpful with finding us a takeaway that'd deliver.  Breakfast was good, plenty of choice of items.  Quiet at night compared to many other hotels in the area which are mostly close to the freeway, this is great if your a light sleeper.   No problems with room or anything on the stay, hopefully back again next year.
Manager Response: Dear CNC-expert,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience at our hotel. We are so pleased to see that you found our service to be helpful and accommodating. Thank you for the kind words on the complimentary full American breakfast buffet, we are delighted to know you were satisfied with the options available. It is also nice to see that you enjoyed your accommodations. We cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Great Hotel! The beds and pillows are great. The breakfast in the morning is perfect and fast if you're on the run and the little happy hour at the end of the day is nice. However, if you are on a diet, I would advise eating the nice warm cookies that they serve:)

Summary Heading: ANOTHER great stay at the Ayres
Summary: From Minnie's welcoming smile at the front desk to the excellent service and food served at the breakfast buffet by Alex, Fabiola and Aida the Ayres at Laguna Woods continues to be one of SoCal's best kept secrets.  Rooms are kept immaculate and the beds are oh-so comfortable, which is saying a lot for a week+ stay.  Location is convenient to shopping and other local attractions.  Thanks for another great stay!

Summary Heading: No wonder the reviews are so good!
Summary: The hotel presents itself attractively, siting above a local boulevard next to a small retail center.  I was warmily greeted upon arrival and made to feel at home on this, my first visit.   The rooms are large and well laid-out, and include an ergonomic chair at the desk, something I almost never find in hotels regardless of price.  The bed was very comfortable, which when combined with the quiet setting of the hotel made for restful nights.  Breakfast is included and is a real bargain, as chefs stand ready to cook for you.    The entire experience was terrific, and Ayres Laguna Woods represents an exceptional value in the Irvine area.  I look forward to returning here.

I come to California  on a regular basis to visit family, and always stay at the Ayres. Over the years, it has truly become my "home away from home." The staff always gives me a warm welcome back, the space is beautiful, the rooms are comfortable, the beds are more comfortable than my own. The breakfast staff is cheerful and accommodating, and provides a wonderful start to the day. At night, they give you choices of pillows from firm to soft. In between, they've got a great fitness room. They are also conveniently located to just about everything!

Spacious clean rooms of a decent size with a separate couch and seating area, Bed was nice (not too soft and not too firm) with great pillows and with a proper duvet. Great service from attentive staff.

I was very impressed. Particularly with the friendliness and helpfulness of the front desk staff! I would highly recommend! Loved the fireplace in the lobby too. There are also firepits by the pool which is a nice touch. And convenient restaurant options walking distance across the street.

We stay here whenever visiting our son who lives in the area. Generously sized rooms, great breakfast, clean as a whistle, no smoking allowed at all, friendly staff. Warm cookies at night are a welcome treat.

I was genuinely impressed with my recent stay at the Ayres Hotel.  I was in town for a wedding and stayed 4 nights just after Christmas.  I stayed in a room with a king bed.  I thought the room was a step up from the normal hotel room.  The bed was extremely comfortable.   I stayed 4 consecutive nights and I believe I received a price break for staying 3 or more nights which made the value even more impressive.  I would defiantly recommend the hotel and will stay again when I am back in the area.  The lobby was really nice done up for Christmas and had a fire in the fireplace.   The morning breakfast was good.  Although they did not have made to order omelets, they did provide made to order fried eggs or scrambled eggs, bacon sausage as well as the usual waffles, cereal, juice

This was our first time staying at Ayres in Laguna Woods.  We frequently stay at the Ayres in Costa Mesa (and have always had very good experiences there) but we decided to try something different.  We were not disappointed.  Everything was great--beautiful location, very nice and helpful staff, room was spacious and comfortable, very good breakfast.  Overall, we had a very good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Philip R,  We are so very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel recently. It is nice to see that you took a chance on something different and were not disappointed. Thank you for the compliments on our beautiful location, great service, spacious & comfortable rooms. We are also delighted to know that you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again!  Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods so many times I have lost count.  The unfailing good humor and competence of the staff is outstanding.  The fact that many staff members have been there for years is a credit to General Manager Vince Neale, who can be counted on to refill your coffee cup in the breakfast room!  The rooms are spacious, and the hot water plentiful. But it's the staff that makes the Ayres so special.

Summary Heading: Comfortable hotel at a good price
Summary: We enjoyed a comfortable room that was large enough for two adults and a teenager; the partition wall between the two queen beds was helpful.  Pleasant staff, nicely decorated halls and lobby. Buffet breakfast was included, a bit minimal but useful, and reasonable in view of the price.  Overall, a good experience.

Loved the Christmas promotion saving us 25% off of 4 nights at Ayres. But even without that, this is a great value hotel. We love the location, the cleanliness, newness, beautiful artwork everywhere, full breakfast, free wi fi, guest laundry room, extremely comfortable beds, lots of room, pool and hot tub, and great staff. We've stayed at other Ayres hotels, and they all offer the same exact comfort!  Would highly recommend.

Nice, quiet location, close to 5 freeway and shopping. Our first floor room had a sliding glass door onto a courtyard surrounding the pool (which we didn't use). There was also a large outdoor fireplace and wrought iron tables and chairs - which we also didn't use since we were busy visiting relatives. The cook-to-order breakfast was a pleasant surprise and the servers were very friendly and accommodating. The room was perfect with it's fridge and microwave since we have food allergies and have to bring some things wherever we go. The king bed was comfortable and the shower was roomy with a very nice spray head. My wife liked the jetted tub as well. The staff was polite and helpful and parking was convenient to our room. All in all a great stay and we plan to come again.

I stayed for 3 nights while visiting family that live in Laguna Woods.  Very convenient location to beaches, Disneyland, John Wayne airport.  Fairly large room with 2 comfortable queen beds, bathroom with separate toilet and shower, small table with 2 padded chairs, good size desk with internet connection, refrigerator and small sink, view of parking lot or pool. As close as it was to a busy road we never heard any road noise on the parking lot side of hotel.  The pool area is very nice and private with a dozen full size lounge chairs, towels, heated pool and large spa. Grocery store and Starbucks directly across street. Cons: Had to go outside to use cell phone because of problems with dropped calls, décor is very old fashioned with lots of wallpaper, large paintings framed in

We have stayed at Ayres Laguna Woods on four or five occasions during annual visits. It is far and away our favorite hotel in the area. We appreciate the extras: - cookies at 3 pm at reception  - happy hour 5 pm weekdays - buffet breakfast included in rate - easy accounting for Stash awards (our e-mail address) The hotel is centrally located on El Toro Road.  The staff must be very happy working there because they are all pleasant and friendly. The rooms are well laid out, quiet, large, comfortable and clean. We usually visit over the Christmas holidays, and the lobby is tastefully decorated We always say goodbye to our comfortable room with great regret when it is time to load suitcases into the car and leave.

This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel. It is well situated in the area as it is close to many local services. It is well off the freeway, but close enough for access to many shopping centers and activities. The Ayres Hotel is well appointed, the furniture is lovely, the hotel is clean, the services are wonderful and the customer service is wonderful. They have an excellent morning breakfast as well. There is free WIFI and no parking charges. How can you beat that? I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend it for business travelers as well as families.
Manager Response: Dear luvmigrandkids,  We are so very pleased to see that you enjoyed our hotel so much the first time that you came back for a second visit, it is truly what we strive for. Thank you for the compliments on the convenience, cleanliness, and decor of the hotel. Your kind words are very much appreciated. It is also nice to know you enjoy the extra amenities like complimentary parking, internet, and the full American breakfast buffet. Thank you for taking the time to leave a flattering review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience and for recommending our hotel. We cannot wait to welcome you again.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This was a wonderful place to stay.  Scrupulously clean, friendly staff, comfortable room, and attractive decor.  Great breakfast too, included in the hotel price.  A one-mile walk away along well-tended sidewalks is a nature walk that takes you up to the top of the local hills for panoramic views and a chance to see and smell sagebrush, prickly pear, and other native plants.  I'd be happy to return someday.  The one negative was poor phone reception and slow or nonfunctioning wi-fi in the room.
