Manager Response: Dear RiverChris,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a flattering review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. We are so pleased to see that you found your accommodations to be clean, comfortable, and attractive. Thank you for your kind words about the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. It is also nice to see that you were able to take advantage of the beautiful scenery around the hotel. We cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future and thank you again for your lovely feedback.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Everyone that works at the Ayres hotel is awesome. There is a shuttle service that is free of charge that will take to anywhere you need to go. The rooms are nice and very clean. Free breakfast every morning. All around great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Mr_garc1a,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know that you found our service to be exceptional. It is so very nice to see that you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and shuttle service. We are more than pleased to also see that you found your room to be in excellent condition. Thank you for leaving such a flattering review and we cannot wait to welcome you another time soon. Merry Christmas!  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I first stayed here about 6 years ago and had my first experience with a Belgium waffle maker. It was the greatest waffle I ever had. After that I searched for a waffle iron to make up for this new emptiness in my life but have yet to find one. Recently a Training Opportunity Came up in irvine and I immediately called the ayers and made my reservation with now problems and when I arrived around 430 my room was ready and check in took but a few minutes. The room was clean and comfortable. I walked across the street to Sushi Tomo and got my sushi fix. Then, exhausted and stuffed I headed back to my room to sleep excited about that wonderful waffle waiting for me downstairs. I was worried that I wouldn't be able to sleep or I would have nightmares that maybe the waffles were gone
Manager Response: Dear Dan P.,  Thank you for your kind review on TripAdvisor to let others know how much you enjoy staying with us. We are so very pleased to see you enjoy the waffle maker during our complimentary full American breakfast buffet, they look delicious! Thank you for the compliments on the clean and comfortable accommodations, we are delighted to know you got a good night's rest. Thank you again for the flattering review and we and the waffle maker cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future!  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I was at the Ayres for a conference and the staff was so friendly and helpful. The breakfast (and other meals) were high quality and the room was so spacious! The beds were comfortable and the free wifi helped me get a lot of work accomplished while I was there.

Coming from Geneva, we felt right at home in this beautiful hotel! My husband is here for a conference, while I needed to stay in the room to finish some paperwork before the end of the year. I was so pleased to see the size of the room with a separate sitting area since I would be in the room most of the time. When booking our reservation, I mentioned that we needed 4 synthetic pillows because we were allergic to feathers. The staff went beyond this request to replace the down comforter with a cotton blanket! Upon our arrival, the desk staff mentioned that if we didn't have the 4 pillows yet, to call them immediately. We found everyone in the hotel that we met to be very friendly and accommodating. The furnishings and decor are first class and the tub even has spa jets! The
Manager Response: Dear Lana J.,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. We are so relieved to see that we were able to accommodate your room with the necessary linens; we truly strive to offer the best possible service and are pleased to see that we succeeded in that goal with your special request. Thank you for your compliments on the decor, whirlpool bathtub, and Ayres Dream Sleeper bed. We cannot wait to welcome you another time and thank you again for the flattering review.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel if visiting family at Laguna Woods.
Summary: Very clean, very nice rooms. Great breakfast. Good pool, hit tub and exercise room. Small city park at back of property for short walks. Close to retirement villages. Starbucks close. Large comfortable rooms. Nice lobby. Very comfy bed.  Wifi at no extra charge.

We stayed here two nights while visiting my children in Laguna Beach.  This place was fantastic and a better hotel than ones in Laguna Beach that cost 3-4 times as much!  Clean, comfortable, quiet, easy access from the freeway and close to Laguna Canyon (if you are going to the beach).  One of the best breakfast I've ever had at a hotel too.  I highly recommend it and will definitely stay there again.

We had stayed at this hotel 4 years ago and I still remembered how comfortable our stay was. When we were going to be in the area again, there was no other hotel I wanted to book.   When I went online to look for availability, the Ayers was one of the best priced hotels and it was an easy choice.  The comfort, cleanliness and ease of a buffet breakfast was still on my mind from 4 years prior.

This is defintely a great hotel for business travelers.  Easy to get to.  Great breakfast (omelet station and waffle maker) and a nice happy hour during the week for guests.  The rooms are always nice and have a work area as well.  I would defintely recommend this hotel to business travelers.

We stayed at the Ayers while visiting my father, who lives in Laguna Woods, and we could not have chosen better. The hotel is clean, the rooms are spacious, the parking is free and accessible and the breakfast is probably the best free breakfast we have ever enjoyed.  In addition the hotel has a PC in the lobby (free wifi everywhere by-the-way) which is connected to a printer. You can easily print your boarding pass- and, unlike some hotels, there is no charge to print.  In short, we were treated to everything we needed and then some.  Although we did not have time to enjoy it, the hotel also has a happy hour.

We really were very lucky to have stumbled upon this hotel. The service was very nice, rooms were exceptionally clean and rooms were in excellent condition. Pool area was nice with a pretty fountain and tables to have breakfast outside, if weather permits. The breakfast was nice, made to order pancakes & fried eggs. Make your own waffles are available too. We really enjoyed the room with pony wall separating the two beds, it gave much needed privacy. I would stay here again.

Great hotel. Our room was clean, the staff was friendly and their morning breakfast is hot and delicious.  The hotel is quiet and affordable.  The afternoon cookies were extra delicious.  They offered shuttle service to local area's which was a great help.

Excellent stay!  Beautiful building and great service - just a  short drive to the ocean.  Great breakfast included.  Rooms are large and well maintained.  Staff was helpful and friendly.  Good restaurants are nearby. Everything was very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Mhcady,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a favorable review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. Your compliments of the exceptional service are greatly appreciated. We are so pleased to see that you found the hotel clean and your accommodations large and well maintained. We truly strive to make every one of our guests' stays as pleasant as possible and are so delighted to see that we achieved that goal with your visit. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Room had plenty of pillows, which my wife likes.  Very quiet and away from the traffic. Personnel very accommodating and the breakfast was delicious.  The front desk had hot cookies where we were there.  I wish they had an electric car charging station there, as this would have been an unannounced extra and something that more hotels should install.
Manager Response: Dear jaSantana,  It was truly an honor to welcome you as our guest recently. We are so pleased to see that you were able to find some peace and quiet at our hotel. Thank you for the compliments on the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and hot cookies, they are greatly appreciated. Your feedback is very important to us and we will definitely consider your input about electric car charging stations when making upgrades to the hotel. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review to let others know about your experience, we hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Whenever we visit our son in Aliso Viejo, California, we stay at the Ayres Hotel.  We stay for many reasons, and certainly proximity is one.  More importantly, it now feels a bit like home away from home, as the personnel are all so especially friendly and welcoming. The hotel is always immaculately clean and comfortable, the breakfasts varied and delicious, and the room prices competitive. We had my five year old grandson with us this time, and he was made particularly welcome and like us, loved the special attention of the chef and the delicious afternoon fresh-baked cookies! I'm looking forward to our next visit, and would not consider staying anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear JDorman,  We are so very appreciative of your visits on several occasions. We truly strive to make every one of our guests' experiences as exceptional as possible and worthy of multiple visits, we are so thrilled to see that we have succeeded in that goal with your visits. To see that you would not consider staying anywhere else when in the area, is so very flattering. Thank you for your compliments on how clean and comfortable your accommodations always are, they are greatly appreciated. We thank you for your feedback and cannot wait to welcome you back once again.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Delightful place to stay, rooms are large and comfortable. All of the personnel are friendly and very helpful. They are quite accommodating and will pick you up from JW airport. The Breakfasts and afternoon cookies are always a hit. It is close to shopping centers, freeways and great restaurants. We stay here often to visit family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear KarenGP70,  It was such a delight to have you stay with us again recently. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know what you think of our hotel. We are so delighted to see that you find our service to be of the highest quality, it is truly what we strive for. It is also nice to know you find the location very convenient and a good place to stay when visiting your family and friends. We cannot wait to welcome you another time and look forward to your return, thank you again.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We came here for a church event. We had a group of 70+ people and the staff were very accommodating to our needs. The rooms and everything were nicely laid out with beautiful decor. I would definitely come back with my family or friends next time when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Jen L.,  Thank you very much for staying with us during your church event; we are so pleased we were able to accommodate your group. Your compliments on the rooms and their decor are so very appreciated. We are also delighted to see that you found our service to be attentive. We hope you will be visiting the area soon to visit family and friends so that next time, we may impress you enough for a 5 star rating. Thank you again!  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Staff was very friendly and very helpful. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Great value in pricing. Great location, within walking distance of restaurants and shopping. Would recommend staying here if in town for business or pleasure. We'll be back again!

I enjoyed my visit to Ayres Hotel Laguna.  The rooms were nice and spacious.  There is a kitchen area with a fridge, microwave and sink.  The fridge did make some noises, but it wasn't too bad.  I did not get to join the Happy Hour, but the breakfast was nice.  There were a lot of choices with a chef to prepare omelets.  I had breakfast in the garden area which was beautiful.  The gym was nice, but the remote for the television did not work so I had to watch telenovelas!  I enjoyed the free wifi!

We had to stay in Laguna Woods for a wedding and this was the recommended hotel.  The furnishings were beautiful!  We had a room for the three of us with a sofa bed for my son.  There was a partition that gave me & my husband privacy without having to pay for a suite.  The matress was very good with large pillows.  The pool area is like a Mediterranian garden.  Breakfast was very good with eggs, bacon, potatoes, waffles.

Large, clean rooms, comfortable beds, consistent 5 star service over a 6 week stay; Professional, friendly, caring staff; Excellent Free breakfast -- Omelettes, Fried, Specials, fruit, cereal, pastries, Mon-Thur wine&beer happy hour; cookies at around 4pm and throughout the evening; Excellent Laguna Woods Village location; 15 min to Laguna Beach -- 5 minutes to the Freeway, 5 min to mall.  dozens of fast and full service dining options within 5 minutes, courtesy transport to John Wayne airport

This hotel was delightful. Rooms were clean & comfortable. Staff were super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was a full American breakfast (good, but not great). Still, I couldn't believe the amazing experience for the price - a definite value!!

We travel often to the area and have stayed here many, many times because we can depend on the excellence.  Quiet, clean rooms with ammenities, super comfortable beds, great breakfasts, calm surroundings, wonderful staff - just a great experience all around.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in the Laguna Woods Area
Summary: The Ayres is a great small chain hotel.  The rooms are well worth the price.  I stay here every time I am in the Orange County area for business.  Breakfast in the morning is cooked how you like it and the staff is friendly.  The managers reception in the evening is a nice way to end the day.

Summary Heading: One of Hotel to looking forword to check in again
Summary: Good, clean and well placed room for bussiness trips. Good breakfast though choice is limited for Vegitarians like me. Fast internet speed with evening happy hours and good parking space makes hotel to choose for bussiness trips.

I regularly stay at Ayers Laguna Woods for work.  Every time I am provided good, friendly service, and I love how large the rooms are.  The full, hot breakfast is great in the morning and the free drinks and appetizers at night are wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear Tracie1234,  Thank you very much for taking the time to let others know about your recent stays at our hotel on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased to see that every time we have the chance to welcome you back that you encounter friendly service, it is truly what we strive for. It is also nice to know that you find your room to be large and enjoy the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and evening Manager's Reception. Thank you again, we cannot wait to welcome you once more.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice stay and great staff
Summary: Very nice, clean, spacious room and staff is very helpful, especially at reception and breakfast. The manager makes sure tables are available and clean for the great breakfast, with eggs and omelets made to order and make your own waffles (my personal favorite). Location is great, parking is easy. Minor suggestions: There were not enough hangers in the closet. Housekeeping brought more on request. It was nice to have a refrigerator and extra sink in the 'living room' area. With all that space, there could have been more drawer space for clothes and 2 sinks by the bathroom would make it even better. My husband did not like the European decor but I thought the room was fine. All in all a very positive experience and I would stay there again and recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear jmg2525,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent stay at our hotel. We are so pleased to see that you thought your accommodations were clean and spacious. Thank you for your compliments on our customer service and complimentary full American breakfast buffet. Also, thank you for your suggestions and comments. We will be sure to keep them in mind throughout our next renovations. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Another excellent stay at Aryes Laguna Woods
Summary: My husband and I stay at this hotel a few times each year while visiting family in the area.  The staff is consistently friendly, Rose always has a smile on her face year after year.  The breakfast staff cooks your eggs and bacon to order as well as many other items available.  The outdoor area is spacious near the pool for entertaining family who visit us at the hotel.  This hotel chain must train their employees about courtesy and customer service because everyone has a positive attitude and is willing to help, especially since my husband uses a walker.  We will be back in few months!
Manager Response: Dear KidsinCalifornia,  It was an honor to have you as our guest recently, we are so grateful for the fantastic 5 star rating and the kindly worded review. Thank you for the compliments on our friendly and accommodating service, your kind sentiments will definitely be shared with the team. It is nice to see that you enjoyed the outdoor courtyard and were able to host your family visits, we hope they were as big of fans as you were! Thank you again and we hope to see you in the near future.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent business stay at Ayres Laguna Woods.
Summary: Plush, quiet rooms with more than enough room to spread out and work. The staff was attentive and even tried to procure ticktets to a sold out event. Complimentary breakfast was freshly prepared and made for a nice start to the day. Hotel is convienent to beaches (6 miles), SNA (10 miles), and Disney (15 miles). I will certainly stay here again.

Hotel very nice, clean, staff attentive to all details. This is second visit to your hotel.  My room always clean and ample supplies available.  Breakfast was exceptional and chef cooked to order.  PM reception was good.   Would suggest easy chair for sitting, I would prefer single bed in room instead of 2 double beds, I would like king bed.  Hotel close to my location of meeting and all restuarants nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie K.,  We were so very honored to welcome you back to our hotel on your recent visit. We truly strive to have reoccurring guests and are so pleased to see that you chose us again. Thank you for your compliments on the hotel's location and our customer service, they are greatly appreciated. It is also nice to see that you enjoy the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and Manager's Reception. We apologize if the number of beds was not to your liking and hope that the next time you come to stay with us we will be able to satisfy you completely. Thank you again and we hope to see you in the near future for a third stay!  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods this week.  While only there for 1 night and for business, I enjoyed the stay.  The rooms are large and very comfortable/quiet.  The outside patio was enjoyable and the weather was great.  I really enjoyed the complimentary happy hour.  The staff were friendly and the warm cookies at check in were delicious.  The complimentary breakfast was delicious and offered many choices.

This was the second time my wife and I stayed at this hotel in Laguna Woods, near Soka University where we attended a Jazz Festival. The room was clean, spacious, and well appointed. The staff was friendly and helpful. And we had a real breakfast with good, tasty food including eggs, waffles, fruit, etc. With very reasonable room rates, free parking and wi-fi, and great location, I highly recommend this wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce S.,  Thank you very much for taking the time to recommend our hotel through leaving a review on TripAdvisor. We are honored to welcome you back for the Jazz Festival. We sincerely appreciate the compliments of our well appointed, spacious, and clean accommodations. It is nice to know that you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet as well. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you another time in the near future.  Sincerley, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I have done m,ore traveling this year then before.  I have to say that the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods has been the hotel I compare others against.  The rooms are well appointed, the in room wi-fi is the fastest and most reliable I have used in any hotel.  When they advertise 'breakfast', they deliver.  No pre-packaged muffins, cereal and coffee.  They have fresh scrambled eggs and a cook who will d fried eggs for you.  Ral bacon and potatoes, fresh pastries nd bagels as well as never ending coffee.  I will continue to stay here in the future (grandkids live 5 minutes away) fpr both it's value and convenience to major highways and the Santa Ana airport.

Very nice hotel and lovely staff. I would recommend staying here to anyone. The curtains made the room very dark and it was very quiet. I was there for a conference at a nearby hotel that charged $149/night. I was very pleased with the size of the rooms, the nice bath tub, mini-bar and sofa. Thank you goes out to the staff and management!

I was in Laguna Woods for a one night business stopover.  Enjoyed the spacious room and roaming the hallways looking at paintings of 19th century European scenes.  Breakfast better than average with a chef onsight cooking the eggs and a big bowl of fresh fruit that included strawberries and blueberries and melon. Yum!   A shout out to Minnie who answered the phone when I called after I had hit the road and realized I had left my hairbrush on the bathroom sink.  She dropped what she was doing and went to get it immediately.  I picked it up in a well labeled envelope at the front desk ten hours later.  Big thanks, Minnie!

We were in the area for our daughter's engagement party and stayed here due to all the good reviews.   We were not disappointed!   The hotel staff was courteous, the rooms were spacious, comfortable, and very clean.  The locations was perfect for a little sightseeing and being close to Mission Viejo our main goal.     Also the breakfast was delicious with a wide assortment and a beautiful patio area to enjoy your morning!

I absolutely enjoyed my first-time-every stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods! It's beautiful, well maintained hotel, with a helpful staff.  What makes me want to stay again is the obvious quality throughout---from the spa tube to the complimentary full breakfast and state-of-the-art fitness center.  It's a MUST-STAY!

I was in the area to handle a very stressful situation. What a relief it was to come back each day and stay at such a wonderful hotel, The service, the facility, and breakfast are fantastic. The GM, Mr. Neale, Minnie at the front desk, breakfast cooks, and entire staff provide such a caring service when rarely sees. The breakfast choices each day was first rate and i enjoyed the omelettes, pancakes, variety of fresh fruits, etc. This hotel is not only the best in the area, it is #1 for me anywhere i stay.

I previously stayed at the ayres in corona calif where i was highly dissapointed with EVRYTHING including the manger Scott Smith although this location in laguna woods was awesome! evrything was great including the front desk clerk MINNIE who was helpful, informative, friendly etc etc

Great service, as usual.  very courteous staff.  Had a problem with room key, but after several attempts got replacement keys.   Breakfast a little on the disappointed side, but remainder of stay (only one night) went well.  See you next time.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald F.,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience at our hotel. We are so glad to see that you chose to celebrate your birthday here. While we are pleased to see that you think our service is great we wish we could have wowed you more in terms of the complimentary American breakfast buffet. Hopefully the next time you stay we might succeed in that goal. We look forward to seeing you in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: After a blemished experience at this Ayres last year, I returned with a friend for another night's stay and was very pleased. I believe that a convergence of several unexpected and unusual circumstances made our previous stay less than comfortable--a light burning out, staff interruptions, noise in the hall. This time, however, our stay exceeded our expectations. The beds were exceedingly comfortable. The room was quiet. The shower separated from the sink allowed privacy and prevented steamy buildup. In addition, the breakfast was well-done and in at least three instances, hotel staff greeted me with a smile and in one instance offered assistance. I will stay here again when in the area visiting family.

We have always returned to this hotel and did so again last weekend. We just love the location, the decor, the staff and the extra cookies and breakfast.  We have never been disappointed and it is close to anything you may want. This is by far our favorite hotel and will continue to stay there anytime we visit the area.

Summary Heading: Not sure what all the fuss is about
Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a week with my husband for a work trip.  Was looking forward to it after reading the good reviews, but once I got there, I wasn't sure what everyone was talking about.  The staff at the front desk was not helpful.  Anytime we requested anything, the staff said we should "come back later".  They never offered to make a note of things and contact us, nor did they specify what time they meant by later.  We were put in a handicap room which meant the bathroom was large and the room was rather cramped.  The setup for the shower was poorly designed and got the entire bathroom wet, each time, without fail (this was the result of poor design, not the fact that it was handicap accessible).   When we asked if we could switch rooms, the staff was wholly unhelpful.
Manager Response: Dear liveinchina,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a candid review on TripAdvisor to inform others of your previous stay with us. Our sincerest apologies if you did not find your accommodations to be exceptional. We are very distressed to hear that you found your interactions with team members to be lacking. We are generally known for our warm service and friendly atmosphere, so we apologize for this. One of the company's core values is We Care About People and I will be sure to reiterate this with our team members. Again, I apologize and hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: The best hotel value per dollar
Summary: Ayers figured out how to provide a 5 star experience for a fraction of the price: The beds are great, kitchenettes allow for personal food choices whenever desired, the breakfasts and happy hours (including free beer!) are incredible, the well maintained and lovely patio and pool areas are as good as anywhere.  The design of the halls and decor reflect high end, while they offer free parking and the happiest and most gracious desk staff as you will find anywhere. The rooms are much larger than your average hotel room and come with free WiFi a free daily newspaper during the weekdays and very comfortable living room furniture.  Even the desk chair is a high quality office chaair.

We have stayed at the Ayres on several occasions, once even bringing a family group here for my mother's 90th birthday.  The hotel is ALWAYS spotless and ready for guests, but the crowning touch is the service.  Once, out of the blue, an employee offered to shuttle us to a local restaurant so we could have a celebratory drink and not have to drive. The breakfast is far and away above what you might expect.  The pool is an added bonus.  You WILL NOT be disappointed. Forget the rest, Ayres Laguna Woods is the best.
Manager Response: Dear Gallerymic,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review to let others know about your experiences with our hotel. It is such an honor and delight to welcome you back on various occasions; thank you for choosing us to celebrate and stay. We truly strive to create the best possible experience for our guests and are thrilled to see that we succeeded that goal with your visits. We hope to see you in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely, Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: They were great. My husband and I felt comfortable. The service was friendly and helpful. The breakfasts were very good, and hot. The cocktail hour was a nice surprise. The pool was clean and attractive. Our room was elegant appearing. There were very nice gardens. There were several restaurants and stores nearby. This was a pleasant surprise for staying in the LA area. We would come again.

Ayers is a  great place to stay - Awesome breakfeast  and free-- free happy hour from 5-7pm give you complimentry beer and wine -- nice staff --rooms are clean and the decor has a ton of charm. comfy beds -- you cant go wrong.

Gotta love this place... In the tradition of the esteemed Ayres Hotels, this one shines...  Great Staff, Beautiful Decor, Fresh Hot Breakfast, Gorgeous pool and (Service) dogs welcome... Umpteenth stay here and NEVER disappointed by the cheerful, informative Assis,  & company at the front desk, then breakfast courtesy of the hospitable & charming Fabiola, Alex & Aida... Spotless, Elegant Rooms are serviced so conscientiously by Maria & the Housekeeping staff...  The Brandman University of Nursing has picked a winner in this venue...

It is not often you can find great value in pricey Southern Orange County.  The Ayres delivers it, and then some.  Great hotel with excellent access to the OC for business, shopping, visiting family and only a short ride to Laguna Beach.  Terrific staff, great breakfast and really good internet, all at reasonable prices.  After years of putting up with either sub-standard accommodations or over priced good ones, it't great to have found the Ayers.

I can't say enough nice things about my trip and my experience at this hotel.  The rooms are very nice and comfortable, the breakfast's were great, and the staff was extremely nice and accommodating. They go out of their way to go the extra mile and get to know their visitors.

When you're lying in bed and someone flushes the toilet in your room,...it screams loud and I am not talking about just a second or two. It goes on and on until the tank is filled. Which of course is a water saver so it fills up slowly. You won't need an alarm clock. Breakfast was excellent as well as the staff. The flat tv screens could be a little larger.

I have been staying at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods on business trips to Orange County for the past four years.  I have never had a stay that was short of outstanding.  Rooms are clean, spacious, and comfortable.  Staff are friendly, helpful, and always willing to go the extra mile.  The manager, Vincent, is personable and seems to want to connect with each and every guest to make sure their stay is pleasant.  I strongly recommend the Ayres, and always look forward to my next stay.

Summary Heading: Quiet, Convenient, Impressive Boutique Hotel Experience
Summary: Great value and very quiet are two key words for this Laguna Woods Ayres Hotel.  Staff was very nice and accommodating at front desk.  Breakfast was more than ample.  Location is perfect.  On floor laundry machines was an added surprise.

I am a frequent guest of Ayres Hotel at Laguna Woods and wish to share a recent "above and beyond services" experience.  After having a great workout in the gym, I was getting ready for work and unfortunately dropped one of my earrings in the sink drain.  I tried to retrieve it but that resulted in the earring falling out of sight.  I notified the receptionist at the front desk and headed to work.  Wouldn't you know they not only retrieved my earring but delivered it to my workplace.  Sweet!  The staff is amazing and incredibly accommodating!

This is my second visit to an Ayres hotel --  Mission Viejo and Laguna Woods.  Both locations were top notch.  Great accomodations, friendly helpful staff and wonderful complimentary breakfast.  Wouldn't change a thing.

I stayed at the Ayres during a business trip in August, for me it worked great! Check in, Check out with no problem, No noise, Good restaurant, Everything worked perfect, Room very clean and great bed.  I recommend it, not one problem whatsoever...  Thanks!

This very well appointed hotel is geared for the business traveller.  There is a full breakfast served to guests for free each morning.  There is also a small happy hour Monday through Thursday (not Friday through Sunday).  Free wireless Internet is available throughout the hotel.  What you will not receive, however, is a full night's sleep.  This hotel was constructed with little or no sound-proofing.  You will hear the flushing of toilets (those new super charged types), running of showers, shutting of drawers and doors, and even conversations in rooms, hallways and outside.  Since this is primarily a business hotel, some guests don't retire until late at night, so don't plan on sleeping before midnight.  Many are up before the crack of dawn.    If you do not require more than

I've been staying at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods for years and love it there.  They provide outstanding customer service, a great breakfast buffet with a chef cooking made to order eggs and omelets, and lovely european style rooms.  In addition, they have a great gym which they recently expanded...which includes brand new treadmills, elliptical machines, bikes, weights, medicine balls, stability balls, etc.  I've never been disappointed there.  The location is also great..just 10 minutes from Laguna Beach, Irvine Spectrum and all the hot spots in Orange County.

Great location for a get-way and enjoying a nice environment.  Our room was simply beautiful.  Great location away from the traffic and crowds attending The Pageant of the Masters and activities around Laguna Beach.

I recently had an extended stay at the Ayres Laguna Woods.  The room was very comfortable and spacious.  The daily breakfast was very convenient, and the M-Thursday happy hour was very relaxing.  The staff went above and beyond to make sure all requests were met including a shuttle pick up from the airport, helpful dining suggestions, they even found a wine opener for me!  The downside was there were several large groups staying there who were very noisy!  Overall, it was a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear GourmetGirlie,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience at our hotel. We are ecstatic that you chose us for your extended stay. It is great to see that you enjoyed the complimentary full American Breakfast Buffet every morning of your stay. Glad to have assisted you in your wine opener search too! As for the noisy groups, we sincerely apologize if this inhibited your stay at all. We hope that you will visit again in the near future.  Thank you again.  Sincerely, Vince Ward General Manager

Summary: This is a small chain of So Cal hotels that is a cut above your normal Hiltons, Marriotts, etc.  First off, there are 4 kinds of just baked cookies when you check in!  The whole lobby smelled like cookies...then the room - ours was a 2 queen room that had a substantial divider between the beds - if you like this idea, ask for it, because not all queen rooms have it (another in our party had a normal room with no dividers).  The room had a mini fridge, microwave and sink in the room.  So, it's great if you want to have snacks in the room.  Furnishings are traditional style (think chippendale style) with quite a few framed art works on the wall.  Room was VERY quiet.  Breakfast had the usual continental items (cereal,toast,fruit,oatmeal, yoghurt) plus make your own waffles AND a

My family and I were staying at  the Ayres Hotel for the first time, We very happy with the services, the Hotel was very clean and all staffs were  understanding and  friendsly. Breakfirst was fresh and chef cook was so quick to server avery single guest.We would love to come back and stay at the same Hotel for the next time when we  visit California.Thank to all the people at the Ayres Hotel had been an excellent jobs while we stayed there.

Myself and other family members live in the local area and have all used this hotel on several occasions when our homes have been under repair for various reasons and we had to find somewhere to stay for a night or two on short notice.  Most recently, my mother had to have major plumbing repairs and asbestos removal from her home and stayed at the Ayres while the work was done.  The rooms are clean and quiet with all the amenities.  We like that it is a smaller hotel (3 floors) so it never feels overcrowded even when it's at capacity.  The free breakfast is excellent.  Made-to-order omelettes and eggs and there are waffle machines to make your own waffles.   Most importantly, the staff is extremely helpful.  My mother left some important papers related to her home repairs in her

Summary Heading: Great place with clean, spacious rooms.
Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods in August 2013 to attend the Pageant of the Masters.  This is our fourth or fifth time at the property.  We had some issues last year, but this year all was back to normal.  The hotel is well maintained, the rooms are very spacious and clean, and the pool area is very nice.  Breakfast, which is very good, is included with the price of the room.  The folks that work the breakfast room make eggs, omelets, pancakes, etc.  Plus they have the regular continental breakfast.  I feel that I have pretty high standards for hotels, and this one makes the grade.  That being said, keep in mind, this is not the Ritz, but it is a very nice mid-tier hotel that you will make you feel comfortable.  And I have found, if there is a problem, staff works hard to

Location was perfect for easy access to Laguna Woods, where we had a family reunion.  Breakfast was a better than average continental breakfast.  A couple of restaurants within easy walking distance.  Only challenge we had was the noise coming from the room above us, which I think housed some kids for a sports tournament.  We just dealt with it.  No doubt our kids created the same annoyance years ago!

Summary Heading: Easy to access laguana attractions. Family friendly.
Summary: This was a nice way to enjoy the pageant of the masters and visit laguana beach. We also took in a great hike through willow creek that had great views of crystal cove  The made to order breakfast was really great and the cook was all smiles. I would suggest longer breakfast hours for the weekday too. Maybe 930.  The bar, kitchen area helped for a quick snack and storing cold drinks. The pool and jacuzzi area was also enjoyable. Gym was well equipped. Loved the fresh baked cookies.  Good way to welcome late travelors.  They smelled up the place and were irresistible.

It was one of the better hotels that I have ever stayed in in the US. And I have traveled to almost every major city in this country on both business and pleasure. I will definitely return to this hotel whenever I am in this area again.

The staff at the Laguna Woods location could not have been more welcoming and responsive to our large sports team group. They made long days a pleasure with the cookies at night and healthy breakfast in the morning. Everyone was friendly and gracious.

My son and I spent 4 days and nights at this inn. It was a great stay. Modern, plush, clean and comfortable with truly great support from the staff. Nicely appointed, good sized rooms with a wet bar area.  Great facility for the price. Great treatment every time by the staff. Good location - quiet.  That's it - the stay was great.
Manager Response: Dear dlangston -  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you recently and for your kind recommendation. We are always thrilled to hear a guest has found his or her stay truly exceptional. We thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers and hope you will visit again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent value near beautiful Laguna Beach
Summary: Lovely property in Laguna Woods, a short drive to fabulous Laguna Beach. Rooms are well appointed and staff is friendly and helpful. A custom made hot breakfast is included. Reasonably priced, especially compared to the outrageous rates of the beach area hotels. The hotel has two elevators, one in each wing. There is also a guest laundry for those who are require it. Additionally there's a small fitness centre and an outdoor pool.
Manager Response: Dear Thornhillite -  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. It was wonderful having the chance to welcome you recently during your trip to the Laguna Beach area. We do strive to provide the best value and accommodations to our guests, so I am pleased you found you everything from the price to the complimentary full breakfast to your liking. We appreciate your kind words and hope you will visit again in the near future.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: this was our favourite hotel during our road trip, the staff were great and always seemed happy to help.  The rooms are more luxurious than the usual hotel with good quality furniture and carpets.  Breakfast was a massive plus for this hotel, with a good choice and eggs made to order, There is also an happy hour every evening which is a bonus.  We enjoyed the quiet pool area and hot tub and only an hour away from the tourist attractions of L.A and in a safe clean area, this hotel was perfect for our needs.
Manager Response: Dear TTate -  It was an honor having you as our guest recently. Thank you so much choosing us for your stay and for your kind words. It means such a great deal to us to have earned a place as your favorite hotels of all the hotels you visited on your trip! Your recommendation is most appreciated and we hope you will visit again soon.   Safe travels,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 3 days as well as some of our guests!! Convenient location and excellent staff!!!Website showed that hotel was full , but some of our guests went directly to the hotel and were acommodated!
Manager Response: Dear louellamch -  First off, congratulations on your recent nuptials! Thank you so much for choosing to make us even a small part of it. We know that the planning and execution of a wedding can be stressful, so we do out utmost to make the hotel experience and comfortable and convenient as possible. We are thrilled everyone enjoyed their stays. We are grateful for your review and hope to welcome you back very soon (maybe for a first anniversary?).   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: stayed the weekend in june.  clean and nicely appointed rooms for the price. decent  ( nothing fancy) breakfast  included.  no bellman and only one elevator (I think).  make sure you taste the cookies in the lobby around 4 pm!
Manager Response: Dear Fast4d -  It was a pleasure welcoming you recently. Thank you so much for your review and for choosing us for your stay. I am pleased you found your guestroom comfortable and the delicious complimentary cookies a welcome treat. Your recommendation is most appreciated and we hope to welcome you back very soon.   Regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent value for a comfortable stay
Summary: Staff here knows what hospitality is about, they were always smiling,willing to accomodate requests from me. I was picked up by the shuttle( they came only for me!) and dropped off as well. They have happy hour every day starting at 5 pm and breakfast(hot) is free.  The rooms are excellent and comfortable. Thanks Ayres, will be back!

Summary Heading: Very clean and a great value!
Summary: The rooms were very clean and the breakfast was better than I would have expected from a "3" star hotel. The staff was very friendly and truly cared about making your stay enjoyable. I would highly recommend this hotel and look forward to staying here again when the time comes.

The staff at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods were all very friendly.  The location is quiet, the rooms comfortable.  The staff were very helpful in offering suggestions about places to eat.  The shuttle drivers were friendly.  I would absolutely go there again.

Stayed here several times for business.  Love this hotel.  Very friendly, comfortable, peaceful & humble.  Very clean and beautiful.  Like home away from home.  Something very relaxing about this property which I believe begins with the Manager Vince and his amazing staff.

Both Mom & Dad and our girls enjoyed our stay at Ayers Hotel Laguna Woods.  Location is terrific to get down to the beach or head into Anaheim to visit Disneyland.  The breakfast was excellent and handy before we started our day.  The reception in the evening was also great and a chance for Mom & Dad to relax with a glass of wine while the kids swam in the pool and enjoyed a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie.  The wireless Wi-Fi was complimentary and the hard wired connection in the room was fast enough to stream content from our Slingbox back at home.  Great hotel.

I stay at the Ayres Laguna Woods quite often and it is always inviting, clean and comfortable!  The staff is always pleasant and helpful and the location is perfect and close to our offices.  It's a win-win!

My husband and I stayed for our first wedding anniversary in the corner king room. The Ayres Laguna Woods reminded me of being in a Las Vegas themed hotel, where the chairs, the drapes, the carpet, everything belonged in a Victorian mansion. It made our stay feel more romantic, and refreshingly different than a Best Western or the like. Everything was very clean, and the bed was very plush. We never did wake up early enough to enjoy our complimentary made-to-order breakfast, but we both enjoyed our stay very much.  A very easy drive to Laguna Beach (we went to the beach, the shops, dinner, and the Pageant of the Masters) but it might take you 10 minutes depending on traffic.

This was our first time at a Ayres Hotel property.  I was pleasantly surprised by all the amenities included with our stay.  The complimentary breakfast was delicious.  There was a wide variety of items to choose from.  I appreciated the "green" approach in the rooms, i.e. the electricity conservation.  Each staff member was friendly and welcoming.  There was only one elevator in the hotel, so i we did ride the elevator with the maid and her service cart numerous times.  It wasn't an inconvenience because they would always allow us to go first, but maybe they can build a service elevator to help out the staff.  Overall, it was en enjoyable experience.

I totally enjoyed my recent stay at the Ayres in Laguna Woods.  I travel a lot and stay in many hotels (all price ranges) and this stay was totally enjoyable.   It was really a personal experience with the staff being extra helpful,  free breakfasts and the wonderful cookies at night!  My room was great with free wi-fi, a mini fridge, easy access (only 3 floors to deal with) and just a certain charm to the room that made it a little retreat at the end of the day.  The staff easily provided free van transport when I needed it and was actually waiting for me at the train station when I arrived (a great feeling as I had not used the train before).  I definitely plan to stay at the Ayres hotels whenever that is an option!   Another first was the "thank you note" from the room maid
Manager Response: Dear Donna -  It was an honor having you as our guest. Thank you so much for choosing us for your visit and for taking the time to share your positive experience. I have the great pleasure of working with a wonderful team where each person strives exceedingly hard to provide the best possible hotel stay to each and every guest. I will be sure to pass along your comments so they know how much they are appreciated. We hope your travels bring you to the area again soon.   Thanks again,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Ayres is everything a hotel should strive to be. Excellent customer service, rooms were nice, pool area was clean. Only complaint was I couldn't watch the Dodger game, but I had a blast. Would recommend to my colleagues.
Manager Response: Dear AmartinezHarris -  Wow! Thank you so much for your glowing review and enthusiastic recommendation. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that a guest has found us to be everything a hotel should be. We love providing guests with the warmest possible service and most comfortable accommodations, so it is always wonderful to know that we have met this goal. We appreciate your comments and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Wonderful stay.  Free breakfast is good.  Rooms are very comfortable, spacious, and clean.  Staff was very kind.  Exercise room was good.  Shuttle picked me up from airport within 20 minutes of phoning.  Happy hour was nice (although I stuck to drinking water).  Within walking distance to a grocery store, Subway, and some other local restaurants.  My only complaint would be that the pool does not open until 7am; I had to leave the hotel for work by 7:30am.  Shuttle service does not begin until 7:30am.

These Ayres hotels are my favorite hotels in Southern California. Other hotel chains should get the notebooks out and learn from these hotels, from the staff, the ammenities, to thier rooms, they are always top notch. Some of the hotels are by the local airports which make them easier to get to as well.

Summary Heading: A Charming Hotel in Laguna Woods
Summary: This was our first time experiencing the Ayres Hotels and we were very impressed with the overall service and quality of the hotel. We had an extended stay of 5 nights and we were delighted with a wonderful European style breakfast and excellent chocolate chip cookies each day. We were only able to experience the happy hour with excellent wine once during our stay. The room was comfortable and clean. The staff was so pleasant and willing to help in any way. We are now converts to the Ayres Hotel chain whenever we stay in Southern California.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Hotel in Laguna Woods CA!
Summary: This is my third time staying at the Ayres in Laguna Woods and it gets better each time! They have a top notch staff that are courteous, well trained, helpful and friendly!  The rooms are beautiful and clean! From the artwork to the furniture you’ll feel like you’re in a Five Star Hotel! The pool and courtyard are also a big plus and they offer a great full breakfast! Fresh baked cookies await your evening arrival and they have a happy hour during the week! I look forward to our next family gathering in Laguna Woods and will stay at the Ayres Hotel!

Last minute decision. Loved it!  Free happy hours with booze.  Great breakfast. Nice staff. Ryan was very helpful. Nice pool with outside seating. Nice gym. Lots of free cookies. Loved it. I would definitely come back.

We were traveling in SoCal and intended on going to Palm Springs. We had a last minute change in plans due to a wildfire in the Palm Springs area. We weren't sure where to go. We found this hotel on a third party hotel site and really lucked out. The breakfast is amazing  and the choices are really nice (omelet station with chef, fresh made waffles, etc). We stayed on a Wednesday and Thursday and both nights they had a happy hour (cheese, crackers, fruit, veggies/dip, pizza, beer, soda, and wine). The staff is exceptionally friendly.

I love this hotel and stay here every time my company has a meeting.  The pillows, the beds, the rooms it's all just wonderful and comfortable. Perfect for the business traveler or those looking for a little bit of a romantic get away.

Our room was super comfy, the staff was very friendly and helpful, breakfast was delicious, outdoor courtyard was beautiful, and the paintings on the walls were fancy. Wish we could have stayed longer.

Summary Heading: Love this place but they need roll-a-ways!
Summary: Our family of 5 all enjoyed our stay at the Laguna beach Aters hotel. I was impress by the amount of high-end materials like marble wood tile and granite. The classic paintings of the masters everywhere and beautiful wood moldings made you feel like you were in a European city and not orange county. For 5 of us value is very impoortant so the cooked breakfast was great and probably saved us 60 bucks if we ate at a restaurant. The workout room was equipped with pro quality machines and the pool was ok as well. I did notice the guy checking chemistry and the pool and spa were very clean (no foam) even with quite a few kids in it. It seems like they are obsessed with cleanliness because I looked in all the typical places and this place sparkles. Now for the negatives. As I said

Excellent choice for staying near Laguna Beach. Incredible breakfast included in room rate. Friendly helpful staff. Nicely landscaped and you can take your breakfast outside to enjoy the fresh clean air.

Most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on ANYWHERE! The breakfast was exceptional. The staff was incredible on all levels. Front desk, maid service, handyman, they were all friendly and helpful. Freshly baked cookies were plentiful every day. My omelet was made with a big smile and exactly as ordered. Fresh ingredients made our morning meals even more delicious. Being able to sit outside or inside was a big treat. I especially appreciate the option of taking my coffee to go in the am. The coffee pot was always on and fresh throughout the day.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods
Summary: I stay here on a regular basis.  It's like home away from home when I travel for business.  They recently upgraded the fitness room, and it is really nice now.  The staff are so friendly, and Vince, the general manager, makes a point of stopping by breakfast to chat with the guests.  It is a safe and comfortable hotel, and I always enjoy my stays.

Travel frequently takes me to Orange County and I ALWAYS stay at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods.  The personnel are amazingly courteous and helpful.  The accommodations are immaculate and breakfast is scrumptious!  Whether I am alone on business or vacationing with the family, this is my first and only choice of where to stay.  The hotel is close to everything - beach, restaurants, shopping, and all the major attractions.  An EXCEPTIONAL value too!

Stayed Fri, Sat and Sun Expected moderately decent place...instead found spacious upscale boutique modern hotel  in great location that, on top of all that, included a hot breakfast! This is a gobackagain place.
Manager Response: Dear Rudman8661 -  Thank you so much for allowing us the chance to welcome you and for your kind review. We love hearing that we are able to exceed a guest's expectations with our service and comfortable accommodations. I am thrilled we have become a "gobackagain" place for you and hope you will come back again soon!  Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We had a room on the third floor at the end of the floor.  Our room was SO big, quiet, and comfortable (a full-sized dining table in the room!!!), that it was easy to forget there were other guests!  The breakfast was ample and varied- a treat for sure!

Summary Heading: A terrific value, and a great property
Summary: We have stayed at hotels in and around the Laguna beach area just about every Fourth of July, and this was by far the best property and best value.  Pricing is definitely comparable to lower-rated chains like Comfort Inn, but this offers so much more for the money.  The rooms were spacious enough for all four of us (2 adults, 2 teens) and our luggage.  The property offers a free FULL breakfast - real eggs, bacon, fresh fruit, belgian waffles.  Free happy hour of beer and wine - self serve.  A very nice pool and spa.  Friendly and helpful staff.  And it's only 10 minutes from Laguna main beach, or easy access to the I-5 if you want to go to other beaches north or south.    And the cookies are awesome!  Unfortunately it was booked for the weekend so we had to change to another
Manager Response: Dear PHXJC463 -  Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you and your family over the holiday. How wonderful to know you found your guestroom spacious and the service and amenities conducive to a comfortable stay. We hope you will visit again very soon.   Safe travels,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Very good experience. Great value for families. Hotel clean, good breakfast. Refrigerator and microwaves in room are great for families. Comfortable rooms. Room service quick to clean rooms. Pool and soaps decent compared to others. Customer service mostly great! The gal that checked us in was not personable at all. We are big on customer service but the remainder of the staff was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear leitravel -  It was a pleasure welcoming you recently. Thank you so much for choosing us and for your kind words. Excellent service is what we strive for and I am pleased it was provided to you, although I apologize if your check-in was not a warmer experience. I will be sure to address this with the Front Desk team. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel for our large group
Summary: We just stayed at the Ayres hotel with a large group. I wasn't expecting much but was pleasantly surprised how great the hotel was! The only negative thing I could say is that we drove to Cali from Seatlle arriving at at noon and when we tried to check in the women at the front desk said we had to wait until 3. She was not friendly at all. We had two kids and had been in the car for two days. She then proceeds to let others check in early. I thought it was weird and asked some other families who said they had the same experience. I understand the check in times but she let others check in early right in front of us. I think the fact she was rude didn't help. Other than that, the hotel was nice and clean, the breakfast was great, much more than a basic continental breakfast with

Always consistent, very clean very comfortable. A great value for families. Great breakfast too. It's also a great location, for Orange County.  Perfect place for the price. Also they have a free reception with wine.
Manager Response: Dear mamasita1967 -  Thank you so much for your taking the time to review our hotel. It was a pleasure welcoming you again recently. We appreciate your continued loyalty and are pleased to know you find the cleanliness of the hotel, service, and accommodations so consistently comfortable. We are grateful for your recommendation and hope you will visit again soon.   Regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Its supposed to be one of the best places to stay in the area, and the hotel lives up to its billing. The rooms are neat and comfortable. And the breakfast spread was also delightful. Very good for a short stay.

Summary Heading: Very nice, a little pricey, but we definitely got what we paid for.
Summary: Upon first entering, the decor of the lobby was very classy.  The staff was nice and efficient.  The room was very clean and spacious.  A nice big bed, fluffy pillows, we slept quite well.  I'm still thinking of how delicious those omelettes were at the breakfast buffet the next morning.  We enjoyed our stay quite a bit.
Manager Response: Dear Mike -  It was an honor welcoming you as our guest recently. How wonderful to know that we made such a lasting initial impression and that you found value in your stay. We are also pleased to know you found the cooked to order breakfast an added bonus. We hope you will visit again very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel in Southern California for Business Travelers
Summary: I stayed at this hotel between 2 and 4 days each week for eight months! The rooms are beautifully furnished, the beds are large and very comfortable, and the shower pressure is strong. The staff has been uniformly gracious...I will continue to stay at this hotel on every possible occasion going forward. One item to note: their breakfast is ample and free, and they have snacks during the late afternoon; however, you'll need to find your own restaurants for dinner. No worries...the area has many choices, including American, Chinese, Thai, Italian, Barbecue, and many others.

Summary Heading: Would stay there again, hopefully not during softball tournament season
Summary: Kudos to the front desk personnel (Ryan) who was very friendly, offered us cookies, and even hailed us a cab when we needed one.  We were staying there with others in a wedding party, and needed a cab to Tivoli Too for the ceremony.  Our room was VERY comfortable on the 3rd floor.  The A/C worked great, the bed and pillows were comfy, the linen spotless clean, the carpet was clean, etc.  The room smelled fresh, not stale.  In-room amenities were plentiful including towels.   The guest rooms have "smart keys" so your key card must stay inside a small box on the wall just inside the door.  If you remove it, the room power goes out in 20 minutes.  We had to take our room key with us when we left for the wedding, but I believe our room refrig probably went off while we were gone.
Manager Response: Dear CHPHH -  It was a pleasure welcoming you recently. Thank you so much for your very thorough review and for taking the time to share your experience. I am thrilled to hear that the service  and cleanliness of the hotel met your expectation and that we were able to provide such a comfortable stay during a period of very high occupancy. We do our utmost to ensure guests are not disturbed or inconvenienced by large in house parties and I am pleased our team put so much effort into this. As to your concerns regarding the energy saving device and the refrigerator, please know that the refrigerator stays on at all times regardless of whether a key is left in the slot or not. Your comments are most appreciated and we do hope you will visit again soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and people, but too many mistakes
Summary: I just arrived today, so if things get better, I will update.  Let me start by saying this is a nice well kept hotel, but too many mistakes add up, so be careful and diligent.  I made reservations over a month ago for Wed thru Sunday.  When confirmation came in it said Thurs thru Sun.  I immediately contacted Chris, the manager, who was very apologetic and nice and said he would let me know if there were any cancellations.  There weren't so I had to attend meetings here on Wed and stay at another hotel that night.  I came in on Thursday at four to check in.  My confirmation said deluxe corner queen queen suite, excellent, since I brought my family.  Rose, at the front desk, was very kind and said that wasn't available, even though it was on my confirmation, a room type is never

Just left the hotel yesterday, after a 6 night stay for my daughters wedding.  Lots of friends and relatives at the hotel.  No complaints from them.  The morning breakfast, including omelet station was a big highlight and value.  Several things to be aware of:  no restaurant or bar, but plenty in the area.  No safes, which seemed odd. I travel a bit and the Ayres did not skimp in furnishing the rooms.  Very nice accommodations.  Had two issues.  Shower head, not functioning right.  I saw the maintenance guys in the breakfast room.  They had it replaced before I finished breakfast.  Another one of my guests, had their air conditioning unit fail.  The maintenance guys were there with a new unit, on a dolly, and had the old one out and the new one installed within 30 minutes.  Very
Manager Response: Dear Jon -  It was a pleasure welcoming you and your family during your daughter's recent wedding festivities. Thank you so much for choosing us and allowing us to be even a small part of such a wonderful event. We know weddings can be very stressful on everyone and do our utmost to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay before, during, and after the celebration. We wish your daughter the best and hope you will visit again soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: The hotel is everything everyone says however... I have stayed there twice and had the same issue both times. The rooms smell stale, rank. I let the front desk know when I left, she was polite and said maybe the room needed a deep clean and would notify housekeeping. I won't stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear CatherineJohn75214 -  Thank you so much for your candid review of our hotel. I am so sorry to hear that your experience with us was anything less than remarkable. The odor issues you describe are alarming as we take immense pride in the cleanliness of our hotel and want each guest to feel they are in a perfectly appointed room. I apologize for the two instances you describe and will happily look into it further if you would be kind enough to let us know the room number. I am sorry that we were unable to make a better impression and hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Beautiful room and free cocktail hour the evening we arrived, also freshed baked cookies and free breakfast in the morning. I would stay again! Staff very friendly and helpful! Close to freeway and resturants.
Manager Response: Dear Tina -  Thank you so much for your succinct review. We are thrilled you found your stay comfortable and our location convenient. Please keep us in mind should you be in the area in the future.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: So easy and very comfortable. Great place to stay with kids and see Orange County. The staff is very attentive, the rooms are clean, and breakfast is a hit with the kids! The fitness area has everything we needed, and the pool area is great for relaxing (or letting the kids burn some energy off). We will definitely return to the Ayers!
Manager Response: Dear Lynn -  Thank you so much for allowing us the chance to welcome you and your family recently. We truly feel the guest experience should be our number one priority and do our utmost to create a remarkable one. I am so pleased by this and also by the fact that you were able to take advantage of our larger, newly renovated gym. Thank you again for your recommendation and please visit again very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed the stay here..  the staff was excellent.   I have one suggestion for the breakfast. please include sausage every day besides the bacon.  our driver Ryan and millie are awesome .  I will be back for sure. Dino
Manager Response: Dear Dino -  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to review us. How wonderful to know that the service and accommodations lent themselves to a satisfying hotel visit. We will definitely take your breakfast suggestion under advisement for future review of our offerings and I will be sure to pass along your compliments. Please visit us again soon.   Safe travels,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Great friendly service. Very good breakfast. My room 317 was quiet and room and bed was comfortable. Stayed at 4 hotels this trip and the over quality of our stay was the best at the Ayers. Next best was the Marriott Marina Del Rey.   Use to stay at another highly touted Laguna Woods place but after unprofessional experience with the front desk on two previous trips, this will be our Hotel choice in Laguna Woods area.
Manager Response: Dear oldtraveler2wong -  It was an honor having you as our guest recently. Thank you so much for taking a chance on us and allowing us to show you how comfortable a stay at our hotel can be. We are thrilled to have earned a place as your choice of hotel when in the area and hope you will visit again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Great experience at the Ayres Hotel
Summary: We have never been treated so well at a hotel, the room was wonderful, the breakfast the best my husband has ever had at a hotel and the cocktail hour was great.  The staff are so helpful and caring, the rooms are wonderful and everything was so perfect.  I would recommend Ayres to every one I know!!
Manager Response: Dear Sandy -  Thank you so much for your enthusiastic recommendation. To know we have made such an impression on a guest is phenomenal and it was a pleasure having the chance to welcome you. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and hope you will visit again very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This is my third stay at the Ayres Hotel and every time I love it!  The staff is incredible- so friendly and helpful.  Special compliments to Rose who always has time for a smile!  The rooms are quiet as are the halls.  The breakfast is made-to-order which is quite a bonus.  The cookies are fresh all day long!  And the happy hour on the weekdays really helps after a long day!  I have stayed here for as long at 10 days at one time and never had a single concern.  I totally recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Kim -  Thank you so much for choosing us for a third time and for your enthusiastic recommendation. To know we have provided an exceptional guest experience is simply wonderful as that is our primary goal. I will be sure to pass along your comments to Rose so you knows how much she is appreciated. We appreciate your review and hope to welcome you back for a fourth time soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding value for the money at Ayers Laguna Woods
Summary: As an east coaster, this hotel was a fantastic value for the money. Our room was gorgeous and very clean. Included was a complete hot breakfast daily, a happy hour with complementary beer, wine and pizza, and fresh baked cookies very night. I was very impressed and highly recommend the Ayres to anyone who will be staying in Southern California.
Manager Response: Dear Penny -  Thank you so much for your kind words. It was wonderful having the chance to welcome you recently and provide such comfortable accommodations. How wonderful to know that our many complimentary amenities and weekday Manager's Reception contributed to such an impressive stay. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Loved having the refrigerator, Microwave, and little sink area.  Bed was extremely comfortable.  Gym area had multi equipment to chose from compared to others and two TVs to watch.  It was nice to have the breakfast included and on top of that it was a full breakfast with cooks to make you eggs as you like them.  The happy hour snacks where a great added touch after long working day and not sure what wanted for dinner.  Thursday being best of all with pizza.  Makes business travel better.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly -  It was an absolute pleasure having you as our guest recently. Thank you so much for allowing us to welcome you and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers. I am so pleased to hear that you found your stay so exceptional and the many complimentary amenities conducive to such a comfortable experience. We are grateful for your review and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Helped me out in a pinch!
Summary: After getting stuck in the area with a family member in the hospital, I called Ayres Laguna Woods (had stayed there before, great hotel) at their 800 number. Was told no vacancies.  After getting no joy at other area hotels I called the front desk at Laguna Woods (not the 800 number).  The night man immediately found me a room at a great price at the hotel.  In my dealings with Ayres Hotels, they are always clean, have great service and a great price.  They make it easy and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Mark -  Thank you very much for allowing us to welcome you during what must have been a difficult time. I am very pleased to hear we were able to accommodate you at the last minute and provide a comfortable stay. We are grateful for your continued loyalty to the Ayres Hotels and hope we will have the chance to welcome you again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and great service
Summary: Great place, great rooms, great breakfast,very attentive staff, I would highly recommend. Warm baked cookies every afternoon also. Close to Laguna Beach, Anaheim Irvine Spectrum etc. Good Location. Many Restaurants within 5 to minutes drive of there. Easy to find from Interstate 5.  We went to Long beach to Laguna, to Palm Springs and to San Diego from there  and all were 2 hrs or less.
Manager Response: Dear Terrie -  Thank you so much for visiting us recently and for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. I am very pleased that our South Orange County location proved convenient to all of Southern California's big attractions. It was a pleasure welcoming you and we hope to do so again in the near future.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We stay here frequently for business travel.  The hot made-to-order breakfast is a big plus.  The rooms are spacious, the beds are very comfortable, and staff couldn't be friendlier!  Parking is easy, and there several restaurants & a Starbucks nearby.  Very convenient to the highway, as well.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer -  It is always a pleasure welcoming you to our hotel. Thank you so much for choosing us for your business travels and for sharing your thoughts about our hotel on TripAdvisor. To know we are able to provide consistently comfortable accommodations and warm service to a guest absolutely makes our day as this is what we hope to accomplish every day. We are very grateful for your recommendation and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Our stay was very good.  In the future, I would probably ask for non-down pillows as our allergy-ridden family suffered a great deal there.  I would probably also suggest getting a room away from the ice machine.  The breakfast was good and the hotel was nice and clean.  I would definitely stay here again.

We were visiting Laguna Woods for a family wedding and stayed at the Ayres for 2 nights for the wedding.  We loved it so much we decided to stay for 2 more nights.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  The facility is awesome, very quiet and clean.  The beds are sooooooo comfortable.  They have a full breakfast every morning and they have delicious cookies in the lobby area whenever you want them.  We would highly recommend the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods and can't wait to come back.  We learned during our stay that it is a family owned business and they certainly make you feel like you are family.  Next time you are in the area, stay at The Ayres, you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear DeMarsDriveaway -  It was an honor welcoming you as our guest. Thank you so much for your very kind words and for your enthusiastic recommendation. We most certainly strive to make each and every guest feel at home, so it is always wonderful to know we have met our goal. We are so appreciative of your review and look forward to welcoming you again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: We love the Ayres Laguna Woods! B&B charm with benefits of a hotel
Summary: Perfect hotel for our family!  Hotel is beautifully appointed, reminds me of a B&B, staff is always kind and helpful.  The morning breakfast is tasty and there is something for everyone.  My kids love making their own Belgium waffles, yummy eggs, yogurt, granola and fresh fruit.  FANTASTIC location freeway close and there is a million fun things to do within a 15 minute radius.  Rooms are always clean and they have comfy beds too.  Mini fridge, microwave and second sink are so nice to have.  On this trip we went met extended family and enjoyed having an executive room as one of our rooms.  This is one of my favorite right priced family getaways!
Manager Response: Dear Diana -  What a very kind review! Thank you so much for your kind words and for making us one of your favorite hotels to visit. I am so pleased we are able to provide you such consistently comfortable accommodations and hope you will visit again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Clean. Great breakfast -- fresh hot waffles, omelettes made to order. Very nice decor, a cut above. Greeted us with warm, fresh, soft cookies at check-in and each day thereafter. Nice outdoor sitting area. Comfy indoor sitting area.

I have now had the pleasure of staying at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods, CA three times.  I first stayed there because my school, Brandman University, recommended it.  I am so impressed with the Ayres that I would not consider staying anywhere else when I have to return to my school.  It is so clean and totally pleasant.  All of the staff are so friendly and helpful.  The breakfasts, thanks especially to Alex and Angela, are outstanding.  They remembered me from previous visits and are just so happy to help.  Minni is very efficient and always helpful.  The service is excellent.  I can't think of any suggestion unless it would be to expand east of the Mississippi.  My husband joined me on my last visit, and he felt the same.  My brother and sister-in-law also rented a room on

Summary Heading: Always a Pleasure to stay here
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times now and it never disappoints in all areas.  The only thing missing is a full time restaurant, but the breakfast is beyond anything you can get anywhere else.  Keep up the great work, Ayres and thank again for another wonderful stay!
