Very clean updated hotel.  Excellent free breakfast each morning.  All of the staff are very friendly and respond to any request very quickly.  Rooms are excellent and matress and pillows are the best I have every felt, very very comfortable.  Stay here you will love it.

My recent stay at the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods was outstanding. Quiet facility with great spaciaous, clean rooms and excellent service. This is my second time staying at the hotel and was not disappointed. Staff is always welcoming and friendly. Eager to please. Offers free wi-fi and free parking. They have cookies.

I have stayed at this wonderful several times including this past week for 5 nights. I enjoy the ease of making reservations online. The staff are always courteous and friendly. I have to also say that having a full kitchen and dining area where the staff prepare breakfast is a wonderful treat. If you are looking for a place to stay where you can really relax in the presence of great people, this is your place.

I went out to see my husband, who was working in LA for a week or so, and I cannot say how lovely and friendly this hotel was.  There is no bar, however.  BUT - every week day from 5 p.m. until 7 p.m. they have free wines and nibbles (actually more than nibbles) on the bar in the breakfast area.  Just help yourself and take your drinks out to the pool area.   We had a lovely king bed room  there's a massive supermarket just across the highway - where you can buy wine if you want it - and there's a fridge and microwave in the room if you really want these things.  But, more important this this to me, was the fact that there is a guest laundry - so I washed, dried (and ironed, because there is an iron and ironing board in the room) all my husband's shirts for our onward trip up to

My daughter and I traveled to Laguna to visit my son and daughter-in-law on Mother's Day.  I looked for an inexpensive hotel that was close by to his apartment.  So I wasn't expecting much but hoping for a clean, quiet facility.  I was blown away!  It's a beautiful hotel!  The room was very attractive, the beds comfortable and I have to say (and I've been to quite a few hotels recently) run by the nicest group of employees! They made us feel very welcome when we checked in and any employee we saw while we were there was equally helpful. Our stay included breakfast and again I was expecting the usual continental fare and was surprised to find an omelette bar, waffles and many breakfast choices.  One of the managers refilled our coffee and asked if we enjoyed our stay... I will

My room was amazing. A beautiful hotel. Perfect setting... The hotel was fabulous from the rooms, breakfast, staff, and even the soft music playing in the background. The staff was professional, helpful,  friendly and provided excellent customer care to every guest.  I love the shuttle service. The value o the hotel was good.  I would not hesitate to stay at his hotel again or another of these properties. Although, I was a little apprehensive when I first booked my reservation, but my stay has changed any doubt.     Thanks to the  Ayres's Hotel Staff in helping to make my stay an enjoyable one.

The hotel and staff far exceeded our expectations.  The greeting was warm and courteous.  The soft music, artwork and furnishings set a comforting tone to our stay.  Our room was clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The free breakfast was one of the best we have ever had - eggs, bacon/sausage, pancakes, waffles, fruit, etc. - and the eggs could be made to order, fried, omelets, for example.  The hotel was easy to find, near the freeway and only about five to six miles to Laguna Beach.  My wife and I would not hesitate to return and stay at this hotel again.  In addition, we will likely search for other Ayres Hotels when we go on vacation or other excursions.

I like the fact that Hotel is energy conscious - you need your key - European style to turn on your electricity.  The room was spacious and clean although one night I did wake up with bites - from somewhere - not sure where.  The bed was extremely hiqh quality.  Appointments professional and pleasant.  Breakfast was limited in alternatives, but pretty good. When I asked if the potatoes had onions (I can't tolerate onions) he said how about a sausage? Not really what I had in mind. (No pork for me.)  When I was rushing to leave for a meeting, I discovered that they had locked me out of my room and side door entry at 9 AM for a posted 11 AM departure time.  That was not only disrespectful but inconvenient (got me as I was loading the car and had to run around to front desk to get

It's always a pleasure to stay at the Ayres. It's extremely well-run, comfortable and a great value. The staff truly cares about its guests. Issues are addressed quickly and efficiently. And you'll find the best breakfast in town. Just gotta figure out how to work the air conditioning!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in Orange County
Summary: I was staying here because it was recommended by my client.  It is conveniently located in the Laguna/Irvine area.  Rooms were great ... clean and spacious.  Breakfast is free.  There are a number of restaurants in the office park where it's located and there is a Starbucks across the street.  I'll happily be returning to this hotel.

Summary Heading: very clean room, well kept property
Summary: clean room,comfortable bed,nice breakfast best rate was the weekend rate.. Didnt get to use the pool or spa but looked inviting. Even the art on the walls we very nice to look at...We would stay here again no doubt about it!!

Summary Heading: This is an affordable classy place-quiet, comfy, clean, and a great free breakfast
Summary: Friendly service, four star quality in a quiet area. Comfortable bed, clean everywhere, classical music in the elevators, tasty cookies in the evening, made to order omlette and many other selections - best free breakfast I've had. I had a room overlooking the pool and hot spa, and it was nice and refreshing to look at and enjoy the view. Did not need earplugs as the windows and walls are fairly well insulated, but always carry earplugs just in case. Was this helpful?

Summary Heading: Best Hotel I ever stayed at
Summary: Visited family in Orange County, CA. Room was clean and quiet, staff were positive & friendly. Breakfast, though not 5 stars, was 'free' and decent. (Omelets, scrambled eggs, waffles, cereal, fresh fruit, fruit juices, etc.) I would stay there again without hesitation.

I stay at this property while traveling for work.  This hotel offers nice rooms at a great price.  Free wifi!  Close to lots of convenient restaurants, nail salons.  The staff is very friendly.  The happy hour and breakfast are icing on the cake!

Excellent hotel, everything about the facility fit our needs perfectly. It was spotless, rooms were well appointed and fairly large, beds comfortable, breakfast service and food quality was very good. The location was very convenient to Laguna Beach, Dana Point and a wide variety of restaurants. It was also very affordable.

Customer Service is still alive! All o the hotel staff was extremely pleasant and personable. The breakfasts (included in hotel stay) were excellent. The pool/hot tub area is clean, serene and absolutely beautiful. My daughter and I also enjoyed the fresh baked cookies daily! This was a great experience and I will ALWAYS stay at the Ayres in the future-even if it means a longer drive to LA and other areas. The room was quiet, bed was comfy and elevator was efficient.  This trip included me and my 4 year old daughter and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thanks to the staff!

Summary Heading: I got more than I was expecting based on the price.
Summary: Nice place. Nice rooms. Great service. Parking is great. Close to the beach.  Good place for young couples, families and for old people. Rooms are convenient. Nice pictures make you feel you went back in time to 18-th century, but with 21-th convenience.

We love to travel so we had the chance to stay in many places so far, but our stay at Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods was such a great experience! It is an amazing hotel, in my opinion this is the way how all the hotels should be! Great staff, beautiful rooms, great amenities and also a great price for all! To explain in detail, they serve full hot breakfast every morning, you can exercise in their fitness room that is very spacious and has everything you need or you can relax and have a coffee in the Italian-style backyard that is absolutely gorgeous. Or just stroll on the hallways and look at the beautiful paintings! They also have free drinks and cookies in the afternoons in the same beautiful backyard next to the pool. We totally loved this place! Big thank you to the Ayres

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in a quiet area
Summary: First time travel to the area; this is our corporate hotel.  Very nice property, quiet room, comfortable bed.  Nice breakfast included in the room rate (cooked to order unlike most hotel breakfasts).  Happy hour at night.  Good gym, nice pool area.  I'd stay here even if I was paying with my own money!

Best hotel experience ever.  I will ony stay at Ayres hotels from now on. The staff at the Ayres truly did go above and beyond.  Loved my room and all amnenties.  Food was excellent.  Hotel was very clean.

A delightful oasis. Set back from road. Quite. Friendly, helpful staff. Cooked to order breakfast specials. And, a Happy Hour. Room was very clean, large and comfortable.  While breakfast is the only meal available, there are plenty of restaurants nearby. Closest hotel to Laguna Woods Village. Highly recommend and will stay here again.

If you stay here, you will not be disappointed.  A very quiet and good location that made us want to linger and not hurry back into the busy world.  This hotel was recommended to us by friends who have stayed here many times and I am so happy we listened to them.

Wonderful fresh breakfast with choices for everyone, Happy Hour was a pleasant surprise and all staff were very friendly.  We were concerned that European elegance would be too posh but the hotel was very comfortable.

My father was in the hospital and we needed a place to stay at the last minute and this hotel was recomended to us by several people. Was very clean breakfast was wonderfull and staff was notch.I would highly recomend this hotel

The Ayres Hotel is great for those visiting Laguna Woods. The hotel offers a special discount when you have business at the Laguna Woods complex (formerly Leisure World). They offer a complimentalry breakfast and the rooms are large and well appointed. We have stayed there a few times and are never disappointed with the hotel and service.

The comfort and service of a boutique hotel at half the price. The breakfast is not only convenient, but is our first choice compared to local restaurants. The terrace is open for breakfast in nice weather, a very soothing way to start the day.

Summary Heading: Best Laguna Woods hotel as usual
Summary: This Ayres is a short walk from Gate-7, Laguna Woods Village.  I have been using the hotel since it was built, and I have tried a couple of others, once.  The Ayres’ comforts, class, staff, and extremely nice (free) buffet breakfast dining room put it way above other places I’ve tried in the area.  Just across El Toro are a major supermarket, Pharmacy, Office Supply and other businesses.  On the Ayres side are at least two restaurants, with countless more just down the street.  And yet, the Ayres is a very quiet place.  The dining room, used primarily for breakfast, has at least 3 freshly prepared hot items (meat, eggs, and potatoes) and a chef who can prepare custom variations.  Juice, coffee, fruits, milk, waffle makers, and great seating round it out.  As others have said,

This is an elegant, very clean hotel.  Rooms are spotless and comfortable, great bed.  Breakfast is more than generous.  Staff is helpful, enthusiastic and friendly.  I wouldn't stay anywhere else in the area.

This was the best hotel I've stayed in.  The rooms and hotel and beautifully decorated and the staff did their best to put me in lower floor room with a slider to the beautiful pool and spa.  The breakfast is superb.  Everything is tasty and fresh and omelets are made to order.  I would definitly reccomend this hotel to anyone in Orange County.

I had the opportunity to stay at the Ayes recently, and had another fantastic experience. There were a few issues that came up for me (my issues, not to do with them) and they went out of their way to help me resolve them. It was so great.   The hotel has the best beds around, a wonderful breakfast, the location can't be beat (easy access to the beaches, LA, San Diego, Disneyworld, shopping, wherever), lovely decor, great fitness room, clean pool, reasonable rates -- but it's the great staff that makes it exceptional.  I love staying there and high;y recommend it!

A great hotel. Helpful staff, very nice rooms, free parking, free wifi all add up to a very good bargain for staying in the L.A. area. I have stayed at a ton of hotels in southern California, and this hotel is at the very top of the heap. I will be staying here again, as well as at any other Ayres property.

I stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods,  it was a very nice Hotel,  very clean and they served you a hot breakfast too!.  This hotel was great, the staff was friendly and they made me feel as if I was home. Not to mention the price,  it was very reasonable, you would think you would pay much more for a Hotel like this.  I would most definately recommend this Hotel,  Great stay for a great price.

I've been to other Ayres Hotels and I love them. Friendly,clean,comfortable,yummy cookies after 5, and the pool / hot tub area is classy-comfy. I enjoy myself each time. It's one of the larger hotels I've stayed at. I'm hoping to put together a girls weekend in June. A great place to relax.

I'm a frequent visitor to the Orange County area.  Can't imagine any other hotel offering this level of fine service at this price range.  All hotels should be this nice.    Courteous staff, spotless property, full breakfast.  It doesn't get any better than this.

Here is a quick .30second Review - Fantastic value, AMAZING Fresh/delicious breakfast, great beds, attentive staff, and very safe area. Hotel is centrally located and very close to area business and attractions.   Nothing Wrong here, Wonderful place to stay.

I will give a shout out to Minnie, Ryan and Rose. All three were of excellent help.  The hotel is so beautiful and very clean.  I have no complaints at all!!!!! The front desk staff which I named catered to my every need. I really appreciate all the help from them with directions to laguna beach and for activities for things to do.  This hotel deserves 10 stars not 5. Free breakfast in the morning that was amazing. Kuddles to the chef.   I would recommend this hotel to everyone.  Thanks Ryan, Minnie, and Rose :))

Our family of five recently visited Laguna Woods and had the pleasure of staying at the Ayers Hotel. We could not have been more pleased with the quality and friendliness of the service we received. The room was clean, spacious and safe for our three small children. The complimentary breakfast which was quite extensive was delicious and remained orderly and clean. We enjoyed the pool and courtyard area that served as a perfect gathering spot for family we were visiting with. The hotel is also in a great location for neighboring restaurants, coffee shops, etc. We will definitely recommend this to other families in need of accommodation in Orange County.

we would absolutely recommend this hotel after staying three different times.....quiet, clean, safe and so friendly! Great value for our money, with the fabulous breakies, and happy hour treats. Location was perfect for our visiting...we are now loyal guests who will choose an Ayres Hotel over others in California travels!
Manager Response: Dear Jane -  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel and for allowing us to welcome you a third time. To know we have earned your loyalty is wonderful, and each of our hotels will be lucky to have you as a guest. We are very appreciative of your recommendation and look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: As a regular guest at Ayres Laguna Woods, I can say without a doubt that this remains the best hotel to stay at any price.  Very clean, wonderful breakfast, friendly staff who go out of their way to help out. The room is equiped with all the amenities you need plus the free wi-fi is a nice feature.  The weather was cooler so I didn't use the inviting outdoor pool and spa but I did use the very high quality fitness room with state of the art equipment.
Manager Response: Dear chrysler G -  Once again, thank you so much for allowing us to welcome you once more and for your very kind words. It means such a great deal to us that your experience has led you to comment not once but twice on TripAdvisor. We are always very pleased to have you as our guest and provide the most exceptional hotel experience possible. We appreciate this recommendation and look forward to the next visit.  Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This is one of my favorite hotel in OC. Since I have been on business trip so many times, I have very solid measure and this hotel is really nice and no hesitation to recommend to my friend. It would provide whatever you expect from boutique hotel. And, if you are picky about the bed, the mattress here could be an answer. I really enjoy my stay here every time.

Summary Heading: Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods - Very Nice Hotel
Summary: My wife and I stayed here in February for a nearby business function.  The hotel offered a Valentines weekend special during the entire month.  Nice discount that included a bottle of chilled champagne, nice gesture.  The room was 350 sf and very clean.  Smaller TV at 32".  Complimentary full breakfast that was rather bland.  Over all: my 1st time at an Ayers Hotel, very clean, nice staff, well lit parking lot, complimentary full breakfast, managers reception during the week, warm cookies, and an inviting lobby.  I will look for these hotels when traveling in the future.

This was my first time at an Ayers hotel. The decor isn't my taste, but everything was very well done, clean, good beds, nice towels, free in room wifi and many amenities, such as microwave, and refrigerator in the room. The staff was courteous, friendly and helpful. The complementary breakfast was reasonably good, better than most. I would stay at this hotel again.

Visited Ayres Laguna Woods for several times.  Every time a very pleasant stay with thanks to the great staff of the hotel. Situated nearby malls and the beautiful Laguna Beach.  The rooms are luxury and spacious. The manager’s happy hour is a very good welcome after a hard day of work. Breakfast is great, thanks to Alex. Regards Jeroen

I have stayed here nearly weekly for months now as I travel for work. The staff is very professional, friendly and proficient. The accomodations are beautiful and the beds are so comfortable! Big rooms, extremely clean. The complimentary breakfast is the best I have ever had in a hotel, the gym is great...can't say enough good things - including how delicious the cookies are upon check in! The queen size room with divider is awesome if you are staying with fiends or children to add a touch of privacy.

First time staying at this Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods. It felt like we were at an Italian Villa for the weekend. The breakfasts are fabulous, the front desk help were extremely courteous and helpful, and I loved our queen size room with the divider. I will stay here in future visits. Great deal for the affordable price.

Hotel provides breakfast in the morning, shuttle service for local area, friendly staff and awesome rooms.  What more do you want?  Chris, the assistant manager, picked me up several times in the shuttle and he was knowledgeable of the area and amiable to my busy ever-changing schedule.  The wine evenings from Monday to Thursday are a great chance to relax and mingle with other guests.  I will always stay at this hotel when in this area.

Summary Heading: Very friendly Staff in a really comfortable hotel
Summary: I stayed in this hotel for the third time, traveling to the area for business. This time I brought my girlfriend along, and both of us really enjoyed our stay. The hotel has been over the top Italian style, but the rooms are incredibly comfortable with a mini fridge and a microwave, the staff is very friendly and really helpful and the included breakfast was good and has plenty of options. Pool and gym are available, and nice outdoor seats in the inner courtyard make a perfect place for a summer drink. From the hotel it is an easy drive down to the coast and plenty of shopping in the area is available. When visiting don't forget to stop at the sushi restaurant across the street! I'm sure to come back here during my next business trip, thanks Ayers!

I recently stayed at the Ayers Hotel in Laguna Woods and was again very impressed!  The room was clean, large and comfortable!  I love the linens, making my stay away from home a pleasant one!  Any questions or requests were easily responded to by the front desk!  While off the beaten path, this hotel is actually close to shopping, restaurants and Irvine companies.  I was only a few miles from my business headquarters and it was an easy drive!  (no freeway)   Breakfast is served each morning, however, I did eat breakfast (too much food for me :-) )

I have stayed here several times, and once again, I was completely satisfied.  This hotel provides an excellent value.  It is very well maintained, attractive, good service and conveniently located. The full breakfast, which is included is also very nice.

I stayed one night to attend a wedding in the area. I made the reservation over the phone. I had never stayed at an Ayres before and I was pleasantly surprised. The room was large: bed, sofa, chairs, coffee table, desk, and bar. It was clean, neat, and fresh. The bed was very comfortable. I was on the first floor, so I had a nice view of the garden/patio. The entire staff was very friendly. The lobby was very nice. The coffee in the room was ok. I didn't get to try the complimentary breakfast because the wedding was too early. I will definitely stay again.

My wife nad I enjoyed our stay at the Ayres Hotel. Customer service was superb.The room really cozy and welcoming. The bed was very comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was really delicious. I would stay hear again or any other Ayres Hotel when possible.
Manager Response: Dear Arnold -  Thank you so very much for taking the time to share your experience and for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you. It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We are always hoping to extend the best possible service to our guests and are thrilled this contributed to such a good stay. We appreciate your review and look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I stayed for one night at this hotel. It is very nice and clean. The room I was in had a small sitting area, small refrigerator, microwave, and a wet bar. The bed was a king and was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept on. There were various pillows and the variety made it possible to find one to my liking. This hotel has a complimentary managers reception every evening and I stopped in briefly and it was quite nice with beer and wine available. It also has an exercise facility that was quite nice as well as a pool with a separate hot tub. There is a breakfast offered every morning and it is WONDERFUL. It is the best I have experienced. There was a lady attending and she would make eggs or omelets to order, had hash brown potatoes, sausage, and pancakes. There were
Manager Response: Dear rotos -  Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you and for your very enthusiastic recommendation. We are always pleased to learn we have made such a strong positive impression on a guest. It sounds as if the complimentary amenities - including the weekday Manager's Reception and full American breakfast - really contributed to an exceptional experience and we are thrilled to be able to provide them to our guests. And that super comfortable bed you were sleeping on? That was the Ayres Dream Sleeper mattress, which is also available for our guests to purchase should they be so inclined. We appreciate your recommendation and hope you will stay with us again very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: They could easily charge much more and still be a fair value. Four star quality at 2 star prices. It is just 20 minutes from O.C. airport and free parking is plentiful. Right in the middle of restaurants and shopping. clean facility and pleasant staff. You will be asked repeatedly if everything is all right and can they do anything to help you. My 11 year old thought the manager was the owner, and responded, "Well he acts like the owner." Highest praise for that!
Manager Response: Dear clandise -  It was a pleasure welcoming you to our hotel. Thank you so much for your positive review and for choosing us for your stay. We feel providing exceptional guest service is absolutely key to our guests having a comfortable stay with us, and I am so pleased we were able to do so in your case. We are grateful for your recommendation and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Hotel has definitely become our "go to" hotel in Orange County. I don't think you can find a better value in the area, or a more pleasant and accommodating staff. Rooms are spacious, very nicely appointed, and CLEAN! Breakfast buffet is very good, and far superior to other hotel morning offerings. Very large parking lot, and great location. This was our 5th stay over the last few years, and we will definitely be back. The general manager, Vince, is always visible, and checks in on the guests during breakfast. Really a "jewel" of a hotel-the Ayres family certainly does it right!  (they have also recently upgraded their fitness center. now, it is much larger, has more machines, weights, and exercise balls, as well.)

There is not a better hotel in the area for lodging, food, convenience, and service.   Parking is always available.   Shopping is close by.   The local restaurants are listed by the front desk and the receptionist knows about them.   Airport service is also available from the hotel as a courtesy.

We required temporary housing due to a water/plumbing disaster in our home.  Our stay was 25 nights while restoration of our home was done.  This hotel is a mile from our house and so was very convenient for us.  The staff made us very comfortable during our stay.  Daily breakfast was a welcome service.  Good cookies too!

Fantastic breakfasts are included daily. And happy hour Monday through Thursdays which includes cookies. :-)  Surprised that such a new hotel would have such noisy toilets and showers.  But overall a very nice stay.

Although it has a decor of old victorian, it has a quaint feel to it. The breakfast and happy hour treats is what makes the stay sweeter! And the homemade cookies are to die for! The staff are super friendly and very attentive. I did have a minor problem in my room, but it was out of their control. An animal climbed into the vent system and it stunk the whole floor, but that wasn't their fault. Let's hope they got that stench out. I recommend staying in a corner room and on the third floor because if you have someone above you that walks heavy, you'll be counting their steps while you sleep

Summary Heading: Very Pleasant Stay at Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods
Summary: Stayed at this property in early December 2012. Was on the first floor, off the lobby. Always very quiet in the hotel and in my room, which was very nicely appointed, bed very comfortable, nice writing table and chair and sofa, with coffee table. Plenty of lighting. Liked very much hotel offered DSL and wireless -- I always seem to have trouble with wireless in hotels. Continental breakfast was a FULL breakfast, and enjoyable. The property itself is very clean and orderly, attractive, and pleasantly staffed. I certainly will stay there when I travel there in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Jim -  It was a pleasure having you as our guest. Thank you so much for choosing us for your stay and for taking the time to review our hotel. How wonderful to know that everything from the accommodations to the service (and even the complimentary amenities!) contributed to such a pleasant visit. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to that future visit.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Quiet, clean, nice breakfast, comfortable beds, generous room, friendly and accommodating staff. Close to freeways and good location to visit So Cal- Laguna Beach, Disneyland, etc. Would return and recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear jklhol -  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your visit to Southern California and for taking the time to share your experience. I am thrilled our close proximity to the area's top attractions (Laguna Beach and Disneyland) proved convenient for you and that your accommodations were comfortable and clean. We are very grateful for your review and hope to welcome you again very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Elegant, but cozy and very good price
Summary: This is our second time for us to use this hotel. We had very good time at this hotel first time and that is the reason why we decided to come back again. Rooms are beautiful and classically furnished and big! Break fast is also what I like. The gym is open from 5:30am, pool is heated. Staffs are friendly and solve problems when it happens. When I called the desk for the shower head broken, they showed up within 10min. They figured out the issued while we had breakfast. My husband and I are so happy to stay here. We would come back again!! Thank you so much for your service.

Stayed for just a couple of nights at the recommendation of my daughter- who lives near to the hotel.  The front desk welcome was awesome!! and extremely quick - I had asked that I get an early check in - 11:00a.m. due to my arrival in CA - and arrived at the Ayres just after 10...my room was ready and they knew who I was. My room was very nicely appointed, clean and inviting ( the wall separating the queen beds was a little confusing) - but was overlooked. Didn't go for the evening apps and wine, beer. Breakfast was nice - chef did made to order and was very friendly and quick...there was plenty of food items to choose from. Only bad mark (not enough to lose a star) no hotel van service - some type of shuttle to the local area spots should be provided and I was disappointed to

Great location, easy to get to the freeway or to the beach areas.  Large, clean, comfortable rooms.  Includes best hotel breakfast ever encountered, with indoor or outdoor seating.  Comfortable bed, plenty of pillows.  Beautiful pool and spa area. Free WiFi. Hotel decor is extremely pleasant with lovely framed pictures on the walls in rooms and in hallways.  A single free computer is available in the lobby, but some guests had trouble using it to print boarding passes, and sometimes there was a wait to use it.

My parents live in the retirement community of laguna Woods Village and the Ayers Hotel has been the perfect place for us during visits. The hotel is clean, comfortable and very reasonably priced. The staff is excellent, the rooms are large and the breakfast (included in the price) is delicious. There is also free wifi in every room. We've been coming to the ayers for years and it is always a great stay and I highly recommend this hotel.

Staff was unfailingly courteous and helpful. The breakfast was terrific, far better than what you normally see at a hotel. My wife, in particular, loved the bed, which is high praise as she's a very sensitive sleeper. We travel to this area somewhat regularly to visit friends, and will definitely plan on staying here again.

The hotel rooms are spacious and cozy.  The  staff is friendly and helpful.  I travel quite a bit for business and this truly is my home away from home.  I really like the gym and the breakfast is fabulous.  In fact, the chef fixes my favorite...egg white omelet with spinach.  A great way to start the day.  I recommend the hotel to my business colleagues and

I love staying at this boutique hotel when I'm in the area.  Very friendly staff, topnotch accomodations, lovely breakfast & happy hour.  The rooms are like little suites, and have a homey feel to them.  Since it's a smaller hotel, it's very simple to navigate.  The beds are so comfy, so much so I bought one for my home.

Summary Heading: Lovely pool and whirlpool, comfortable room
Summary: I stayed here for one night on business in Irvine. This hotel is clean, modern, well furnished, and it's staff is friendly. It has a lovely pool and whirlpool in the back that is surrounded by plants and trees. The breakfast is free--eggs, waffles, sausage, potatoes, oatmeal, juice, coffee, tea, toast--almost anything you could want. The bed are carved, fancy wooden frames with comfortable mattresses and lots of pillows. The bath amenities are nice and the bathtub is Jacuzzi style.
Manager Response: Dear JLFERG -  Thank you so much for your kind review of our hotel and for choosing us for your visit. We were honored to have you as our guest and hope you will visit us again very soon. We appreciate your recommendation!  Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We only stayed here one night whilst visiting a relative in Laguna Woods but cannot fault the hotel.  It was very reasonably priced, clean, welcoming, friendly staff and good location.  Nice pool and patio area and little park just across from the parking lot.  There was even a "Happy Hour" each evening with free wine, beer, soft drinks and snacks!  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear MarcusM777 -  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you to our hotel if only for a short visit. I am so pleased we were able to make such an impression with our cleanliness and complimentary weekday Manager's Reception. We appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation and hope you will be able to stay with us a bit longer next time!  Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Residents of England, we have stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Laguna Woods several times over the past seven years as our son and his family live nearby.  We have always appreciated the exceptionally friendly and attentive staff, the comfortable rooms and relaxed atmosphere of the hotel and of course the delicious daily platters of homemade chocolate chip cookies!  The daily breakfasts, cooked to order if desired, are a perfect way to start the day. As The Ayres only serves breakfast, one needs to eat out for other meals, although there is a mini fridge and microwave in each room. There is a snack bar at the reception desk, but the prices seem a bit high for snacks.  There is a pool and hot tub if desired and an excellent gym for those who are looking for a bit of exercise.  The
Manager Response: Dear JDorman -  It is always such a pleasure welcoming you to our hotel. Thank you so much for your long and continued patronage and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. Your review was very thorough and I appreciate you informing those on TripAdvisor about the various benefits of our hotel, including the complimentary amenities and location. We love being your choice of hotel in the area and look forward to your return.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This was a family trip for our goddaughter's wedding; the hotel was a real delightful surprise.  We reserved three rooms and each was perfect.  Breakfast exceeded expectations.  The value for cost ratio was exceptionally good.  The staff was friendly, helpful and competent to the person.
Manager Response: Dear Ncoast -  It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you as our guest. Thank you so much for allowing us to be even a small part of your goddaughter's big day. I am so pleased you found such value in your stay and that the service was so accommodating and friendly. We appreciate your recommendation and hope you will visit again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Our stay was great. Our friend blocked rooms for their Wedding in Laguna. I had called in advanced to make reservations for a one night stay however, last minute decided that I wanted two night stay and arrive early to enjoy Laguna but wasn't sure if they had any rooms available for me to come in early. Surprisingly, I called and they offered me a room at the same cheap rate that I got for my one night stay! I got there and they even upgraded my room for me. Loved the high ceilings in my third floor room...that made the hotel room look extra extravagant.   Breakfast was great and the cooks are very kind. Enjoyed the cook your own waffle station. Never got to enjoy the pool and jacuzzi but it looked great from our room. Hotel and hotel rooms look much better in person compared to
Manager Response: Dear Lind -  We were more than happy you attached! Thank you so very much for your kind review and for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. We always love the opportunity to exceed a guest's expectations with our accommodations and service. I am very pleased our location proved convenient for you and that your overall stay was so exceptional. We hope your travels bring you to the area again very soon.   Safe travels,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I stay at this property regularly and remain impressed with their attention to detail and cleanliness.  The staff are always attentive and go out of their way to impress. The daily breakfast is incredible and the staff are accommodating to let me get breakfast before my early morning golf games before the restaurant opens. The shuttle service from SNA airport is a very convenient feature.  I have regularly stayed at this hotel for the past 10 years and believe it's the best boutique hotel in SoCal!
Manager Response: Dear Chrysler -  Thank you so very much for your kind words and for your continued patronage to our hotel. To have such a loyal repeat guest is an absolute dream, and I am thrilled you find your experiences so consistent. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to the next ten years!  Warmest regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Love the breakfast! It's one you don't want to miss. Nice to have the Happy Hour in the Lobby too. Have not seen that at any other hotel. The one thing that got me was the $2.50 Cup of Noddle at the snack store in lobby. Those thing are like $0.49 in the store. They need to bring that price down for sure! So I grabbed the Hormel's- "Chicken Alfredo" as a snack a value at $3-$3.50

Easy check-in ,delicious breakfast, courteous and helpful employees. All of the kitchen,desk and engineering staff were outstanding. Requests were promptly taken care of and I felt welcome during my stay. The decor is comfortable and homey ,great cookies each evening and a quiet convenient location. Five stars on my list!!
Manager Response: Dear Irene -  Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you to our hotel. To be described as any guest's "home away from home" is absolutely wonderful and we are so thrilled to have made your stay a comfortable one. I am also so pleased to hear you felt welcome during your visit as you most definitely were and are! We appreciate your review and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This hotel has become our "home away from home" as our parents have lived in the Laguna Woods area over the last almost 15 years. Many of the same staff is still there, which speaks volumes to the management and overall quality of the company itself.   We love the decor, which feels both welcoming, beautiful, and comfortable. The beds are more comfortable than my bed at home, and I love how they give you different kinds of pillows to choose from on the bed. A big thing for me is that fact they have a little kitchenette in every room -- a refrigerator, microwave, sink, and coffeemaker. Just enough to hold drinks and make snacks. I hate it when hotel rooms don't have these, and I have to go out somewhere to get a drink of anything besides water. I really appreciate these
Manager Response: Dear Martha -  Thank you so much for taking the time to write us another positive review. We couldn't ask for kinder words and are so happy to be so consistent in our service and accommodations. To have a guest choose our hotel time and again is absolutely amazing and we are so appreciative of your patronage. We are very grateful for your recommendation and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I had never been here prior to coming here for my job-related travel, but now anytime I travel in the SoCal area, I always check to see how close I will be to an Ayres Hotel. Just a truly distinguished, first class to stay. Just lovely!
Manager Response: Dear Beyondliberal -  And we love having you! Thank you so much for consistently choosing our hotels for your Southern California travels. I am so pleased you find your visits comfortable and welcoming. We will soon be expanding into Paso Robles, so you will be able to stretch your search a bit further north! We hope to welcome you back very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Nice enough hotel, clean and well furnished, good facilities.  Good choice at breakfast but the lack of a restaurant is a bit of a pain in the evening.  There are plenty of restaurants nearby but with a bad case of jet lag we didn't really want to venture out first night. I'd think of using again but might try another local hotel first.

We decided to stay at the Ayres for a trial run as we reserved a block of rooms for an upcoming event.  We were extremely pleased with the service, very clean, comfy bed, A/C in working order, and spacious room equipped with a bar, microwave, & mini refrigerator.  The walls were well insulated and couldn't hear other guests nor the footsteps of people above us.  The complimentary full breakfast buffet was well worth the stay -- omelettes made to order, waffle station, fresh fruit, sausage, cereal, and much more to enjoy!  There was a happy hour manager's reception during the week (M-Th) which served snacks and drinks.  The eating area for breakfast and evening reception was huge and looked like a nice formal dining area.  We felt we were in a nice restaurant and not a fast food

We have stayed at the Laguna Woods Ayres Hotel a few times over the years now and don't wish to stay anywhere else. The beds are grand and comfy. The staff is always friendly and helpful with anything we have asked. Great place for families or just to get away. Convient to local freeways, public transportation, general shopping, restaurants and the beach, of course!

Summary Heading: This hotel is close to everything
Summary: My family & I just returned from orange cty calif on the 22nd. For four nights we once again stayed at the ayres hotel laguna woods. It is always the cleanest and most relaxing place. Every morning they have a full brkfst which includes waffle making station, eggs cooked to order with all the sides. Juice machine, great coffee, cold cereal, fruit etc. its at no addtional cost!! they offer a wine and cheese, soda,beer mon-thursday from 5 till 7 p m. Free parking and shuttles. They are close to all major attractions, yet settled in a quiet spot. Mr Vince Neale is the manager and he usually walks around esp at brkfst to ask how everything is and even may warm up your coffee. When we go to visit a family member who lives nearby we always stay at the ayres. Try them out!!

On this visit, my sister also stayed at the hotel. She now will stay here on her future trips. The service is great and very friendly. They make you feel special. The rooms are very clean, bedding superb,and attractive decor. Complimentary breakfast has a wonderful selection of hot and cold items daily. The enlarged fitness room and new equipment is perfect. This hotel is always adding new things. The free wireless access and lobby computer came in handy. A well managed hotel that is my favorite hotel by far.  Recommend this hotel for business or personal visits.
Manager Response: Dear Richard -  Thank you for taking to time to share your experience on TripAdvisor and for your kind words. To be called anyone's "favorite" is just phenomenal and I am pleased we made such a strong impression on your sister as well. Our priority is providing the highest quality accommodations and service, so it is wonderful that we were able to make your recent stay so comfortable. We are very appreciative of your review and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I have stayed several times a year and always come back because of the excellent service, accommodations, and food.  I am very(!) happy with the improved workout room, good investment.  At 5:15a both mornings that I could get there, about 6 or 7 people were using the room.  Really like the added treadmills and weight area.  Guest service staff is always friendly (I've known them for several years now) and it's great to see Vince in the mornings.  Plan to keep coming back.
Manager Response: Dear James -  Thank you so much for your kind words and for your continues patronage. Our returning guests mean a great deal to us, and I am so pleased you find your experiences so consistently satisfying. And how wonderful that you were able to take advantage of our newly remodeled fitness room. We are also pleased to be able to provide our guests with more space and equipment as that morning workout can set the tone for the entire day. We appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation and look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Like staying at a 5 star hotel
Summary: Pros: The hotel was a a great bang for the buck, looked like a 5 star hotel, very comfy feel. Pros: very clean, fantastic beds & pillows I slept better there than in my own bed, nice buffet breakfast, quiet location, nice pool area . Cons: The night we stayed they were re-surfaceing the parking lot and had blocked most everything except the handicap space I had parked in so at 11:30 PM I get a call to move it. Im sleeping by then and went down to move it. Pissed but I understand the paving company screwed up with the signs. The other Con was the a/c wasn't working correctly, when it was on no problem but after the auto shut it off it was not going back on when it got hot. Overall we was very impressed and will go there again.
Manager Response: Dear IValphamale -  Thank you so much for your kind review of our hotel. While I am pleased you found the room (especially the bed) so comfortable, I do apologize for any inconvenience that may have been caused by the parking lot resurfacing. I hope it did not cause too great an ordeal. Please know I have also shared your comments regarding the air conditioning with the Maintenance Team for investigation. With this recent Southern California heat wave, we definitely want to ensure our guestrooms are able to reach an appropriate temperature. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back in the near future.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I just wanted to compliment the staff and hotel for an outstanding job of helping make my guests happy and comfortable. The breakfast was wonderful and the rooms are very comfortable and large. I would highly recommend this hotel for a vacation from home

We were supposed to get a grop rate from a wedding booking. We missed the supposed deadline 2 days. We were told they could no longer honor the rate. I could see no logical reason why they can not in the spirit of customer service. I was declined a AAA rate as well. The hotel staff allowed a loud party in one of their meeting rooms and it spilled into the pool area I had to call and complain well after 1 a.m. In the morning when coming down for breakfast, the patio area outside the pool was littered with beer bottles and food wrappers. Is this a hotel or a Fratenity for parties? I have stayed at Ayres hotels before and choose to because it's usually a lot classier and nicer than other hotels.  This was disappointing on many levels. An unapologetic staff and she loud party. It
Manager Response: Dear Craig -  Thank you so much for your candid review of our hotel. I do apologize greatly for any issues you may have encountered during or before your stay. This is in no way typical of a stay at our hotel and I have already discussed your comments at length with the team here at the hotel. We take your comments very seriously, and I invite you to contact me so we can discuss them and come to a satisfactory resolution as we wish nothing more than for your experience to be an exceptional one. Again, I apologize and hope you will give us a future opportunity to show you how remarkable a stay with us can be.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We have lost count of the number of times we have stayed at the Ayres Laguna Woods since it opened.(We come to visit family in the area).  It is the best value in the area in our opinion, not only price-wise but also --and just as important--for the quality of the facilities and the service. Any little problem is attended to quickly and efficiently, and service, whether at the front desk, the dining room, or housekeeping/maintenance, is always provided with a smile.  It's great to be remembered from visit to visit as well! Vince Neale, the general manager, does a wonderful job of hiring and keeping quality staff, and is himself visible every morning during breakfast during the week, meeting guests and pouring coffee. A nice touch. We wouldn't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Anne -  It is always a pleasure welcoming you to our hotel. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel time and again and for your very kind words. What you describe is exactly what we strive to provide our guests, a sense of "home." I am privileged enough to work with an amazing group of people, so I will be sure to pass along your compliments. We are very appreciative of your review and look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the hotel, only item was wanted a king bed and none were available when we checked in, the happy hour and breakfast couldn't have been better.  Would stay there again and again.

The rooms were nice and spacious, clean, and comfortable. Offered a breakfast daily and a great Happy Hour hosted by the hotel. Great cookies. Quiet place. I would definitely come back to stay for pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Tmom23 -  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. It is always wonderful to learn that a guest has left our hotel fully satisfied with the accommodations and service, We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope you will consider us the next time you are in the area.   Many thanks,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Great hotel!  Beds are very comfortable.  Rooms are beautifully decorated and very clean.  The staff is friendly and helpful. And the breakfast included in the cost of the room is the best we have experienced in a hotel.  The location is great, close to Laguna Beach and to family if you have folks living in Laguna Woods.  I have stayed here several times and have never been disappointed.  I applaud the staff who I observed dealing with a very rude customer, they handled him with grace.
Manager Response: Dear Karuna325 -  It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you as our guest. Thank you so much for your kind review and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. Any time we see the words "best" and "ever" in a review we are thrilled and happy to have made that guest's stay so exceptional. It is also wonderful to know that you found such value in our rates and complimentary amenities. We are very grateful for your recommendation and look forward to your return.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Stayed at the hotel w/ a club soccer team.  DIdn't expect much.  Reasonably priced.  Received a room upgrade w/o even asking.  Beautiful room!!  Lots of space & beautiful furniture as well!  Loved the pillows! Kids thought the room reminded them of Hearst Castle.  Lots of traffic getting to games on the I-5 over the weekend.  It was a parking lot.  Front desk kind enough to give us directions via surface streets so that we would arrive at our games on time.  Worked out perfectly!  Thanks for going the extra mile!! It really made a difference!
Manager Response: Dear Lindsay -  Thank you for your kind review and for choosing our hotel for your stay. We love making an impression on our guests with our European-inspired decor, so it is fantastic to hear that your children compared it favorably to Hearst Castle! We are always happy to assist our guests in getting around the area as easily as possible and I am pleased this made a difference in your travels to and from your various games. We appreciate your recommendation and hope you will think of us again the next time you are in the area.   Safe travels,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful.  The morning breakfast is good and the lady cook remembers my face from trip to trip and welcomes me back warmly.  The work out room has been upgraded and now includes more machines and room to do your workouts so it can accomodate more visitors at once (that was my previous complaint).  I utilized the hot tub and pool each night :-) and they were clean and at appropriate temps.  The rooms are large, clean and the beds are comfortable.  I appreciate the microwave & frig, especially when I stay all week.  Looking forward to a return trip in a few months.
Manager Response: Dear Sue -  It was wonderful welcoming you back to our hotel. Thank you for taking the time to review us once more. I am very pleased that the hotel has proved consistently comfortable and the service friendly. We are also excited to have been able to expand our fitness room recently to give guests more space and a greater variety of equipment. How wonderful that we were able to meet your needs exactly! We greatly appreciate your review and look forward to your next visit.   Many thanks,   Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: LOcation - very close to the all attractions of laguna beach,  Property - well maintained, spacious room with all amenities, morning breakfast spread was good!  in the same complex you have a SUSHI place, Home town Buffet. within 1-2 miles you have other restaurants.  Final verdict - we LOVED it, will be back soon...

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Pageant of the Masters & Sawdust Art Festival
Summary: The following is a very detailed review of the Ayres Laguna Woods Hotel.  We stayed two nights at the hotel and were assigned Room #155, which includes a sliding glass door facing the swimming pool and fireplace area with chairs and tables.  We are repeat customers of Ayres and have stayed in several locations.  We love the extremely high standards of the company, and received a special rate by following Ayres on Twitter.  We are also Stash Rewards members, which enables guests to earn points for staying at Ayres and other boutique or independent hotels.  The room is very large with a mini refrigerator, microwave and bar sink.  There is a desk with executive task chair, a two seat table and chair set, and a pull out queen sofa bed.  The bathroom sink area and closet area is
Manager Response: Dear VegasBling -  Thank you for your very thorough review of our hotel and for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you. It appears as if each area of the hotel provided something useful and convenient, which is wonderful to know. We find that many of our guests love our close proximity to Laguna Beach but also appreciate being far away from the crowds and expense of the actual city, so I am pleased that it made your attendance of Pageant of the Masters advantageous. We appreciate your review and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Just spent a week at the Ayres in Laguna Woods. Room was very nice, super comfortable bed and very clean. Staff was nice and the breakfast was great. Only reason I did not give it 5 stars is the noisy plumbing, etc. in the walls and I had to tell front desk 3 nights in a row that the phone did not work. I had to use my cell to call them to schedule a wake-up call. On the 4th day, one of them finally fixed it.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen -  Thank you for joining us for a week recently. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and I am happy to learn that the guestrooms proved clean and comfortable. I do apologize for any noise issues as a result of the plumbing as well as the phone issue discussed. We generally do our utmost to ensure we immediately handle electronics problems our guests report, so I will be discussing this with our Maintenance Team. I will also ask them to look into the plumbing to see whether this is something that can be amended. I appreciate your candidness and hope your next visit will be absolutely perfect.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: I was a little nervous about booking a hotel that was unfamiliar but this property exceeded our expectations.  This Tuscan-style luxury hotel created a sense of being in Italy and we couldn't have enjoyed ourselves more.  The staff was very attentive, our two queen size beds were so comfortable, and the room had a wet bar with a microwave oven and mini-refrigerator.  I am a bit afraid to let the cat out of the bag for fear that our secret will be out and more people will discover this gem in the Laguna Beach area.  But, to be honest, it was a relaxing stay and so close to Laguna Beach without the hassle of the crowds and high hotel prices.
Manager Response: Dear Frances -  It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you to our hotel. Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity to show you how remarkable a stay with us can be. Anytime we learn we have exceeded a guest's expectations we are overjoyed, so I am pleased that the decor, accommodations, and service lent themselves to such a satisfactory experience. How wonderful to know you were also able to take advantage of our close proximity to Laguna Beach. We are very grateful for your recommendation and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Everything went so good.  My room was very nice and comfortable.  The staff was wonderful.  But one staff member really put custmer service as her #1 priority.  She always tried to make sure that all the Is was dotted and the ts crossed.  She was truely an awesome person to have help.  Her name is Minnie.  Yep, like the mouse.  What a very kind and caring person. The breakfast was good.  Breakfast was served as you order it.  Good tast and hot too.   Thank you Ayres for making my stay great even when away from home.
Manager Response: Dear David  -  Thank you for your kind review and for choosing our hotel for your stay. To know you found the service so welcoming and friendly is fantastic and makes me proud to be a part of such an amazing team of people. Minnie is an integral part of that team and I will be sure to pass along your compliments to her so she knows her efforts are appreciated. We appreciate your recommendation and hope you will think of us the next time you are in the area.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We recently had a 74 day business stay.  The staff, led by Vince Neale was wonderful.  The room was well designed and extremely clean.  The complimentary breakfast was first rate and second to none.  This is the quality of a 5 star hotel at very reasonable rates and we very highly recommend it to all business people and vacationers alike :)
Manager Response: Dear George -  It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you for such an extended stay. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation and the time taken to inform fellow business travelers about our hotel. It is wonderful to know that you found each aspect of the hotel consistently comfortable throughout your stay as we know it can be difficult to be away from home for such an extended period of time. Thank you so much for your kind words. We hope you will visit us again very soon.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Just spent one night this trip but it was as comfortable and pleasing as all my other stays here. The staff make you feel welcome,the sparkling clean rooms are luxurious with extremely comfortable beds. Breakfast, happy hour and airport shuttle included in the room price add to the great value of this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Donna -  It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you back to our hotel, even if only for one night. Thank you for your kind review and for your continued patronage. We love when guests visit us on more than one occasion as it gives us the opportunity to show them that a stay with us can be consistently comfortable. I am very pleased you found each element of the hotel up to our normal standards and hope you are as eager to return as we are to welcome you back. Thank you again for your recommendation.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This hotel was a pleasant surprise.  We had gotten the one-night stay online, so weren't able to stay a second night (even though we requested it a couple times).  However the hotel was clean and had a nice little happy hour with pizza and cookies, along with a really nice breakfast in the morning.  Most impressive was the manager serving coffee and chatting with guests and the great service from the cooks in spite of being busy.  The added value made this a very reasonable deal.  Parking is free and if you stay here be sure to check out Polly's Pies only a mile to the north. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear AndrewOAz -  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. How wonderful to know that our complimentary amenities, including the full American breakfast and weekday Manager's Reception, lent themselves to such a comfortable hotel experience. I am also pleased that the cleanliness of the hotel met your expectations. We are very grateful for your review and hope to welcome you again very soon.   Sincerely,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: what a great experience from the minute I called and a great voice answered very friendly too.,, her name was Marilyn. She took my reservation and was sure to get me the best available room at that moment.. The stay was terrific smoothe as any place I've stayed before. The front desk people Chris,Marilyn,Jamaeca, and Minnie couldn't have been more personal and kind. Great job folks.

Summary Heading: A boutique hotel with great comfort and breakfast
Summary: My wife and I stayed on a Thursday night at Ayres Hotel.  I was able to get a good rate through hotline.  The hotel is located in a small business/restaurant complex.  Parking is available around the building and it is free.  I noted that not many cars were parked that night.  When we walked in we were impressed by the atmosphere, quality of furniture and reception desk service.  A free newspaper was available.  Our room was on the first floor and it was larger than I anticipated.  The wash basin area and toilet/tub/shower are separated and not seen when you are in the living room.  The bed is very comfortable and AC is very effective.  We slept very well that night.  There is a manager's reception from 5-7 p.m. that includes wine, beer, soft drinks, cookies, chips/salsa, pizza

we came here on our anniversary and we two loved it.. the hotel is a beautiful property.. i liked the well-decorated poolside area .There is classical music always playing inside the elevator..the rooms are spacious and comfortable..one of the bedside lamps was not working but anyhow it did'nt matter us much.. great breakfast spread as well.. The hotel was conveniently located for us, for everywhere we went in the area.It was only a 10 minute drive to the beach.. Would definately recommend a visit here and I will stay here on my next trip to the Laguna area.
Manager Response: Dear Ratsy1982 -  Congratulations on your recent anniversary! Thank you for your kind review and for allowing us to play a small part in this celebratory event. I am thrilled we were able to provide you with the comfortable accommodations and convenient location that made for the perfect Southern California getaway for you and your significant other. We are very grateful for your recommendation and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale  General Manager

Summary: Because of the good reviews on Trip Advisor, we booked the Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods for July 28-31.  It was also a convenient location for our visits to Laguna Niguel, Dana Point, and Laguna Beach to see Pageant of the Masters (if you've never seen it--please go!).  We are so happy we chose this hotel.  The entire staff was professional and so nice. The beds were really comfortable, the room was well appointed and, even by my highly critical housekeeping standards, was spotless.  We thoroughly enjoyed the hotel's breakfast.  There were many choices, the food was very good, and the staff couldn't have been more accommodating and friendly.  We didn't use the pool; it looked inviting, though!  We couldn't have been more pleased with this hotel and are happy we made the right choice.
Manager Response: Dear Ginac78 -  It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you as our guest. Thank you so much for your review and for making us your choice of hotel in the area. It sounds as if you were able to enjoy all that South Orange County has to offer, including the Pageant of the Masters, so it is fantastic to know that our location proved so convenient. I am also very pleased to hear that the cleanliness of the hotel and guestroom met your standards as we think this is one of the most important aspects of a hotel stay next to welcoming service. We are very appreciative of your recommendation and hope to welcome you again very soon.   Warm regards,   Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: This is the second time I've stayed at the Ayers Hotel in Laguna Woods for a pleasure trip. I'll just say, It's a pleasure to have stayed here again! The service is excellent, the food is great and it's a nice, clean and beautifully decorated hotel. Thank you Ayers!

This hotel is roomy, well appointed and comfortable. The cookies each afternoon are delicious! The breakfast has made to order omelettes, much fresher breakfast than we have seen at any other hotel. The staff is friendly and helpful, it is obvious the place is well managed.

Stayed 3 nights at this super hotel, feels  like being in Toscana! Completely quiet, fantasticbeds, great breakfast, super hapy hour with nachos, pizza, beer and wina, all free of charge. Booked it via hotwire and saved over 100 usd pr day.

We stayed only one Saturday night, and found the Ayres Hotel to be a great choice.  Very reasonable price, the rooms and very nice, and the location is ideal.  Staff was pleasant, and there is a great breakfast available every morning.  Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

We stayed here to attend the Pageant of the Masters.  Just a short 5 minute drive.  Much nicer than other hotels I've stayed in for the same purpose, and incredibly reasonable!  The staff was very efficient, helpful and friendly.  The room was beautiful, super clean and had very comfortable beds and pillows.  Free Breakfast made to order in the morning was a refreshing plus.  We dined by the pool and the staff kept our coffee cups full.  Great overall experience!  I will always stay here when I'm coming to Laguna!

Summary Heading: Ideal for visiting relatives or friends in Laguna Woods
Summary: This is the ideal hotel to stay at when visiting relatives or friends in the Laguna Woods community.  The hotel is located just a block away from the gates of Laguna Woods and offers a very homely and welcoming atmosphere.  The rooms are sufficiently spacious and the complimentary breakfast is filling, but not very healthy.  Ayres Hotel Laguna Woods is more of a family hotel than a business one.  That being said, I found the staff very accommodating and they appeared to be very courteous toward children staying in the hotel.  I will definitely stay here again when my travels bring me back to the Laguna Woods area.

First, spacious room is a plus.  Smelling when walking in the aisle.  This could be caused by the old carpet and poor ventilation.  At night, after 9 pm, still can hear people's conversation and laughter.  It could be from swimming pool which is surrounded by the hotel.  To those peoples sleep early, this is annoyed.

Lovely, spacious room. Convenient location.  Great breakfast. Lobby, pool area and all common areas are beautifully maintained.  I agree that while most of the staff is lovely and helpful, one or two people are a bit less so.  Disappointed I couldn't get late check out. Overall, this hotel provides a delightful, clean, crisp, comfortable experience. Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Margaret -  Thank you for your very kind review of our hotel. It is so wonderful to know that every aspect of the hotel exceeded your expectations and that your overall experience was satisfying, though I do apologize if any team member interactions were less than stellar. I have already discussed your comments with the team to ensure each guest is treated with the utmost respect. I am also sorry to hear that a late check-out was not available. While we try to honor all requests, extraneous circumstances do sometimes prevent us. We are very grateful for your recommendation and hoep you will choose us again the next time you are in the area.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Great Hotel Nice rooms, beds were great, Memory foam  Full Breakfast very good. Very Clean  Second time staying at Ayres Hotels, We will be Back!!!! With sister-in-law had a great time. Was a  good location to Shopping and eating.
Manager Response: Dear 3sharon -  We appreciate being given the opportunity to welcome you to our hotel for a second time. It sounds as if every aspect of the hotel, from its cleanliness to the many complimentary amenities provided, lent themselves to a comfortable and convenient visit. I am also pleased to hear that the location was convenient for you and your sister-in-law. We are very grateful for your review and hope to welcome you again very soon.   Many thanks,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Everything good.  Front desk staff a bit stressed.
Summary: Good breakfast.  Nice room. Good price.  Clean and worked well for the family.  A couple of front desk people were a bit crisp. But nothing bad.  Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear ZeroUpFourOut -  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for choosing us for your visit. I am very pleased you found the accommodations clean and agreeable though I do apologize if your interactions with the Front Desk team were anything less than remarkable. We wish for each and every one of guests to feel welcome, appreciated, and comfortable asking for anything they may possibly need. Please know I have already discussed your comments with the Front Desk team to ensure this goal is met. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a mother-daughter trip with my Girl Scout troop. We had gone to a concert @ Verizon Ampatheater, stayed here, then went to the OC Zoo & Irvine Regional Park. This hotel was in a great location for making this trip easy. The best part? Their breakfast! To have 11 moms & daughters rave about it- you know it's a good one! I had waffles (you make yourself in a waffle iron) with strawberries/whip cream, made to order omelet, fruit....It was a great start to our busy day! They had eggs, bacon, potatoes, cereal, pastries and more. It was great!   The beds were more comfortable than I imagined, as I don't usually like hotel beds. The pillows were not good, however. We all compared and said we either had a "brick" pillow or one that smooshed down so low it felt like
Manager Response: Dear Sandiduff -  It was wonderful having the opportunity to welcome you and your daughter (and Girl Scout troop!) to our hotel. Thank you for choosing our hotel for your visit and for your thorough review. We do put a great deal of care into choosing exceptional items for our complimentary full American breakfast, so it is wonderful to know that your entire group enjoyed it so much. We are always happy to do our utmost to accommodate guest requests should they prefer a room without a partition as you suggest and we do encourage our guests to let us know their preference.   As to the interactions with the Front Desk, I do apologize for any wait that may have been incurred. The hotel can get quite busy during summer months, and I am confident the Front Desk team puts forth their greatest effort to assist each and every guest but I do understand if this created any inconvenience and do again apologize.   We are very grateful for your recommendation and hope you will think of us the next time you are in the area.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay at Ayres Hotel , the staff is very friendly and breakfast good but the style of the furniture was too 'baroque' for my taste.
Manager Response: Dear Maye_y -  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and for choosing our hotel for your visit. I am thrilled the service proved accommodating and the complimentary full American breakfast satisfying. While our hotels are well known for their European-inspired decor, I do understand that this particular element may not be for everyone. However, we do hope that the hotel's many services superseded any concerns about the ambiance. We are very grateful for your review and hope you will visit us again in the future.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: Best hotel ever and also great breakfast!! For anyone that has back problems this is the place for you. I was not expecting the beds to be memory foam!! A+
Manager Response: Dear Mutya81 -  How wonderful to hear that you found your stay so satisfying. We are very grateful for your review and for your recent visit. I am pleased you found our beds so conducive to a good night's sleep. While they are not memory foam, they are our signature Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses, which many guests find extremely comfortable. Thank you again for your review and please keep us in mind the next time you are in the area.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Good value, close to Laguna Beach
Summary: This is our third stay at the Ayers Laguna Woods. The staff is very nice and helpful, and they remembered us on our return trips. The hotel is clean, has plenty of parking and the breakfast is really good, a nice money saver over eating out every morning. The evening reception is nice as well, and we enjoyed the cookies for a snack after dinner. We always try to stay at an Ayres whenever we are in Southern California, they are the best.
Manager Response: Dear Douglas -  Thank you so much for your positive review and for your continued patronage. To know we have provided a consistently comfortable stay to our guests is encouraging and I am pleased we were able to do so for you. I am also pleased you were able to take advantage of our numerous complimentary amenities, including the weekday Manager's Reception and full breakfast. Your recommendation is greatly appreciated and we hope you will visit us again the next time you are in the area.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, nicely appointed with excellent beds
Summary: We have stayed at an Ayers hotel 2 times now.   The staff is helpful, pleasant and are interested in doing their jobs well.  The beds in the rooms are wonderful with pillow options that are soft and that are more firm. The styling of the hotel is a bit heavy handed baroque for my taste, but not unpleasant. We have on both occasions required the use of the pull-out couch for kids. This is the the one failing I have found at this hotel. The pull-outs are miserable! It's the classic scenario of too thin of a mattress and a bar in the back. If you are putting a 40 lb child to sleep there, no problem, anyone 75lbs or more, beware.  The breakfast was quite impressive in scope and was quite good overall. There were waffles, and eggs made to order, sausage or bacon, home fries, cereal,
Manager Response: Dear Rachel -  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay a second time and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers. It is wonderful to hear that you have found the cleanliness of the hotel and bedding consistent, although I do apologize if there was any issue with the sofa pull outs. We do our utmost to ensure the bedding is comfortable as we know a good night's rest is important to all of our guests. I will do my utmost to investigate this matter and find a resolution so all guests will be treated to a peaceful rest. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you a third time.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed for 3 nights as a getaway while our kids were at camp. We loved this hotel. Very nice room, super comfy bed and the breakfasts were a huge money saver for us. My wife and I also loved the nightly managers reception with fresh cookies. The quality is what I have come to expect from a Ayres hotel. They are truly the best hotels in my opinion!! The clerk at the counter was awesome in her recomendations for local hideouts and food stops as well.   I would have given our stay 5 stars where it not for one thing, hence the title of this story. The room A/C was either on fully or off. So you froze or felt stuffy. I brought it to managments attention the first morning and they supposedly had maintanence look at the thermostat however, it was to no avail. No matter
Manager Response: Dear Steve -  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your stay and for your kind review. While I am pleased you found the accommodations comfortable and up to the collection's standard, I do greatly apologize if you experienced any inconvenience as a result of the A/C unit in the room. We do want our guests to be comfortable, so I will once again have my maintenance team take a look at the thermostat in the room again to ensure everything is working properly. That being said, we are appreciative of your review and do hope to welcome you back in the future.   Sincerely,  Vince Neale General Manager
